monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The arcanaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The arcanaloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage. The target must make a 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The arcanaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The arcanaloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15). The arcanaloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self, darkness, heat metal, invisibility (self only), magic missile

spells: The arcanaloth is a 16th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The arcanaloth has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, shield, Tenser's floating disk

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, phantasmal force, suggestion

monsters.name: Archaic
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned

traits.name: Enigmatic Mind
traits.desc: The archaic's mind can't be read, creatures can communicate telepathically with the archaic only if it allows, and magic can't determine whether the archaic is lying.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the archaic fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The archaic doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archaic makes two Force Strike attacks. It can also use Gravity Shift, if available.

actions.name: Force Strike
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +14 to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 19 (2d10 + 8) force damage, and the target is pulled up to 10 feet toward the archaic or pushed 10 feet away from it, as the archaic chooses.

actions.name: Gravity Shift (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The archaic reverses gravity for one creature it can see within 100 feet of itself. The creature must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or fall 100 feet upward. If the falling creature encounters a solid object (such as a ceiling) in this fall, it strikes the object just as it would during a downward fall. If the creature reaches the top of the area without striking anything, it hovers there until the start of the archaic's next turn, at which time gravity returns to normal and the creature falls.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The archaic teleports to an unoccupied space that it can see within 120 feet of itself.

reactions.name: Spell Mimicry (1/Day)
reactions.desc: Immediately after a creature the archaic can see casts a spell of 5th level or lower, that creature must succeed on a 22 Charisma saving throw, or the archaic immediately casts the same spell at the same level (+14 to hit with spell attacks, spell save 22), requiring no material components and choosing the spell's targets.

legendary_actions.name: Strike
legendary_actions.desc: The archaic makes one Force Strike attack.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: The archaic uses Teleport.

legendary_actions.name: Unravel Magic (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The archaic targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) force damage, and each spell of 5th level or lower on the target ends.

spells: The archaic casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 22):

monsters.name: Archdruid

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archdruid makes three Staff or Wildfire attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Wildfire
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +9 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 26 (6d6 + 5) fire damage, and the target is blinded until the start of the druid's next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape (2/Day)
bonus_actions.desc:
The archdruid magically transforms into a Beast or an Elemental with a challenge rating of 6 or less and can remain in that form for up to 9 hours. The archdruid can choose whether its equipment falls to the ground, melds with its new form, or is worn by the new form. The archdruid reverts to its true form if it dies or falls unconscious. The archdruid can revert to its true form using a bonus action.
While in a new form, the archdruid's stat block is replaced by the stat block of that form, except the archdruid keeps its current hit points, its hit point maximum, this bonus action, its languages and ability to speak, and its Spellcasting action.
The new form's attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistances and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

spells: The archdruid casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 17):

spells.At will: beast sense, entangle, speak with animals

spells.3/day each: animal messenger, dominate beast, faerie fire, tree stride

spells.1/day each: commune with nature (as an action), mass cure wounds

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archer makes two Shortsword or Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Archer's Eye (3/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: Immediately after making an attack roll or a damage roll with a ranged weapon, the archer can roll a d10 and add the number rolled to the total.

monsters.name: Archon of Falling Stars

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Mount
traits.desc: If the archon isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the archon and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the archon appears astride the mount, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the archon can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, and both it and its mount have advantage on Dexterity saving throws. If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

traits.name: Radiant Rebirth (Recharges after a Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points, it regains 30 hit points and springs back to its feet with a burst of radiance. Each creature of the archon's choice within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw, or the creature takes 13 (3d8) radiant damage and is blinded until the start of the archon's turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archon makes two attacks with its radiant spear.

actions.name: Radiant Spear
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The archon makes a radiant spear attack or casts guiding bolt.

legendary_actions.name: Coordinated Assault (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The archon makes a radiant spear attack, and then its mount can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Return to Nyx (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The archon causes a corpse it can see within 30 feet of it to burst into a shower of radiant stars leaving no trace of it behind. Everything it is wearing or carrying remains. Each creature within 10 feet of the corpse when it bursts must succeed on a 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (4d10) radiant damage.

spells: The archon's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: command, guiding bolt, spare the dying

monsters.name: Archon of the Triumvirate
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Eye of the Law
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the archon can target a creature it can see within 120 feet of it and determine which laws that creature has broken in the last 24 hours.

traits.name: Mount
traits.desc: If the archon isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the archon and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the archon appears astride the mount along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the archon can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws. If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archon makes two Hammer of Justice attacks.

actions.name: Hammer of Justice
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Pacifying Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the archon's choice that the archon can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw, or else the target drops any weapons it is holding, ends its {@status concentration} on any spells or other effects, and becomes charmed by the archon for 1 minute. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the archon's Pacifying Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Rejoin Mount
legendary_actions.desc: If the archon isn't mounted, it magically teleports to its steed and mounts it as long as the archon and its steed are on the same plane of existence.

legendary_actions.name: Smite (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The archon makes a Hammer of Justice attack, and then its mount can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Detention (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The archon targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 18 Charisma saving throw or be magically teleported to a harmless demiplane until the end of the archon's next turn, whereupon the target reappears in the space it left or the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

spells: The archon's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Arclight Phoenix
monsters.damage_resistances: thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The arclight phoenix doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Grounded Lightning
traits.desc: The first time on a turn that the arclight phoenix touches the ground, it takes 11 (2d10) force damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The arclight phoenix sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

traits.name: Lightning Form
traits.desc: The arclight phoenix can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage. In addition, the arclight phoenix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

traits.name: Crackling Death
traits.desc: When the arclight phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature within 30 feet of it must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion destroys the phoenix but leaves behind a Tiny, warm egg with a mizzium shell. The egg contains the embryo of a new arclight phoenix. It hatches when it is in the area of a spell that deals lightning damage, or if a creature touches the egg and expends spell slots whose combined levels equal 13 or more. When it hatches, the egg releases a new arclight phoenix that appears in the egg's space.

actions.name: Arclight Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 27 (6d8) lightning damage, and lightning jumps from the target to one creature of the phoenix's choice that it can see within 30 feet of the target. That second creature must succeed on a 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 27 (6d8) lightning damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The armanite has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The armanite makes one Claw attack, one Hooves attack, and one Serrated Tail attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Serrated Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Lance (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The armanite looses a bolt of lightning in a line that is 60 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The tiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.desc: If the tiger moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the tiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Art Elemental Mascot
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.desc: When the elemental dies, it explodes in a burst of colored light. Each creature within 5 feet of the elemental must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. A blinded creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Joyful Flare
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) fire damage.

actions.name: Melancholic Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) cold damage.

actions.name: Captivating Artistry (1/Day)
actions.desc: The elemental targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 12 Charisma saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. The charmed target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Ash Zombie
monsters.languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Ash Cloud
traits.desc: When the zombie dies, it leaves a cloud of ash that lasts for 5 minutes but does not obscure vision.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Ashen Animated Armor
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: The armor is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the armor must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the armor remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

traits.name: Ashen Creature
traits.desc: When the armor drops to 0 hit points, it is reduced to a pile of ash, and any equipment it was wearing or carrying falls to the ground.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The armor makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Ashen Flying Sword
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 7

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: The sword is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the sword must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the sword remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.

traits.name: Ashen Creature
traits.desc: When the sword drops to 0 hit points, it is reduced to a pile of ash, and any equipment it was wearing or carrying falls to the ground.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Ashen Heir Anarchist

traits.name: Divine Eminence
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary

monsters.name: Ashen Heir Assassin
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil
monsters.languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

traits.name: Assassinate
traits.desc: During its first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} creature is a critical hit.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: The assassin deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that isn't incapacitated and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The assassin makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Ashen Heir Mage

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: The ashen knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Ashen Creature
traits.desc: When the knight drops to 0 hit points, it is reduced to a pile of ash, and any equipment it was wearing or carrying falls to the ground.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ashen knight makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: For 1 minute, the ashen knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the ashen knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the ashen knight is incapacitated.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The ashen knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the ashen knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Ashen Rider

traits.name: Aura of Silence
traits.desc: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the ashen rider, the rider can force that creature to make a 18 Wisdom saving throw if the rider can see it. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature can't speak and is deafened until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Mount
traits.desc:
If the ashen rider isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the ashen rider and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the ashen rider appears astride the mount along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying.
While mounted and not incapacitated, the ashen rider can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, and both it and its mount have advantage on Dexterity saving throws. If the ashen rider is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ashen rider makes three attacks with its ashen blade or two attacks with its bolt of ash.

actions.name: Ashen Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 13 (2d12) radiant damage.

actions.name: Bolt of Ash
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +10 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 22 (4d10) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the ashen rider's next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The ashen rider makes an attack using its ashen blade or bolt of ash.

legendary_actions.name: Coordinated Assault (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The ashen rider makes an attack using its ashen blade or bolt of ash, and then its mount can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Reduce to Ash (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The ashen rider targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 18 Constitution saving throw, or it takes 27 (5d10) necrotic damage and its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. If the target's hit point maximum is reduced to 0, its body and everything it is wearing and carrying, except for magic items, are reduced to ash. A creature reduced to ash can't be revived by any means short of a wish spell.

spells: The ashen rider's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 18). The rider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Ashen Shambling Mound
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

traits.name: Ashen Creature
traits.desc: When the shambling mound drops to 0 hit points, it is reduced to a pile of ash, and any equipment it was wearing or carrying falls to the ground.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is grappled (escape 14), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.desc: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it. The engulfed target is blinded, restrained, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

traits.name: Ashen Creature
traits.desc: When the veteran drops to 0 hit points, it is reduced to a pile of ash, and any equipment it was wearing or carrying falls to the ground.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Trampling Charge
traits.desc: If the horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

traits.name: Ashen Creature
traits.desc: When the horse drops to 0 hit points, it is reduced to a pile of ash, and any equipment it was wearing or carrying falls to the ground.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Aspect of Bahamut
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft., swim 60 ft.
monsters.damage_immunities: acid, cold, fire, lightning, radiant, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Platinum Brilliance (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the aspect would be reduced to 0 hit points, his current hit point total instead resets to 500 hit points, he recharges his Breath Weapon, and he regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the aspect can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 155,000 XP (310,000 XP total) for defeating the aspect of Bahamut after his Platinum Brilliance activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
traits.desc: If the aspect fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The aspect makes one Bite attack, one Claw attack, and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 23 (2d12 + 10) piercing damage plus 22 (4d10) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 20) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The aspect can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 23 (2d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 27 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The aspect uses one of the following breath weapons:

actions.name: Exalting Breath
actions.desc: The aspect exhales the restoring winds of Mount Celestia in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area of the aspect's choice regains 71 (13d10) hit points, and each creature in that area of the aspect's choice that has been dead for no longer than 1 hour is restored to life with all its hit points.

actions.name: Platinum Breath
actions.desc: The aspect exhales radiant platinum flames in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 26 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: The aspect magically transforms into any Humanoid or Beast, while retaining his game statistics (other than his size). This transformation ends if the aspect is reduced to 0 hit points or if he uses a bonus action to end it.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The aspect makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Furious Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The aspect makes one Bite attack. If the attack hits a creature, the target must succeed on a 27 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the aspect until the end of the target's next turn.

mythic_actions.desc: If the aspect's Platinum Brilliance trait has activated in the last hour, he can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic_actions.name: Celestial Shield (Costs 2 Actions)
mythic_actions.desc: The aspect manifests seven spectral ancient gold dragon around himself that protect him; he gains 77 temporary hit points until the start of his next turn.

mythic_actions.name: Celestial Lances (Costs 3 Actions)
mythic_actions.desc: The aspect conjures four enormous lances of magical force that plummet to the ground at four different points he can see within 150 feet of him and then disappear. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on each point must succeed on a 27 Dexterity saving throw or take 24 (7d6) force damage. A creature in the area of more than one lance is affected only once.

monsters.name: Aspect of Tiamat
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft., swim 60 ft.
monsters.damage_immunities: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, poisoned, stunned

traits.name: Chromatic Wrath (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the aspect would be reduced to 0 hit points, her current hit point total instead resets to 500 hit points, she recharges her Chromatic Flames, and she regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the aspect can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 155,000 XP (310,000 XP total) for defeating the aspect of Tiamat after her Chromatic Wrath activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
traits.desc: If the aspect fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The aspect makes one Bite attack, one Claw attack, and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 23 (2d12 + 10) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 20) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The aspect can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 23 (2d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 27 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Chromatic Flames (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The aspect exhales multicolored flames in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 27 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) damage of a type of the aspect's choosing: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The aspect makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Furious Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The aspect makes one Bite attack. If the attack hits a creature, the target must succeed on a 27 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the aspect until the end of its next turn.

mythic_actions.desc: If the aspect's Chromatic Wrath trait has activated in the last hour, she can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic_actions.name: Hurl Through Avernus (Costs 2 Actions)
mythic_actions.desc: The aspect targets a creature she is grappling. The creature must succeed on a 25 Charisma saving throw or take 44 (8d10) psychic damage and be banished to Avernus (the first layer of the Nine Hells). At the start of the aspect's next turn, the creature reappears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the aspect.

mythic_actions.name: Chromatic Flare (Costs 3 Actions)
mythic_actions.desc: The aspect flares with elemental energy. Each creature of the aspect's choice in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on her must make a 27 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 39 (6d12) damage of a type chosen by the aspect: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

traits.name: Hunger of the Void
traits.desc: When the aspirant is reduced to 0 hit points, its body and everything it is wearing or carrying, except for magic items, are sucked into a void and destroyed. Creatures in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the aspirant must make a 11 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage and is pulled 10 feet straight toward the aspirant's space. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

traits.name: Sinister Devotion
traits.desc: The aspirant has advantage on saving throws against the charmed and frightened conditions.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the assassin vine remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal plant.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. The target takes 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and it is grappled (escape 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and it takes 21 (6d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The vine can constrict only one target at a time.

actions.name: Entangling Vines
actions.desc: The assassin vine can animate normal vines and roots on the ground in a 15-foot square within 30 feet of it. These plants turn the ground in that area into difficult terrain. A creature in that area when the effect begins must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be restrained by entangling vines and roots. A creature restrained by the plants can use its action to make a 13 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing itself on a successful check. The effect ends after 1 minute or when the assassin vine dies or uses Entangling Vines again.

monsters.name: Asteria

traits.name: Guardian Aura
traits.desc: Whenever a creature of Asteria's choice within 30 feet of her makes a saving throw, Asteria can give the creature advantage on the saving throw (no action required). This trait doesn't function if Asteria has the incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Asteria fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Asteria wears Winged Boots, which grant her a flying speed (included in her statistics). She also carries one half of a pair of Sending Stones; the other half of the pair is held by Euryale.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Asteria makes two Radiant Blade attacks and uses Bursting Benediction.

actions.name: Radiant Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Bursting Benediction
actions.desc: Asteria causes a burst of magical energy to envelop one creature she can see within 60 feet of herself. The target must make a 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 (9d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Asteria or another creature that she can see within 60 feet of herself then regains 10 hit points.

bonus_actions.name: Empowering Aegis (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: Asteria summons a spectral version of her shield, which orbits and bolsters one creature of Asteria's choice that she can see within 60 feet of herself. The spectral shield lasts until the start of Asteria's next turn. While the shield is orbiting the creature, the creature has half cover, is immune to the frightened condition, and makes weapon attack rolls with advantage.

legendary_actions.name: Brazen Strike
legendary_actions.desc: Asteria makes one Radiant Blade attack.

legendary_actions.name: Nimble Sprint
legendary_actions.desc: Asteria moves up to her speed. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Asteria uses Spellcasting.

spells: Asteria casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 19):

spells.2/day each: Bless, Freedom of Movement, Greater Restoration, Plane Shift (self only), Protection from Evil and Good, Revivify

monsters.name: Astral Blight
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: While it has at least 1 hit point, the astral blight sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The blight doesn't require air or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The blight makes two Heat-Draining Vine attacks.

actions.name: Heat-Draining Vine
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) radiant damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 13). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 3 (1d6) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. The blight has two vines, each of which can grapple one creature.

monsters.name: Astral Dreadnought
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned

traits.name: Antimagic Cone
traits.desc: The dreadnought's eye creates an area of antimagic, as in the antimagic field spell, in a 150-foot cone. At the start of each of its turns, it decides which way the cone faces. The cone doesn't function while the eye is closed or while the dreadnought is blinded.

traits.name: Astral Entity
traits.desc: The dreadnought can't leave the Astral Plane, nor can it be banished or otherwise transported out of that plane.

traits.name: Demiplanar Donjon
traits.desc: Anything the dreadnought swallows is transported to a demiplane that can be entered by no other means except a wish spell or the dreadnought's Bite and Donjon Visit. A creature can leave the demiplane only by using magic that enables planar travel, such as the plane shift spell. The demiplane resembles a stone cave roughly 1,000 feet in diameter with a ceiling 100 feet high. Like a stomach, it contains the remains of past meals. The dreadnought can't be harmed from within the demiplane. If the dreadnought dies, the demiplane disappears, and everything inside it appears around the dreadnought's corpse. The demiplane is otherwise indestructible.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dreadnought fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Sever Silver Cord
traits.desc: If the dreadnought scores a critical hit against a creature traveling by means of the astral projection spell, the dreadnought can cut the target's silver cord instead of dealing damage.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The dreadnought doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dreadnought makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 36 (5d10 + 9) force damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature and this damage reduces it to 0 hit points or it is incapacitated, the dreadnought swallows it. The swallowed target, along with everything it is wearing and carrying, appears in an unoccupied space on the floor of the Demiplanar Donjon.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 19 (3d6 + 9) force damage.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The dreadnought makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Donjon Visit (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: One Huge or smaller creature that the dreadnought can see within 60 feet of it must succeed on a 19 Charisma saving throw or be teleported to an unoccupied space on the floor of the Demiplanar Donjon. At the end of the target's next turn, it reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

legendary_actions.name: Psychic Projection (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature within 60 feet of the dreadnought must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw, taking 26 (4d10 + 4) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Astral Elf Aristocrat

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the charmed condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: The elf wears a suit of elven chain.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The elf doesn't require sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elf makes two Scimitar attacks and uses Radiant Beam (if available).

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Beam (3/Day)
actions.desc: A magical beam of radiance flashes out from the elf's hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line. Each creature in the line must make a 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus_actions.name: Starlight Step (3/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: The elf magically teleports up to 30 feet, along with anything it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see.

bonus_actions.name: Summon Solar Dragon (1/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: The elf has a 50 percent chance of magically summoning a young solar dragon. A summoned dragon appears in an unoccupied space that the summoner can see, acts on its own initiative count, and is an ally of its summoner. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spells: The elf casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

monsters.name: Astral Elf Commander

traits.name: Fey Ancestry

traits.name: Unusual Nature

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elf makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 22 (4d10) radiant damage.

actions.desc: The elf makes two Morningstar attacks. It can use Rain of Radiance in place of one of these attacks.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) radiant damage.

actions.name: Rain of Radiance

bonus_actions.name: Starlight Step (2/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: The elf magically teleports up to 30 feet, along with anything it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The elf casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the charmed condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

traits.name: Avoidance
traits.desc: If the null is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take half as much damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and half as much damage if it fails.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The null makes two Force Dagger attacks.

actions.name: Force Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) force damage. Hit or Miss: The dagger magically returns to the null's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

bonus_actions.name: Defier's Whim
bonus_actions.desc: The null takes the Dash, Disengage, or Use an Object action.

reactions.name: Nullify Spell (3/Day)
reactions.desc: The null utters a magical word of cancelation to interrupt a creature it can see that is casting a spell. If the spell is 3rd level or lower, it fails and has no effect. If the spell is 4th level or higher, the null makes an Intelligence check (10 + the spell's level). On a successful check, the spell fails and has no effect.

monsters.name: Atropal
monsters.damage_immunities: cold, necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: darkvision 120 ft., truesight 120 ft., passive Perception 14
monsters.languages: understands Celestial but utters only obscene nonsense

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The atropal has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Negative Energy Aura
traits.desc: Creatures within 30 feet of the atropal can't regain hit points, and any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the atropal takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. If the atropal is struck by a vorpal sword, the wielder can cut the atropal's umbilical cord instead of dealing damage. If its umbilical cord is cut, the atropal loses this feature.

traits.name: Turn Resistance Aura
traits.desc: The atropal and any other undead creature within 30 feet of it has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Ray of Cold
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 21 (6d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: The atropal targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The atropal regains a number of hit points equal to half the amount of damage dealt.

actions.name: Summon Wraith (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The atropal summons a wraith which materializes within 30 feet of it in an unoccupied space it can see. The wraith obeys its summoner's commands and can't be controlled by any other creature. The Wraith vanishes when it drops to 0 hit points or when its summoner dies.

legendary_actions.name: Touch
legendary_actions.desc: The atropal makes a touch attack.

legendary_actions.name: Ray of Cold (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The atropal uses its Ray of Cold.

legendary_actions.name: Wail (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The atropal lets out a withering wail. Any creature within 120 feet of the atropal that can hear the wail must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion.

monsters.name: Aurak Draconian

traits.name: Aura of Command
traits.desc: The draconian radiates a commanding presence in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. A draconian in the aura that can see or hear the aurak can't be charmed and has advantage on saving throws made to avoid or end the frightened condition on itself.

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its magical essence lashes out as a ball of lightning at the closest creature within 30 feet of it before arcing out to up to two other creatures within 15 feet of the first. Each creature must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draconian makes three Rend or Energy Ray attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d12 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Energy Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Noxious Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The draconian exhales a 15-foot cone of noxious gas. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 21 (6d6) poison damage and gains 1 level of exhaustion. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, doesn't gain exhaustion, and is immune to all draconians' Noxious Breath for 24 hours.

spells: The draconian casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 14):

monsters.name: Aurelia
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, radiant, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Aurelia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Aurelia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Aurelia makes three longsword attacks and uses Leadership.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (1d8 + 8) slashing damage, or 13 (1d10 + 8) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 27 (6d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Leadership
actions.desc: Aurelia utters a few inspiring words to one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the creature can hear her, it can add a d10 to one attack roll or saving throw it makes before the start of Aurelia's next turn.

actions.name: Warleader's Helix (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +17 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 54 (12d8) radiant damage, and Aurelia can choose another creature she can see within 10 feet of the target. The second creature regains 27 (6d8) hit points.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: Aurelia adds 7 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, Aurelia must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reactions.name: Unyielding
reactions.desc: When Aurelia is subjected to an effect that would move her, knock her prone, or both, she can use her reaction to be neither moved nor knocked prone.

legendary_actions.name: Command Allies
legendary_actions.desc: Aurelia chooses up to three creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. If a chosen creature can see or hear Aurelia, it can immediately use its reaction to make one weapon attack, with advantage on the attack roll.

legendary_actions.name: Longsword Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Aurelia makes one longsword attack.

legendary_actions.name: Frighten Foes (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Aurelia targets up to five creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a 25 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of her until the end of her next turn. Any target within 5 feet of Aurelia has disadvantage on the saving throw.

monsters.name: Aurnozci
monsters.damage_immunities: acid, fire, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Heat Regeneration
traits.desc: If the temperature around it is 100 degrees Fahrenheit or higher, Aurnozci regains 15 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Aurnozci dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Aurnozci fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Aurnozci has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Aurnozci makes one Bite attack and two Tail attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (2d12 + 8) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Mucus Spray (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Aurnozci sprays mucus in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that cone must make a 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: Aurnozci moves up to its speed.

legendary_actions.name: Tail
legendary_actions.desc: Aurnozci makes one Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Aurnozci uses Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Conflagration (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Flames momentarily surround Aurnozci. Each creature within 15 feet of Aurnozci must make a 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: Aurnozci casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 20):

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage. If the aurochs moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone if it is a creature.

monsters.name: Aurumach Rilmani
monsters.damage_resistances: psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The aurumach makes three Manifested Blade or Gleaming Ray attacks.

actions.name: Manifested Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 23 (4d8 + 5) force damage.

actions.name: Gleaming Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +11 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 24 (3d12 + 5) force damage.

bonus_actions.name: Aura of Blades
bonus_actions.desc: The aurumach manifests a spectral, golden aura of blades around itself. While this aura is manifested, each creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the aurumach must make a 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The aura disappears after 1 minute, when the aurumach has the incapacitated condition or dies, or when the aurumach uses a bonus action to end it.

bonus_actions.name: Invoke Weakness (Recharge 5-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The aurumach attempts to use its magic to weaken the defenses of a creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 19 Wisdom saving throw or become cursed until the end of the aurumach's next turn. The next time the aurumach hits the cursed target with a Manifested Blade or Gleaming Ray attack, the target takes an extra 27 (6d8) force damage.

spells: The aurumach casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 19):

spells.1/day each: fly, geas (as an action), slow, suggestion

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The aurumvorax can burrow through solid rock and metal at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The aurumvorax makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature wearing armor of any type, the aurumvorax regains 4 (1d6 + 1) hit points.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 12). Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can't use its Claw attack on another target, and when it moves, it can drag the grappled creature with it, without the aurumvorax's speed being halved.

traits.name: Pack Leader
traits.desc: The aurumvorax's allies have advantage on attack rolls while within 10 feet of the aurumvorax, provided it isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The aurumvorax can burrow through solid rock and metal at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The aurumvorax makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature wearing armor of any type, the aurumvorax gains one of the following benefits of its choice:

actions.name: Frenzy
actions.desc: The aurumvorax has advantage on attack rolls until start of its next turn.

actions.name: Invigorate
actions.desc: The aurumvorax regains 6 (1d8 + 2) hit points.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 14). Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can't use its Claw attack on another target, and when it moves, it can drag the grappled creature with it, without the aurumvorax's speed being halved.

traits.name: Malfunction
traits.desc: Whenever the autognome takes 15 damage or more from a single source and isn't reduced to 0 hit points by that damage, roll a d20 to determine if it suffers a malfunction:

traits.name: 1-10: "All Fine Here!"
traits.desc: No malfunction occurs.

traits.name: 11-12: "My Mind Is Going. I Can Feel It."
traits.desc: The autognome is incapacitated for 1 minute.

traits.name: 13-14: "You've Disarmed Me!"
traits.desc: One of the autognome's arms falls off, reducing the number of Shock attacks it can make by 1 until a creature uses an action to reattach the arm.

traits.name: 15-16: "Who Turned Out the Lights?"
traits.desc: The autognome's head falls off and deactivates, causing the autognome to be blinded and deafened until a creature uses an action to reattach the head, which reactivates it.

traits.name: 17-20: "Have a Magical Day!"
traits.desc: The autognome explodes and is destroyed. Each creature within 20 feet of the exploding autognome must make a 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The autognome doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The autognome makes two Shock attacks.

actions.name: Shock
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. 7 (2d6) lightning damage.

monsters.name: Autumn Eladrin

traits.name: Enchanting Presence
traits.desc:
Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, the charmed creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The eladrin teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Foster Peace
reactions.desc: If a creature charmed by the eladrin hits with an attack roll while within 60 feet of the eladrin, the eladrin magically causes the attack to miss, provided the eladrin can see the attacker.

spells: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

spells.2/day each: cure wounds (as a 5th-level spell), lesser restoration

monsters.name: Avoral Guardinal

traits.name: Dive Attack
traits.desc: If the avoral is flying, dives at least 30 feet in a straight line toward a Medium or smaller creature, and ends within 5 feet of it, that creature must succeed on a 15 Strength saving throw or take 14 (4d6) piercing damage and have the prone condition.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The avoral doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The avoral makes two Talon attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Talon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) radiant damage.

spells: The avoral casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

monsters.name: Awakened Brown Bear
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.languages: one language known by its creator

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Awakened Elk
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.languages: one language known by its creator

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the elk moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Awakened Giant Wasp
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.languages: one language known by its creator

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

monsters.name: Awakened White Moose
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the moose moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
traits.desc: The moose has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The moose makes two attacks: one with its antlers and one with its hooves.

actions.name: Antlers
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Awakened Zurkhwood
monsters.languages: one language known by its creator

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal zurkhwood mushroom.

traits.name: Mute
traits.desc: If the awakened zurkhwood was created by a myconid sovereign, it can't speak.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: The axe of mirabar soldier has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The soldier makes two battleaxe attacks. If it has a handaxe drawn, it can also make a handaxe attack.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Handaxe
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The b'rohg makes four Fist attacks or two Rock attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 23 (4d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hideous Rend
actions.desc: The b'rohg uses all four of its hands to target one Large or smaller creature it can see within 10 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 16 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape 16). Until this grapple ends, the b'rohg can't make Fist attacks or Rock attacks, and the target takes 49 (8d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is ripped into four pieces.

traits.name: Controlled Fall
traits.desc: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage.

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its body turns to stone and releases a petrifying gas. Each creature within 5 feet of the draconian must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or be restrained as it begins to turn to stone. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends; otherwise the creature is petrified for 1 minute. After 1 minute, the body of the draconian crumbles to dust.

traits.name: Draconic Devotion
traits.desc: While the draconian can see a Dragon that isn't hostile to it, the draconian has advantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draconian makes two Shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Babau
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The babau makes two Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting or Weakening Gaze.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

actions.name: Weakening Gaze
actions.desc: The babau targets one creature that it can see within 20 feet of it. The target must make a 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The babau casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 11):

spells.At will: darkness, dispel magic, fear, heat metal, levitate

monsters.name: Bael
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Dread
traits.desc: Any creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 10 feet of Bael must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of him until the start of its next turn. A creature succeeds on this saving throw automatically if Bael wishes it or if he is incapacitated.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Bael fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Bael have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Bael regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Bael dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Bael makes two Hellish Morningstar attacks.

actions.name: Hellish Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 16 (2d8 + 7) force damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Infernal Command
actions.desc: Each of Bael's allies within 60 feet of him can't be charmed or frightened until the end of his next turn.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Bael teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary_actions.name: Fiendish Magic
legendary_actions.desc: Bael uses Spellcasting or Teleport.

legendary_actions.name: Infernal Command
legendary_actions.desc: Bael uses Infernal Command.

legendary_actions.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Bael makes one Hellish Morningstar attack.

spells: Bael casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 21):

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium), charm person, detect magic, invisibility, major image

spells.3/day each: dispel magic, fly, suggestion, wall of fire

monsters.name: Baernaloth
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the baernaloth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The baernaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The baernaloth makes one Anguishing Bite attack and one Claw attack. It can also use Teleport.

actions.name: Anguishing Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the baernaloth's next turn.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Miasma of Discord (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The baernaloth exhales gray vapors that coalesce at a point it can see within 120 feet of itself. The vapors fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point, then vanish. Each non-yugoloth creature in that area must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 35 (10d6) psychic damage and has the charmed condition until the end of its next turn. A creature charmed in this way treats its allies as foes, and the colors of its body and equipment become shades of gray. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Day)
actions.desc: The baernaloth has a 50 percent chance of summoning its choice of 1d4 mezzoloths, 1 arcanaloth, or 1 baernaloth (the mezzoloth and arcanaloth appear in the Monster Manual). A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the baernaloth, acts as an ally of the baernaloth, and can't summon other yugoloths. It remains for 1 minute, until it or the baernaloth dies, or until the baernaloth dismisses it as an action.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The baernaloth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Afflict Despair
reactions.desc: When a creature that the baernaloth can see within 60 feet of itself hits with an attack roll or succeeds on a saving throw, the baernaloth forces the creature to reroll the d20 and use the new result.

reactions.name: Inescapable Pain
reactions.desc: When the baernaloth is damaged by another creature, that creature must make a 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The baernaloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 20):

spells.1/day each: cloudkill, plane shift (self only), scrying (as an action)

monsters.name: Bag Jelly
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (can't see beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The bag jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bag jelly makes two Pseudopod attacks.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d6 + 1) acid damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape 11). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

monsters.name: Bakunawa
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 21

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The bakunawa can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the bakunawa fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bakunawa makes one Bite attack and one Storm Slam attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) lightning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 17 Strength saving throw or be swallowed by the bakunawa. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, and it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the bakunawa. At the start of each of the bakunawa's turns, each swallowed creature takes 10 (3d6) lightning damage.
The bakunawa's gullet can hold up to two creatures at a time.
