If the bakunawa takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a swallowed creature, the bakunawa must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 15 feet of the bakunawa. If the bakunawa dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Storm Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) thunder damage, and the target is pushed up to 10 feet in a horizontal direction away from the bakunawa.

legendary_actions.name: Nimble Glide
legendary_actions.desc: The bakunawa flies or swims up to half its speed. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Slam
legendary_actions.desc: The bakunawa makes one Storm Slam attack.

legendary_actions.name: Lightning Strikes (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The bakunawa arcs lightning at up to two creatures it can see within 60 feet of itself. Each target must succeed on a 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (4d10) lightning damage.

monsters.name: Balhannoth
monsters.senses: blindsight 500 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 16

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
traits.desc: If the balhannoth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The balhannoth makes one Bite attack and two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15) and is moved up to 5 feet toward the balhannoth. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the balhannoth can't use this tentacle against other targets. The balhannoth has four tentacles.

legendary_actions.name: Bite
legendary_actions.desc: The balhannoth makes one Bite attack against one creature it has grappled.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: The balhannoth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary_actions.name: Vanish
legendary_actions.desc: The balhannoth magically becomes invisible for up to 10 minutes or until immediately after it makes an attack roll.

monsters.name: Banderhobb
monsters.languages: understands Common and the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Resonant Connection
traits.desc: If the banderhobb has even a tiny piece of a creature or an object in its possession, such as a lock of hair or a splinter of wood, it knows the most direct route to that creature or object if it is within 1 mile of the banderhobb.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The banderhobb makes one Bite attack and one Tongue attack. It can replace one attack with a use of Shadow Step.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 16) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the banderhobb can't use its Bite attack or Tongue attack on another target.

actions.name: Tongue
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, and the target must make a 16 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled to a space within 5 feet of the banderhobb.

actions.name: Shadow Step
actions.desc: The banderhobb teleports up to 30 feet to an un occupied space of dim light or darkness that it can see.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature grappled by the banderhobb. 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage. The creature is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the banderhobb, and it takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of the banderhobb's turns. A creature reduced to 0 hit points in this way stops taking the necrotic damage and becomes stable.
The banderhobb can have only one creature swallowed at a time. While the banderhobb isn't incapacitated, it can regurgitate the creature at any time (no action required) in a space within 5 feet of it. The creature exits prone. If the banderhobb dies, it likewise regurgitates a swallowed creature.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the banderhobb takes the {@action Hide} action.

monsters.name: Banshee
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Detect Life
traits.desc: The banshee can magically sense the presence of living creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

actions.name: Corrupting Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (3d6 + 2) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Horrifying Visage
actions.desc: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the banshee that can see her must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Wail (1/Day)
actions.desc: The banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 feet of her that can hear her must make a 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success, a creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

monsters.name: Baphomet
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.desc: Baphomet can perfectly recall any path he has traveled, and he is immune to the maze spell.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Baphomet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Baphomet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Baphomet makes one Bite attack, one Gore attack, and one Heartcleaver attack. He also uses Frightful Presence.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d6 + 10) piercing damage. If Baphomet moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 16 (3d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 25 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

actions.name: Heartcleaver
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) force damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc:
Each creature of Baphomet's choice within 120 feet of him and aware of him must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. These later saves have disadvantage if Baphomet is within line of sight of the creature.
If a creature succeeds on any of these saves or the effect ends on it, the creature is immune to Baphomet's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Heartcleaver Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Baphomet makes one Heartcleaver attack.

legendary_actions.name: Charge (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Baphomet moves up to his speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}, then makes a Gore attack.

spells: Baphomet casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 18):

spells.3/day each: dispel magic, dominate beast, maze, wall of stone

monsters.name: Bard

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bard makes two Shortsword or Shortbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Cacophony (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from the bard must make a 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 9 (2d8) thunder damage and is pushed up to 10 feet away from the bard. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

bonus_actions.name: Taunt (2/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: The bard targets one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the bard, the target must succeed on a 12 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bard's next turn.

spells: The bard casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12):

monsters.name: Barghest
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15
monsters.languages: Abyssal, Common, Goblin, Infernal, telepathy 60 ft.

traits.name: Fire Banishment
traits.desc: When the barghest starts its turn engulfed in flames that are at least 10 feet high or wide, it must succeed on a 15 Charisma saving throw or be instantly banished to Gehenna

traits.name: Soul Feeding
traits.desc: The barghest can feed on the corpse of a Fey or Humanoid it killed within the past 10 minutes. This feeding takes at least 1 minute, and it destroys the corpse. The victim's soul is trapped in the barghest for 24 hours, after which time it is digested and the person is incapable of being revived. If the barghest dies before the soul is digested, the soul is released. While a soul is trapped in the barghest, any magic that tries to restore the soul to life has a {@chance 50} chance of failing and being wasted.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The barghest makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: The barghest transforms into a Small goblin or back into its true form. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. The barghest reverts to its true form if it dies.

spells: The barghest casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12):

spells.At will: levitate, minor illusion, pass without trace

monsters.name: Bariaur Wanderer

traits.name: Portal Sense
traits.desc: The bariaur can sense the presence of portals within 30 feet of itself, including inactive portals, and instinctively knows the destination of each one. The bariaur knows the distance and direction to the last portal it used as long as they're on the same plane.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bariaur makes two Barbed Javelin or Shortbow attacks.

actions.name: Barbed Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the bariaur's next turn.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the bariaur moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 4 (1d8) piercing damage if the target doesn't have all its hit points.

bonus_actions.name: Mighty Leap
bonus_actions.desc: The bariaur jumps a distance up to its walking speed.

spells: The bariaur casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

monsters.name: Barlgura
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Critical Role: Call of the Netherdeep
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 15

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the barlgura can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Running Leap
traits.desc: The barlgura's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet when it has a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The barlgura makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its fists.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The barlgura's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 13). The barlgura can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.name: Pitchfork
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.desc: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbows
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, ranged 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Barovian Witch

actions.name: Claws (Requires Alter Self)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage. This attack is magical.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

spells: The witch is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The witch has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): ray of sickness, sleep, Tasha's hideous laughter

traits.name: Stench
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the barrowghast must make a 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the poisoned condition for 1 minute. While poisoned this way, the creature can't regain hit points. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the Stench of all barrowghasts for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The barrowghast makes two Slam attacks. It can replace one Slam attack with a Life Drain attack.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 9 (1d8 + 5) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
A Humanoid slain by this attack immediately rises as a zombie (see the Monster Manual). The zombie acts as an ally of the barrowghast but isn't under its control.

reactions.name: Noxious Wound
reactions.desc: Immediately after the barrowghast takes piercing or slashing damage, poisonous ichor sprays from the wound. Each creature within 5 feet of the barrowghast must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Battleforce Angel
monsters.senses: darkvision 120 ft., truesight 120 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The angel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The angel makes two melee attacks. It also uses Battlefield Inspiration.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage. If the target is within 5 feet of any of the angel's allies, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) radiant damage.

actions.name: Battlefield Inspiration
actions.desc: The angel chooses up to three creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. Until the end of the angel's next turn, each target can add a d4 to its attack rolls and saving throws.

monsters.name: Battlehammer Dwarf
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.desc: The dwarf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: The battlehammer dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dwarf makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Handaxe
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 3 (1d6 + 0) slashing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, ranged 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the beast moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a maul attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Primal Bond
traits.desc: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d8 + 2 + PB slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The beast can breathe both air and water.

traits.name: Primal Bond
traits.desc: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

actions.name: Binding Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 + 2 + PB piercing damage or 1d6 + 2 + PB bludgeoning damage (your choice), and the target is grappled (escape DC equal to your spellcasting save DC). Until this grapple ends, the beast can't use this attack on another target.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Primal Bond
traits.desc: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

actions.name: Shred
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d4 + 3 + PB slashing damage

monsters.name: Beholder
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Antimagic Cone
traits.desc: The beholder's central eye creates an area of antimagic, as in the antimagic field spell, in a 150-foot cone. At the start of each of its turns, the beholder decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active. The area works against the beholder's own eye rays.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (4d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.desc: The beholder shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:

actions.name: 1. Charm Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the beholder for 1 hour, or until the beholder harms the creature.

actions.name: 2. Paralyzing Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 3. Fear Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 4. Slowing Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must succeed on a 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target's speed is halved for 1 minute. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 5. Enervation Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must make a 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: 6. Telekinetic Ray
actions.desc:
If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or the beholder moves it up to 30 feet in any direction. It is restrained by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the beholder's next turn or until the beholder is incapacitated.
If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The beholder can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

actions.name: 7. Sleep Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or fall asleep and remain unconscious for 1 minute. The target awakens if it takes damage or another creature takes an action to wake it. This ray has no effect on constructs and undead.

actions.name: 8. Petrification Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified until freed by the  greater restoration spell or other magic.

actions.name: 9. Disintegration Ray
actions.desc:
If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 45 (10d8) force damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust.
If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.

actions.name: 10. Death Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must succeed on a 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 55 (10d10) necrotic damage. The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 hit points.

legendary_actions.name: Eye Ray
legendary_actions.desc: The beholder uses one random eye ray.

monsters.name: Beholder Zombie
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.languages: understands Deep Speech and Undercommon but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (4d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Ray
actions.desc: The zombie uses a random magical eye ray, choosing a target that it can see within 60 feet of it.

actions.name: 1. Paralyzing Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 2. Fear Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 3. Enervation Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must make a 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: 4. Disintegration Ray
actions.desc:
If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 45 (10d8) force damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust.
If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger nonmagical object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.

monsters.name: Belashyrra
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, prone

traits.name: Alien Mind
traits.desc: If a creature tries to read Belashyrra's thoughts or deals psychic damage to it, that creature must succeed on a 22 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Eye Thief
traits.desc: Belashyrra can see through the eyes of all creatures within 120 feet of it. It can use its Eye Ray through any creature within 120 feet of it, as though it were in that creature's space.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Belashyrra fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Belashyrra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Belashyrra regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Belashyrra dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Teleport
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Belashyrra can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Belashyrra makes two attacks with its claws and uses its Eye Ray once.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (3d6 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Eye Ray
actions.desc: Belashyrra shoots one of the following magical eye rays of its choice, targeting one creature it can see within 120 feet of it:

actions.name: 1. Psyche-Reconstruction Ray
actions.desc: The target must make a 22 Wisdom saving throw, taking 49 (9d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, it dies and transforms into a spectator under Belashyrra's control and acts immediately after Belashyrra in the initiative order. The target can't be returned to its original form by any means short of a wish spell.

actions.name: 2. Domination Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by Belashyrra for 1 minute or until the target takes damage. Belashyrra can issue telepathic commands to the charmed creature (no action required), which it does its best to obey.

actions.name: 3. Mind-Weakening Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 22 Intelligence saving throw or take 36 (8d8) psychic damage and be unable to cast spells or activate magic items for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 4. Blinding Ray
actions.desc: The target and each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw or take 19 (3d12) radiant damage and be blinded for 1 minute. Until this blindness ends, Belyshyrra can see through the blinded creature's eyes. The blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: Belashyrra makes one claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Implant Fear (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Belashyrra targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or take 22 (4d10) psychic damage and immediately use its reaction, if available, to move as far as its speed allows away from Belashyrra.

legendary_actions.name: Rend Reality (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Belashyrra rips at the bonds of reality in its immediate area. Each creature within 10 feet of Belashyrra must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw or take 19 (3d12) force damage and gain one level of exhaustion.

monsters.name: Beledros Witherbloom

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Beledros fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: Beledros doesn't require air, food, or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Beledros makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 14 (1d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (1d6 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is knocked prone.

actions.name: Decaying Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Beledros exhales decaying energy in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 23 Constitution saving throw, taking 39 (6d12) necrotic damage and 39 (6d12) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that takes damage from the breath can't regain hit points until the start of Beledros's next turn.

actions.name: Miasmal Flow
actions.desc: Beledros becomes a swirling cloud of green mist and can move up to half her flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks, then resumes her true form. During this movement, she can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If she moves through a creature, it must succeed on a 23 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned until the end of its next turn. If Beledros ends this move inside an object, she takes 5 (1d10) force damage and is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: Beledros makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Miasmal Flow (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Beledros uses Miasmal Flow.

legendary_actions.name: Teeming with Life (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Beledros magically summons 1d4 pest mascot in unoccupied spaces she can see within 60 feet of herself. The pests obey her commands and take their turns immediately after hers. Any creature, other than a pest, takes 9 (2d8) poison damage if it starts its turn within 5 feet of one or more of these pests. When one of these pests drops to 0 hit points, Beledros regains 9 hit points. These pests disappear after 10 minutes, when Beledros dies, or when she uses this action again.

spells: Beledros casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

spells.1/day each: greater restoration, mass cure wounds, plant growth, revivify, speak with dead

monsters.name: Berbalang

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc:
The berbalang makes one Bite attack and one
Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Spectral Duplicate (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
bonus_actions.desc:
The berbalang creates one spectral duplicate of itself in an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it. While the duplicate exists, the berbalang is unconscious. A berbalang can have only one duplicate at a time. The duplicate disappears when it or the berbalang drops to 0 hit points or when the berbalang dismisses it (no action required).
The duplicate has the same statistics and knowledge as the berbalang, and everything experienced by the duplicate is known by the berbalang. All damage dealt by the duplicate's attacks is psychic damage.

spells: The berbalang casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

monsters.name: Bestial Spirit
monsters.ac: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor)
monsters.speed: 30 ft., climb 30 ft. (land only), fly 60 ft. (air only), swim 30 ft. (water only)

traits.name: Water Breathing (Water Only)
traits.desc: The beast can breathe only underwater.

traits.name: Flyby (Air Only)
traits.desc: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Pack Tactics (Land and Water Only)
traits.desc: The beast has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel piercing damage.

monsters.name: Bheur Hag

traits.name: Control Weather (1/Day)
traits.desc: The hag can cast the control weather spell, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

traits.name: Graystaff Magic
traits.desc: The hag carries a graystaff, a magic staff. The hag can use its flying speed only while astride the staff. If the staff is lost or destroyed, the hag must craft another, which takes a year and a day. Only a bheur hag can use a graystaff

traits.name: Ice Walk
traits.desc: The hag can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check, and difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost the hag extra moment.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hag makes two Slam or Frost Shard attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Frost Shard
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 30 (6d8 + 3) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the hag's next turn.

actions.name: Horrific Feast
actions.desc: The hag feeds on the corpse of one enemy within reach that died within the past minute. Each creature of the hag's choice that is within 60 feet and able to see the feeding must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the hag for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, a creature is incapacitated, can't understand what others say, can't read, and speaks only in gibberish. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the hag's Horrific Feast for the next 24 hours.

spells: While holding or riding the graystaff, the hag casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 14):

spells.1/day each: cone of cold, ice storm, wall of ice

monsters.name: Big Xorn
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.damage_resistances: piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.desc: The xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the xorn doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.desc: The xorn has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

traits.name: Treasure Sense
traits.desc: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The xorn makes three claw attacks and one bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (5d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Biomancer

traits.name: Bolstering Presence
traits.desc: The biomancer magically emanates life-giving energy within 30 feet of itself. Any ally of the biomancer that starts its turn there regains 5 (1d10) hit points.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The biomancer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

spells: The biomancer is a 16th-level Simic spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The biomancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): acid splash, light, mending, poison spray, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, grease, shield

spells.2nd level (3 slots): alter self, darkvision, enlarge/reduce, hold person

spells.3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, dispel magic, haste, protection from energy

spells.5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, creation, hold monster

monsters.name: Black Abishai
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's {@sense darkvision}.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai makes one Bite attack and two Scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) force damage.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the abishai takes the {@action Hide} action.

spells: The abishai casts darkness at a point within 120 feet of it, requiring no spell components or {@status concentration}. Wisdom is its spellcasting ability for this spell. While the spell persists, the abishai can move the area of darkness up to 60 feet as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The guard makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Unyielding
reactions.desc: When the guard is subjected to an effect that would move it, knock it prone, or both, it can use its reaction to be neither moved nor knocked prone.

monsters.name: Black Earth Priest

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The priest makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Unyielding
reactions.desc: When the priest is subjected to an effect that would move it, knock it prone, or both, it can use its reaction to be neither moved nor knocked prone.

spells: The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): acid splash, blade ward, light, mending, mold earth

spells.1st level (4 slots): earth tremor

monsters.name: Black Gauntlet of Bane

traits.name: Aura of Terror
traits.desc: When a hostile creature within 5 feet of the black gauntlet makes an attack roll or a saving throw, it has disadvantage on the roll. Creatures that are immune to the frightened condition are immune to this trait.

traits.name: Tactical Discipline
traits.desc: The black gauntlet has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The black gauntlet makes two attacks with its mace.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Guiding Bolt (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 14 (4d6) radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of the black gauntlet's next turn has advantage. If the black gauntlet casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

spells: The black gauntlet is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): bane, bless, cure wounds, guiding bolt (see "Actions" below)

monsters.name: Black Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft., swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Chromatic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 425 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 105,000 XP (210,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Chromatic Awakening activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 20) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales a blast of energy in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 26 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 78 (12d12) acid damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm beats its wings. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The greatwyrm can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendary_actions.name: Arcane Spear (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm creates four spears of magical force. Each spear hits a creature of the greatwyrm's choice it can see within 120 feet of it, dealing 12 (1d8 + 8) force damage to its target, then disappears.

mythic_actions.desc: If the greatwyrm's Chromatic Awakening trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic_actions.name: Bite
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack.

mythic_actions.name: Chromatic Flare (Costs 2 Actions)
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm flares with elemental energy. Each creature in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on the greatwyrm must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (5d8) acid damage.

monsters.name: Blackguard

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The blackguard makes three attacks, using Glaive, Shortbow, or both.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: Each enemy within 30 feet of the blackguard must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the blackguard for 1 minute. If a frightened target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the blackguard, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Smite
bonus_actions.desc: Immediately after the blackguard hits a target with an attack roll, the blackguard can force that target to make a 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target suffers one of the following effects of the blackguard's choice:

bonus_actions.name: Blind
bonus_actions.desc: The target is blinded for 1 minute. The blinded target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Shove
bonus_actions.desc: The target is pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

spells: The blackguard casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 13):

monsters.name: Bleak Cabal Void Soother

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The void soother makes two Mace or Void Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

actions.name: Void Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +4 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. 9 (2d8) force damage.

bonus_actions.name: Soothing Word (3/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: The void soother speaks a magical word of mercy, healing one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target regains 4 (1d4 + 2) hit points.

spells: The void soother casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12):

spells.1/day each: calm emotions, lesser restoration, remove curse, protection from energy

monsters.name: Blistercoil Weird
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Feed on Fire
traits.desc: If the weird takes fire damage from a spell or other magical effect, its size increases by one category. If there isn't enough room for the weird to increase in size, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available. While the weird is Large or bigger, it makes Strength checks and saving throws with advantage. If the weird starts its turn at Gargantuan size, the weird releases energy in an explosion. Each creature within 30 feet of the weird must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried. The weird's size then becomes Medium.

traits.name: Form of Fire and Water
traits.desc: The weird can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. In addition, the weird can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time the weird enters another creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the burning creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

traits.name: Heated Body
traits.desc: A creature that touches the weird or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The weird sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, or 11 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage if the weird is Large or bigger.

monsters.name: Blood Drinker Vampire
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vampire makes three melee attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the target is humanoid, it must succeed on a 15 Charisma saving throw or be charmed by the vampire for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the target is infatuated with the vampire. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. The vampire can also grapple the target (escape 14) if it is a creature and the vampire has a hand free.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The vampire adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the vampire must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Blood Witch
monsters.languages: Abyssal plus any one language (usually Common)

traits.name: Blood Witch Dance
traits.desc: The witch can use a bonus action to control the movement of one creature cursed by its hex spell that it can see within 30 feet of it. The creature must succeed on a 15 Charisma saving throw or use its reaction to move up to 30 feet in a direction of the witch's choice.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the witch's darkvision.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The witch makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its shortsword.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

spells: The witch's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The witch can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self, detect magic, eldritch blast (at 11th level), false life, levitate (self only), mage armor (self only)

spells.3/day each: hellish rebuke, hex, scorching ray (at 3rd level)

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.desc: The harpy has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.desc: The harpy has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The harpy makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape 17). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the giant can't use this attack on anyone else.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Furious Defense
reactions.desc: After a creature the giant can see is dealt damage by a foe within 20 feet of the giant, the giant makes a chain attack against that foe.

monsters.name: Blue Abishai
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's {@sense darkvision}.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai makes three Bite or Lightning Strike attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Strike
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 36 (8d8) lightning damage.

bonus_actions.name: Teleport
bonus_actions.desc: The abishai teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see.

spells: The abishai casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 20):

spells.At will: disguise self, mage hand, minor illusion

spells.2/day each: charm person, dispel magic, greater invisibility, wall of force

monsters.name: Blue Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft., swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Chromatic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 425 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 105,000 XP (210,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Chromatic Awakening activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 20) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales a blast of energy in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 26 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 78 (12d12) lightning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm beats its wings. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The greatwyrm can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendary_actions.name: Arcane Spear (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm creates four spears of magical force. Each spear hits a creature of the greatwyrm's choice it can see within 120 feet of it, dealing 12 (1d8 + 8) force damage to its target, then disappears.

mythic_actions.desc: If the greatwyrm's Chromatic Awakening trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic_actions.name: Bite
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack.

mythic_actions.name: Chromatic Flare (Costs 2 Actions)
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm flares with elemental energy. Each creature in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on the greatwyrm must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (5d8) lightning damage.

monsters.name: Blue Slaad
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or be infected with a disease called chaos phage. While infected, the target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 10 (3d6) every 24 hours. If the disease reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target instantly transforms into a red slaad or, if it has the ability to cast spells of 3rd level or higher, a green slaad. Only a wish spell can reverse the transformation.

monsters.name: Bodak
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: Abyssal, the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Death Gaze
traits.desc:
When a creature that can see the bodak's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the bodak, the bodak can force it to make a 13 Constitution saving throw if the bodak isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points unless it is immune to the frightened condition. Otherwise, a creature takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage on a failed save.
Unless {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the bodak until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the bodak in the meantime, that creature must immediately make the saving throw.

traits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
traits.desc: The bodak takes 5 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The bodak doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Withering Gaze
actions.desc: One creature that the bodak can see within 60 feet of it must make a 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus_actions.name: Aura of Annihilation
bonus_actions.desc: The bodak activates or deactivates this deathly aura. While active, the aura deals 5 necrotic damage to any creature that ends its turn within 30 feet of the bodak. Undead and Fiends ignore this effect.

monsters.name: Bodytaker Plant
monsters.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 12

traits.name: Podling Link
traits.desc: The plant can see through and communicate telepathically with any of its podlings within 10 miles of it.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: When the plant dies, it returns to life in the place where it died 1d12 months later, unless the ground where it took root is sown with salt or soaked with poison.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The plant doesn't require sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The plant makes three Vine Lash attacks.

actions.name: Vine Lash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape 15). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained. The plant has four vines, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Entrapping Pod
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature grappled by the plant. 22 (4d8 + 4) acid damage, and the target is pulled into the plant's space and enveloped by the pod, and the grapple ends. While enveloped, the target is restrained, and it has total cover against attacks and effects originating outside the pod. The enveloped target must also immediately succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or be stunned by the plant's sapping enzymes until it is removed from the pod or the plant dies. The enveloped target doesn't require air and gains 1 level of exhaustion for each hour it spends in the pod. If the target dies while enveloped, it immediately emerges from the pod as a living podling, wearing or carrying all of the original creature's equipment.
As an action, a creature within 5 feet of the bodytaker plant that is outside the pod can open the pod and pull the target free with a successful 15 Strength check. If the plant dies, the target is no longer restrained and can escape from the pod by spending 10 feet of movement, exiting prone. The plant has one pod, which can envelop one creature at a time.

actions.name: Pummel
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Oil Puddle
actions.desc: The boggle creates a puddle of nonflammable oil. The puddle is 1 inch deep and covers the ground in the boggle's space. The puddle is difficult terrain for all creatures except boggles and lasts for 1 hour. The oil has one of the following additional effects of the boggle's choice:

actions.name: Slippery Oil
actions.desc: Any non-boggle creature that enters the puddle or starts its turn there must succeed on a 11 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

actions.name: Sticky Oil
actions.desc: Any non-boggle creature that enters the puddle or starts its turn there must succeed on a 11 Strength saving throw or be restrained. On its turn, a creature can use an action to try to extricate itself, ending the effect and moving into the nearest unoccupied space of its choice with a successful 11 Strength check.

bonus_actions.name: Boggle Oil
bonus_actions.desc: The boggle excretes nonflammable oil from its pores, giving itself one of the following benefits of its choice until it uses this bonus action again:

bonus_actions.name: Slippery Oil
bonus_actions.desc: The boggle has advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks made to escape bonds and end grapples, and it can move through openings large enough for a Tiny creature without squeezing.

bonus_actions.name: Sticky Oil
bonus_actions.desc: The boggle has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks made to grapple and any ability check made to maintain a hold on another creature, a surface, or an object. The boggle can also climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

bonus_actions.name: Dimensional Rift
bonus_actions.desc: The boggle creates an invisible and immobile rift within an opening or frame it can see within 5 feet of it, provided that the space is no bigger than 10 feet on any side. The dimensional rift bridges the distance between that space and a point within 30 feet of it that the boggle can see or specify by distance and direction (such as "30 feet straight up"). While next to the rift, the boggle can see through it and is considered to be next to the destination as well, and anything the boggle puts through the rift (including a portion of its body) emerges at the destination. Only the boggle can use the rift, and it lasts until the end of the boggle's next turn.

monsters.name: Bone Knight
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil

traits.name: Commander of Bones
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the knight can target one skeleton or zombie it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must obey the knight's commands until the knight dies or until the knight releases it as a bonus action. The knight can command up to twelve undead at a time this way.

traits.name: Master of the Pallid Banner
traits.desc: While within 60 feet of the knight, any undead ally of the knight has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The knight attacks twice with one of its weapons.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

spells: The knight is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, compelled duel, hellish rebuke, wrathful smite

spells.2nd level (3 slots): branding smite, crown of madness, darkness, find steed, magic weapon

monsters.name: Bone Naga (Guardian)
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

spells: The naga is a 5th-level spellcaster (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks) that needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom, and it has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mending, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, shield of faith

monsters.name: Bone Naga (Spirit)

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

spells: The naga is a 5th-level spellcaster (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks) that needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence, and it has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand, minor illusion, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person, sleep

traits.name: Adhesive
traits.desc: The bone whelk can cause Medium or smaller objects to adhere to it. A Medium or smaller creature that touches the bone whelk is grappled by it (escape 10).

traits.name: Death Scream
traits.desc: When the bone whelk dies, it emits a blood-curdling shriek than can be heard out to a range of 120 feet. This shriek causes nonmagical, organic material within 10 feet of the bone whelk to rot. Each creature within 10 feet of the bone whelk when it dies takes 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The bone whelk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Boneclaw
monsters.languages: Common plus one language spoken by its master

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: While its master lives, a destroyed boneclaw gains a new body in 1d10 hours, with all its hit points. The new body appears within 1 mile of the boneclaw's master.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The boneclaw doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The boneclaw makes two Piercing Claw attacks.

actions.name: Piercing Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, the boneclaw can pull the target up to 10 feet toward itself, and the target is grappled (escape 14). The boneclaw has two claws. While a claw grapples a target, the claw can attack only that target.

actions.name: Shadow Jump (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc:
If the boneclaw is in dim light or darkness, each creature of the boneclaw's choice within 15 feet of it must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or take 34 (5d12 + 2) necrotic damage.
The boneclaw then teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It can bring one creature it's grappling, teleporting that creature to an unoccupied space it can see within 5 feet of its destination. The destination spaces of this teleportation must be in dim light or darkness.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the boneclaw takes the {@action Hide} action.

reactions.name: Deadly Reach
reactions.desc: In response to a creature entering a space within 15 feet of it, the boneclaw makes one Piercing Claw attack against that creature.

monsters.name: Boneless
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Compression
traits.desc: The boneless can move through any opening at least 1 inch wide without squeezing. It can also squeeze to fit into a space that a Tiny creature could fit in.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The boneless doesn't require sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The boneless makes two Slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Large or smaller creature, the creature is grappled (escape 13), and the boneless can use Crushing Embrace.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Crushing Embrace
actions.desc: The boneless wraps its body around a Large or smaller creature grappled by it. While the boneless is attached, the target is blinded and is unable to breathe. The target must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw at the start of each of the boneless' turns or take 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If something moves the target, the boneless moves with it. The boneless can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. A creature, including the target, can use its action to try to detach the boneless and force it to move into the nearest unoccupied space, doing so with a successful 13 Strength check. When the boneless dies, it detaches from any creature it is attached to.

monsters.name: Booyahg Booyahg Booyahg

traits.name: Wild Magic
traits.desc: Each time the goblin casts a spell (including cantrips), there is an accompanying surge of wild magic; roll on the {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} table in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB} to determine the wild magic effect.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The goblin is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The goblin has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield

monsters.name: Booyahg Caster

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The goblin can cast a randomly determined {@filter 1st-level wizard spell|spells|level=1|class=wizard} once per day. Intelligence is its spellcasting ability (spell save 10, +2 to hit with spell attacks).

monsters.name: Booyahg Slave of the Archfey

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Misty Escape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: In response to taking damage, the goblin turns invisible and teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains invisible until the start of its next turn or until it attacks, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

spells: The goblin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save 15), requiring no material components:

spells.At will: disguise self, mage armor (self only), silent image, speak with animals

spells: The goblin is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, eldritch blast, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, vicious mockery

spells.5th level (3 slots): blink, charm person, dimension door, dominate beast, faerie fire, fear, hold monster, misty step, phantasmal force, seeming, sleep

monsters.name: Booyahg Slave of the Fiend
monsters.damage_resistances: slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
monsters.languages: any two languages (usually Abyssal or Infernal), Goblin

traits.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: When the goblin makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

spells: The goblin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save 15), requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self, false life, levitate (self only), mage armor (self only), silent image

spells.1/day each: feeblemind, finger of death, plane shift

spells: The goblin is a 17th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

spells.5th level (4 slots): banishment, burning hands, flame strike, hellish rebuke, magic circle, scorching ray, scrying, stinking cloud, suggestion, wall of fire

monsters: Booyahg Slave of the Great Old One

monsters.name: Booyahg Slave of the Great Old One
monsters.languages: any two languages, telepathy 30 ft., Goblin

traits.name: Whispering Aura
traits.desc: At the start of each of the goblin's turns, each creature of its choice within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage, provided that the goblin isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The goblin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save 15), requiring no material components:

spells.At will: detect magic, jump, levitate, mage armor (self only), speak with dead

spells: The goblin is a 14th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): chill touch, eldritch blast, guidance, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

spells.5th level (3 slots): armor of Agathys, arms of Hadar, crown of madness, clairvoyance, contact other plane, detect thoughts, dimension door, dissonant whispers, dominate beast, telekinesis, vampiric touch

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Khurgorbaeyag's Gift
traits.desc: Khurgorbaeyag saw fit to gift this goblin with powers that enable it to dominate others. The goblin has 1d3 other goblin that slavishly obey its orders.

actions.name: Scimitar
