traits.desc: The fensir regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it isn't in sunlight. If the fensir takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the fensir's next turn. The fensir dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
traits.desc: When the fensir starts its turn in sunlight, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or have the petrified condition until the fensir is no longer in sunlight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fensir makes three Battleaxe attacks or two Magic Stone attacks.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Magic Stone
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 15 (2d12 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

actions.name: Mud to Stone (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The fensir lobs a magical mass of mud that splashes all creatures in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the fensir can see within 60 feet of itself. Each non-fensir creature in that area must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (3d8) bludgeoning damage and have the restrained condition as the mud begins to turn to stone. An affected creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends on the creature. On a failed save, the creature has the petrified condition for 24 hours.

spells: The fensir casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

spells.1/day each: create or destroy water, detect magic, pass without trace

monsters.name: Feral Ashenwight
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, unconscious
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ashenwight makes two Necrotic Shard attacks.

actions.name: Necrotic Shard
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Ferrumach Rilmani

traits.name: Bladed Edges
traits.desc: A creature takes 10 (3d6) slashing damage if it starts its turn grappling or being grappled by the ferrumach.

traits.name: Skewering Charge
traits.desc: If the ferrumach moves at least 20 feet in a straight line toward a Large or smaller creature and ends within 5 feet of it, that creature must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or have the grappled condition (escape 18) and take 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ferrumach makes three Sharpened Limb or Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Sharpened Limb
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

spells: The ferrumach casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 14):

monsters.name: Fey Spirit
monsters.ac: 12 + the level of the spell (natural armor)
monsters.languages: Sylvan, understands the languages you speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel piercing damage + 1d6 force damage.

bonus_actions.name: Fey Step
bonus_actions.desc: The fey magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Then one of the following effects occurs, based on the fey's chosen mood:

bonus_actions.name: Fuming
bonus_actions.desc: The fey has advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

bonus_actions.name: Mirthful
bonus_actions.desc: The fey can force one creature it can see within 10 feet of it to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. Unless the save succeeds, the target is charmed by you and the fey for 1 minute or until the target takes any damage.

bonus_actions.name: Tricksy
bonus_actions.desc: The fey can fill a 5-foot cube within 5 feet of it with magical darkness, which lasts until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The feyr doesn't require air.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The feyr makes one Frightful Bite attack and one Tentacle attack.

actions.name: Frightful Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage, and each creature within 10 feet of the feyr that can see it must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the feyr until the end of the feyr's next turn.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage, and the target is grappled (escape 13). Until this grapple ends, the feyr can't use this tentacle against other targets. The feyr has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one creature.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: The feyr becomes invisible until it attacks, uses Nightmare Fuel, or uses a bonus action to become visible.

actions.name: Nightmare Fuel (1/Day)
actions.desc: The feyr targets one unconscious creature it can see within 10 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or take 27 (5d10) psychic damage, and the feyr gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

monsters.name: Fiendish Auger
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, unconscious
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (can't see beyond this radius), passive Perception 11

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The auger deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The auger can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Flaming Drill
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage. If the auger moves at least 20 feet in a straight line toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an additional 11 (2d10) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 17 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

bonus_actions.name: Burst of Heat (Recharge 5-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The auger releases an intense burst of heat in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. This heat spreads around corners. Each creature in this area must make a 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 13 (3d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Fiendish Flesh Golem
monsters.damage_immunities: lightning, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine or silvered
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Berserk
traits.desc: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 100 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points. If the golem's creator is within 60 feet of the berserk golem, the creator can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 100 hit points or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Fiendish Giant Spider
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.desc: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must make a 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

monsters.name: Fiendish Spirit
monsters.ac: 12 + the level of the spell (natural armor)
monsters.speed: 40 ft., climb 40 ft. (demon only), fly 60 ft. (devil only)

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Death Throes (Demon Only)
traits.desc: When the fiend drops to 0 hit points or the spell ends, the fiend explodes, and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC. A creature takes 2d10 + summonSpellLevel fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Devil's Sight (Devil Only)
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the fiend's darkvision.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fiend makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Bite (Demon Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws (Yugoloth Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel slashing damage. Immediately after the attack hits or misses, the fiend can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Hurl Flame (Devil Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. 2d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

monsters.name: Firbolg Primeval Warden

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The firbolg makes two Spear or Fire Lance attacks.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Lance
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) fire damage.

bonus_actions.name: Hidden Step (2/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: The firbolg magically turns invisible until the start of its next turn, until it makes an attack roll, or until it forces someone to make a saving throw.

spells: The firbolg casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 13):

spells.At will: entangle, speak with animals, speak with plants

spells.1/day each: commune with nature (as an action), detect magic, disguise self

monsters.name: Firbolg Wanderer

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The firbolg makes two attacks using Longsword, Bewitching Bolt, or a combination of them.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Bewitching Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 10 (2d6 + 3) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Charisma saving throw or have the charmed condition until the start of the target's next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Duplicitous Movement (1/Day)
bonus_actions.desc:
The firbolg projects an illusory duplicate of itself in an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of itself. The firbolg can then swap places with the illusion. The illusion vanishes after 1 minute, if the firbolg is incapacitated, or if the illusion is more than 120 feet from the firbolg.
As a bonus action on later turns, the firbolg can move the illusion up to 30 feet and can then swap places with it.

spells: The firbolg casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 14):

spells.At will: mage hand, minor illusion, Tasha's hideous laughter

spells.1/day each: detect magic, disguise self, dispel magic, polymorph

monsters.name: Fire Elemental Myrmidon
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: Ignan, one language of its creator's choice

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The myrmidon sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in a 40-foot radius.

traits.name: Water Susceptibility
traits.desc: For every 5 feet the myrmidon moves in 1 foot or more of water, it takes 2 (1d4) cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The myrmidon makes three Scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Fiery Strikes (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 7 (2d6) fire damage.

traits.name: Dual Shields
traits.desc: The giant carries two shields, which together give the giant +3 to its AC (accounted for above).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Fireshield or Rock attacks.

actions.name: Fireshield
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (4d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shield Charge (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The giant moves up to 30 feet in a straight line and can move through the space of any creature smaller than Huge. The first time it enters a creature's space during this move, that creature must succeed on a 21 Strength saving throw or take 36 (8d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage and be pushed up to 30 feet and knocked prone.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Fire Rune
traits.desc:
The giant has a fire rune inscribed on a medallion or some other object in its possession. While holding or wearing the object bearing the rune, the giant can use its Magma Wave action and Furnace Armor bonus action.
The object bearing the rune has AC 15; 40 hit points; and immunity to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. The object regains all its hit points at the end of every turn, but it turns to dust if reduced to 0 hit points or when the giant dies. If the rune is destroyed, the giant can inscribe a fire rune on an object in its possession when it finishes a short or long rest.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes three Forge Hammer attacks or two Heated Rock attacks.

actions.name: Forge Hammer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 24 (5d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage. Hit or Miss: The giant can cause the hammer to emit a burst of heat in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Metal objects in that area glow red-hot until the start of the giant's next turn. Any creature in physical contact with a heated object at the start of its turn must make a 19 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 10 (3d6) fire damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn unless it has immunity to fire damage. The hammer can emit heat in this way only once per turn.

actions.name: Heated Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 19 (3d12) fire damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 21 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. After the giant throws the rock, roll a d6; on a roll of 3 or lower, the giant has no more rocks to throw.

actions.name: Magma Wave (Requires Fire Rune)
actions.desc: The giant emits a wave of magma from its fire rune in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 19 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 36 (8d8) fire damage and has the restrained condition. As an action, a creature can make a 19 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing itself or a creature within its reach from the rock on a success. The rock restraining each creature has AC 17; 20 hit points; and immunity to fire, poison, and psychic damage. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

bonus_actions.name: Furnace Armor (Requires Fire Rune)
bonus_actions.desc: The giant causes smoke and cinders to billow from its armor, filling a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the giant. While the armor is billowing smoke, the giant has half cover. The armor stops billowing smoke after 1 minute, when the giant dies, when the giant uses a bonus action to end the effect, or when the giant's fire rune is destroyed.

traits.name: Shrapnel Explosion
traits.desc: When the giant drops to 0 hit points, its armor explodes, destroying the giant's body and scattering the armor as shrapnel. Creatures within 10 feet of the giant when its armor explodes must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Searing Scepter attacks or two Bolt of Imix attacks.

actions.name: Searing Scepter
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage, and the target is magically branded. While branded in this way, the target becomes visible if it's invisible, can't become invisible, and sheds dim light in a 5-foot radius. The brand disappears after 24 hours, or it can be removed from a creature or an object by any spell that ends a curse.

actions.name: Bolt of Imix
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 20 (3d10 + 4) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or have the frightened condition until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe +2
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 28 (3d12 + 9) slashing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (3d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 21 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage if used with both hands.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The hellion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Soul Taker
traits.desc: A Giant or a Humanoid that is reduced to 0 hit points by the hellion dies, and its soul rises as a lemure (see the Monster Manual) on Avernus, one of the Nine Hells, in 1d4 hours. If the creature isn't revived before then, it can be restored to life only by a wish spell or by killing the lemure and casting true resurrection on the creature's original body.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hellion makes two Morningstar attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the hellion's next turn.

actions.name: Infernal Orb
actions.desc: The hellion hurls a magical ball of fire that explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the hellion can see within 120 feet of itself. The sphere spreads around corners. Each creature in that area must make a 17 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 18 (4d8) fire damage and 18 (4d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Fire Snake
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Heated Body
traits.desc: A creature that touches the snake or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The snake makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

monsters.name: Firefist

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The firefist makes two greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Guided Attack (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: When the firefist or one creature it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll, the firefist grants a +10 bonus to that roll.

spells: The firefist is a 9th-level Boros spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, sacred flame, spare the dying

spells.1st level (4 slots): guiding bolt, healing word, heroism, shield of faith

traits.name: Fire Blood
traits.desc: Whenever a creature within 5 feet of the firegaunt hits the firegaunt with a melee attack that deals piercing or slashing damage, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The firegaunt makes two Heated Maul attacks.

actions.name: Heated Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. The firegaunt can cause the maul to erupt with crimson flames, and the target must succeed on a 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) fire damage and 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The maul can erupt with flames in this way only once per turn.

actions.name: Crimson Rays (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The firegaunt emits beams of fire from its eyes, mouth, and wounds in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a success or failure, that creature catches fire. Until the burning creature or another creature that can reach it takes an action to extinguish the fire, the burning creature can't regain hit points and takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

monsters.name: Firemane Angel
monsters.damage_resistances: fire, radiant, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The angel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the angel takes 21 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The angel makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage, or 11 (1d10 + 6) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 (5d8) fire or radiant damage (angel's choice).

spells: The angel's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The angel can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.3/day each: compelled duel, guiding bolt (as a 5th-level spell)

monsters.name: Firenewt Warlock of Imix

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The firenewt can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the firenewt's {@sense darkvision}.

traits.name: Imix's Blessing
traits.desc: When the firenewt reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the firenewt gains 5 temporary hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The firenewt makes three Morningstar or Fire Ray attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fire Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +4 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) fire damage.

spells: The firenewt casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12):

spells.At will: guidance, light, mage armor, mage hand, prestidigitation

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The firenewt can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The firenewt makes two Scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spit Fire (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The firenewt spits fire at a creature within 10 feet of it. The creature must make a 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: First-Year Student

traits.name: Excited to Be Here
traits.desc: The student has advantage on initiative rolls.

actions.name: Magic Flare
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. 7 (1d12 + 1) force damage.

reactions.name: Beginner's Luck (2/Day)
reactions.desc: When the student fails a saving throw, it can reroll the d20. It must use the new roll.

spells: The student casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 11):

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: The fish can breathe only underwater.

traits.name: Tactical Discipline
traits.desc: The fist of Bane has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Five-Armed Troll
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes six attacks: one with its bite and five with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Flail Snail
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Antimagic Shell
traits.desc:
The snail has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature making a spell attack against the snail has disadvantage on the attack roll.
If the snail succeeds on its saving throw against a spell or a spell's attack roll misses it, the snail's shell converts some of the spell's energy into a burst of destructive force if the spell is of 1st level or higher; each creature within 30 feet of the snail must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 3 (1d6) force damage per level of the spell on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The snail makes five Flail Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Flail Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Scintillating Shell (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The snail's shell emits dazzling, colored light until the end of the snail's next turn. During this time, the shell sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet, and creatures that can see the snail have disadvantage on attack rolls against it. In addition, any creature within the bright light and able to see the snail when this power is activated must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the light ends.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.desc: The flail snail withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to its AC and is restrained. It can emerge from its shell as a bonus action on its turn.

monsters.name: Flameskull
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
The Lost Dungeon of Rickedness: Big Rick Energy
Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
Critical Role: Call of the Netherdeep

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The flameskull sheds either dim light in a 15-foot radius, or bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. It can switch between the options as an action.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The flameskull has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: If the flameskull is destroyed, it regains all its hit points in 1 hour unless holy water is sprinkled on its remains or a dispel magic or remove curse spell is cast on them.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The flameskull uses Fire Ray twice.

actions.name: Fire Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) fire damage.

spells: The flameskull is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no somatic or material components to cast its spells. The flameskull has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand

monsters.name: Flamewrath

traits.name: Wreathed in Flame
traits.desc: For the flamewrath, the warm version of the fire shield spell has a duration of "until dispelled." The fire shield burns for 10 minutes after the flamewrath dies, consuming its body.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The flamewrath is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): control flames

spells.1st level (4 slots): burning hands, color spray, mage armor

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The lion has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.desc: If the lion moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

traits.name: Running Leap
traits.desc: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can long jump up to 25 feet.

traits.name: Spell Turning
traits.desc: The lion has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only the lion (not an area). If the lion's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the lion and instead targets the caster.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lion makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The lion makes one claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Roar (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The lion emits a magical roar. Each creature within 60 feet of the lion that can hear the roar must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the lion until the end of the lion's next turn.

monsters.name: Flesh Colossus
monsters.damage_immunities: lightning, poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Berserk
traits.desc: If the core inside the colossus is destroyed, the colossus goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the colossus attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the colossus attacks an object. Once the colossus goes berserk, it remains berserk until it is destroyed.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The colossus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The colossus makes two Fist attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit (with advantage if the colossus is berserk), reach 20 ft., one target. 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is pulled up to 15 feet toward the colossus, it has the grappled condition (escape 17), and it has the restrained condition until this grapple ends. The colossus can have up to two creatures grappled this way at a time.

actions.name: Elemental Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc:
The colossus exhales a cloud swirling with elemental energy in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 21 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 40 (9d8) damage of a type of the colossus's choosing: acid, cold, fire, or lightning. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.
At the same time as the colossus releases this exhalation, creatures inside the colossus's chest cavity take 40 (9d8) force damage from churning elemental energy.

bonus_actions.name: Bite
bonus_actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature grappled by the colossus. 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the creature is swallowed. A swallowed creature has the restrained condition, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the colossus, and takes 10 (3d6) force damage at the start of each of the colossus's turns.
The colossus's chest cavity can hold up to two creatures at a time. Inside its chest cavity is its core, which is a Large object with AC 16 that is immune to lightning, poison, and psychic damage. It has 140 hit points and sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius. If the core is destroyed, the colossus regurgitates all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within 10 feet of the colossus and has the prone condition, and the colossus can no longer swallow a creature. If the colossus dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting with the prone condition.

monsters.name: Flesh Meld
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (can't see beyond this radius), passive Perception 11

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The flesh meld can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

traits.name: Aura of Death
traits.desc: At the start of each of the flesh meld's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or take 3 (1d6) necrotic damage and have the poisoned condition until the start of the flesh meld's next turn.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The flesh meld has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The flesh meld can climb difficult surfaces, including ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The flesh meld makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape 15) and is pulled up to 15 feet toward the flesh meld.

bonus_actions.name: Consume Creature
bonus_actions.desc:
The flesh meld targets one Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of itself that it's grappling. The target must succeed on a 15 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the flesh meld. The flesh meld can have one creature swallowed at a time.
A swallowed creature no longer has the grappled condition. While swallowed, it has the blinded and restrained conditions, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the flesh meld, and takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of the flesh meld's turns. If this damage reduces a swallowed creature to 0 hit points, the creature dies, and the flesh meld consumes its body.
If the flesh meld takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the flesh meld must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls with the prone condition in a space within 5 feet of the flesh meld. If the flesh meld dies, the swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 10 feet of movement, exiting with the prone condition.

traits.name: Aura of Blood Thirst
traits.desc: If the flind isn't incapacitated, any creature with the Rampage trait can make a Bite attack as a bonus action while within 10 feet of the flind.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The flind makes one Flail of Chaos attack, one Flail of Pain attack, and one Flail of Paralysis attack, or it makes three Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Flail of Chaos
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must use its reaction, if available, to make one melee attack against a random creature, other than the flind, within its reach. If there's no creature within reach, the target instead moves half its speed in a random direction.

actions.name: Flail of Pain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 16 (3d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Flail of Paralysis
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Flitterstep Eidolon
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Blurred Form
traits.desc: Attack rolls against the eidolon are made with disadvantage unless the eidolon is incapacitated.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the eidolon is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the eidolon instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The eidolon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eidolon makes two melee attacks. Immediately before or after one of its attacks, it can use Flitterstep if it is available.

actions.name: Flickering Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Flitterstep (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The eidolon magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it. If it makes an attack immediately after teleporting, it has advantage on the attack roll.

monsters.name: Flumph
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.languages: understands Undercommon but can't speak, telepathy 60 ft.

traits.name: Advanced Telepathy
traits.desc: The flumph can perceive the content of any telepathic communication used within 60 feet of it, and it can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} by creatures with any form of telepathy.

traits.name: Prone Deficiency
traits.desc: If the flumph is knocked prone, roll a die. On an odd result, the flumph lands upside-down and is incapacitated. At the end of each of its turns, the flumph can make a 10 Dexterity saving throw, righting itself and ending the incapacitated condition if it succeeds.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
traits.desc: The flumph is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as all divination spells.

actions.name: Tendrils
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage. At the end of each of its turns, the target must make a 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 2 (1d4) acid damage on a failure or ending the recurring acid damage on a success. A lesser restoration spell cast on the target also ends the recurring acid damage.

actions.name: Stench Spray (1/Day)
actions.desc: Each creature in a 15-foot cone originating from the flumph must succeed on a 10 Dexterity saving throw or be coated in a foul-smelling liquid. A coated creature exudes a horrible stench for 1d4 hours. The coated creature is poisoned as long as the stench lasts, and other creatures are poisoned while with in 5 feet of the coated creature. A creature can remove the stench on itself by using a short rest to bathe in water, alcohol, or vinegar.

monsters.name: Flux Blastseeker

traits.name: Fluxbending Overcast (Recharge 5-6)
traits.desc: The blastseeker can create an additional effect immediately after casting a spell. Roll a d6 to determine the effect: 1-3. The blastseeker teleports, swapping places with a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. 4-6. The blastseeker and each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) thunder damage.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: The blastseeker's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The blastseeker can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components other than its Izzet gear, which doesn't function for others:

spells.1/day each: banishment, cone of cold, dimension door, fireball, ice storm

monsters.name: Fluxcharger
monsters.damage_resistances: thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Amplify Lightning
traits.desc: Whenever a spell that deals lightning damage includes one or more fluxchargers in its area, the spell deals an extra 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fluxcharger makes two slam attacks or uses Arc Lightning twice.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Arc Lightning
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +7 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. 16 (3d10) lightning damage, and lightning jumps from the target to one creature of the fluxcharger's choice that it can see within 30 feet of the target. That second creature must succeed on a 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (3d8) lightning damage. Hit or Miss: The fluxcharger takes 5 (1d10) force damage after resolving the attack.

monsters.name: Flying Dagger
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 7

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: The dagger is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the dagger must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the dagger remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal dagger.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Fear Frenzy
traits.desc: The horror has advantage on attack rolls against frightened creatures.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Frightening Screech (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The horror screeches. Each creature within 30 feet of it that can hear it must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of it for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the horror's Frightening Screech for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The flying monkey has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the monkey's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Familiar
traits.desc: With the DM's permission, the find familiar spell can summon a flying monkey.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Flying Rocking Horse
monsters.speed: 0 ft., fly 40 ft. (only while mounted; hover)
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: If the rocking horse is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the rocking horse move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the rocking horse is animate.

traits.name: Flying Mount
traits.desc: The rocking horse can serve as a mount for a Medium or smaller creature and can fly only while mounted.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The rocking horse doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, and it regains no hit points or Hit Dice at the end of a long rest.

actions.name: Head Butt
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Flying Shield
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 7

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: The shield is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the shield must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the shield remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal shield.

monsters.name: Flying Staff
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 7

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: The staff is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the staff must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the staff remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal staff.

actions.name: Knife
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Flying Trident
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 7

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: The trident is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the trident must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the trident remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal trident.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Fomorian
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fomorian attacks twice with its greatclub or makes one greatclub attack and uses Evil Eye once.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Evil Eye
actions.desc: The fomorian magically forces a creature it can see within 60 feet of it to make a 14 Charisma saving throw. The creature takes 27 (6d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Curse of the Evil Eye (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc:
With a stare, the fomorian uses Evil Eye, but on a failed save, the creature is also cursed with magical deformities. While deformed, the creature has its speed halved and has disadvantage on ability checks, saving throws, and attacks based on Strength or Dexterity.
The transformed creature can repeat the saving throw whenever it finishes a long rest, ending the effect on a success.

traits.name: Contortionist
traits.desc: The fomorian can enter a space large enough for a Large creature without squeezing.

traits.name: Crawling Stance
traits.desc: While the fomorian has the prone condition, crawling does not cost it extra movement. In addition, the prone condition does not grant advantage on attack rolls against the fomorian.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The fomorian can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fomorian makes two Slam attacks and uses Crawling Hex if it is available.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Crawling Hex (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The fomorian targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 31 (7d8) psychic damage, have the prone condition, and become cursed for 1 hour. While cursed this way, the target can't stand up and end the prone condition on itself.

monsters.name: Fomorian Noble

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fomorian makes three Rod attacks.

actions.name: Rod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage.

bonus_actions.name: Beguiling Presence
bonus_actions.desc: The fomorian targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or have the charmed condition for 1 minute. An affected target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns and whenever it takes damage, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target becomes immune to all fomorians' Beguiling Presence for the next 24 hours.

spells: The fomorian casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 17):

spells.At will: mage armor (self only), mage hand, prestidigitation

spells.1/day each: chain lightning, cone of cold (6th-level version), fireball (6th-level version), fly, plane shift (self only)

monsters.name: Fomorian Warlock of the Dark

traits.name: Blood Rune
traits.desc:
The fomorian has a blood rune inscribed on an effigy or some other object in its possession. While holding or wearing the object bearing the rune, the giant can use its Corrupting Hex action and Poisoning Rebuke reaction.
The object bearing the blood rune has AC 15; 30 hit points; and immunity to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. The object regains all its hit points at the end of every turn, but it turns to dust if reduced to 0 hit points or when the fomorian dies. If the rune is destroyed, the fomorian can inscribe a blood rune on an object in its possession when it finishes a short or long rest.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the fomorian's darkvision.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the fomorian fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fomorian makes three Greatclub attacks. If the fomorian has its blood rune, it can replace one of these attacks with a use of Corrupting Hex.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Corrupting Hex (Requires Blood Rune)
actions.desc: The fomorian targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 16 Charisma saving throw or take 27 (6d8) necrotic damage and become cursed for 24 hours. While cursed this way, the target's speed is reduced by half, and if it tries to cast a spell, it must first succeed on a 16 Intelligence check or the spell fails and is wasted.

actions.name: Eldritch Burst
actions.desc: Magical energy explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the fomorian can see within 120 feet of itself. Each creature in that area must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 32 (5d12) force damage and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

bonus_actions.name: Creeping Gloom (Recharge 6)
bonus_actions.desc: The fomorian momentarily conjures grasping darkness in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 120 feet of itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) necrotic damage and have the blinded condition until the end of its next turn.

reactions.name: Poisoning Rebuke (Requires Blood Rune)
reactions.desc: In response to being damaged by a creature the fomorian can see within 60 feet of itself, the fomorian forces that creature to make a 16 Constitution saving throw; on a failed save, the creature has the poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.

spells: The fomorian casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

spells.At will: detect magic, levitate, mage hand, prestidigitation

monsters.name: Four-Armed Gargoyle
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gargoyle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Four-Armed Statue
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The statue has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The statue's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The statue makes four sword attacks.

actions.name: Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Slow (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The statue targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll attacks five times, once with its bite and four times with its claws. If two or more claws hit the same target, the troll rends the target, dealing an extra 2d6 slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Fox
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.desc: The fox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1 piercing damage.

monsters.name: Fractal Mascot
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Relative Density
traits.desc: The fractal can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Quantum Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) force damage, or 6 (2d4 + 1) force damage if the fractal is Medium or bigger.

bonus_actions.name: Augment
bonus_actions.desc: The fractal's size increases by one category. While the fractal is Medium or bigger, it makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. The fractal can become no larger than Huge via this bonus action.

bonus_actions.name: Diminish
bonus_actions.desc: The fractal's size decreases by one category. While the fractal is Tiny, it makes attack rolls, Dexterity checks, and Dexterity saving throws with advantage. The fractal can become no smaller than 1 foot in height via this bonus action.

monsters.name: Fraternity of Order Law Bender

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The law bender makes three Arcane Burst attacks and uses Power of Authority or Spellcasting.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Power of Authority
actions.desc: The law bender targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage and have the incapacitated condition for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the incapacitated condition on itself on a success. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to this law bender's Power of Authority for 24 hours.

bonus_actions.name: Spatial Loophole
bonus_actions.desc: The law bender teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Probability Loophole (3/Day)
reactions.desc: When the law bender or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the law bender can cause the roll to be made with advantage or disadvantage.

spells: The law bender casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

spells.At will: dispel magic, fly, mage armor, mage hand, prestidigitation

monsters.name: Fraz-Urb'luu
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Fraz-Urb'luu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Fraz-Urb'luu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Undetectable
traits.desc: Fraz-Urb'luu can't be targeted by divination magic, perceived through magical scrying sensors, or detected by abilities that sense demons or Fiends.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Fraz-Urb'luu makes one Bite attack and two Fist attacks, and he uses Phantasmal Terror.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (3d6 + 9) force damage.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d8 + 9) force damage.

actions.name: Phantasmal Terror
actions.desc: Fraz-Urb'luu targets one creature he can see within 120 feet of him. The target must succeed on a 23 Wisdom saving throw, or it takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage and is frightened of Fraz-Urb'luu until the end of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Tail
legendary_actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d10 + 9) force damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also grappled (escape 24), and it is restrained until the grapple ends. Fraz-Urb'luu can grapple only one creature with his tail at a time.

legendary_actions.name: Terror (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Fraz-Urb'luu uses Phantasmal Terror.

spells: Fraz-Urb'luu casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 23):

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), detect magic, dispel magic, phantasmal force

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The froghemoth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Shock Susceptibility
traits.desc: If the froghemoth takes lightning damage, it suffers two effects until the end of its next turn: its speed is halved, and it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The froghemoth makes one Bite attack and two Tentacle attacks, and it can use Tongue.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage, and the target is swallowed if it is a Medium or smaller creature. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the froghemoth, and takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the froghemoth's turns.
The froghemoth's gullet can hold up to two creatures at a time. If the froghemoth takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the froghemoth must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls prone in a space within 10 feet of the froghemoth. If the froghemoth dies, any swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 16) if it is a Huge or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the froghemoth can't use this tentacle on another target. The froghemoth has four tentacles.

actions.name: Tongue
actions.desc: The froghemoth targets one Medium or smaller creature that it can see within 20 feet of it. The target must make a 18 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the froghemoth.

monsters.name: Frontline Medic

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

spells: The medic is a 3rd-level Boros spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 11). The medic has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mending, resistance, spare the dying

spells.1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, sanctuary

monsters.name: Frost Druid
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.speed: 40 ft. (wolf form only), burrow 5 ft. (fox form only), climb 30 ft. (goat form only), fly 60 ft. (owl form only)
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft. (beast form only), passive Perception 16

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The druid makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Ice Sickle (Humanoid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

actions.name: Maul (Beast Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc: The druid magically polymorphs into a beast formfox, mountain goat, owl, or wolfor back into its humanoid form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the beast form (the druid's choice). It reverts to its humanoid form when it dies. The druid's statistics are the same in each form, except where noted in this stat block.

spells: The druid is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 14; +6 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, guidance, resistance

spells.1st level (4 slots): animal friendship, fog cloud, speak with animals

spells.2nd level (3 slots): animal messenger, moonbeam, pass without trace

spells.3rd level (3 slots): conjure animals, sleet storm, wind wall

traits.name: Extra Heads
traits.desc: The giant has a {@chance 25} chance of having more than one head. If it has more than one, it has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The giant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the giant takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The giant dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Greataxe or Rock attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 26 (3d12 + 7) slashing damage, or 30 (3d12 + 11) slashing damage while raging.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

bonus_actions.name: Vaprak's Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
bonus_actions.desc: The giant enters a rage. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the giant is incapacitated. While raging, the giant gains the following benefits:

bonus_actions.name: The giant has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
When it makes a melee weapon attack, the giant gains a +4 bonus to the damage roll.
The giant has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

traits.name: Frost Rune
traits.desc:
The giant has a frost rune inscribed on a chunk of ice or some other object in its possession. While holding or wearing the object bearing the rune, the giant can use its Ice Wolves action and Ice Armor reaction.
The object bearing the rune has AC 16; 40 hit points; and immunity to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. The object regains all its hit points at the end of every turn, but it turns to dust if reduced to 0 hit points or when the giant dies. If the rune is destroyed, the giant can inscribe a frost rune on an object in its possession when it finishes a short or long rest.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes three attacks using Greataxe, Freezing Ray, or a combination of them.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Freezing Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 17 (3d8 + 4) cold damage, and the target must make a 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the restrained condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Ice Wolves (Requires Frost Rune)
actions.desc: The giant magically summons 1d4 wolves made of ice (use the winter wolf stat block in the Monster Manual to represent them, but they are Elementals instead of Monstrosities). The wolves appear in unoccupied spaces the giant can see within 30 feet of itself. The wolves take their turn immediately after the giant on the same initiative count, and they obey the giant's commands. The wolves gain a +6 bonus to their attack and damage rolls while they are within 30 feet of the giant. The wolves disappear after 1 minute, when the giant dies, or when the giant uses this action again.

reactions.name: Ice Armor (Requires Frost Rune)
reactions.desc: When a creature the giant can see makes an attack roll against it, the giant can form a coat of ice around itself, granting it a +6 bonus to its AC against that attack. After the attack hits or misses, the ice shatters, and each creature within 5 feet of the giant must succeed on a 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (3d8) cold damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The giant can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Battleaxe attacks and one Harpoon attack.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage, or 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Harpoon
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 50/200 ft., one creature. 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape 16). While the target is grappled this way, its speed isn't reduced, but it can't move farther from the giant. The target takes 5 (1d10) slashing damage if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails. The giant can grapple only one target at a time with its harpoon.

bonus_actions.name: Reel In
bonus_actions.desc: The giant pulls the target grappled by its Harpoon up to 20 feet toward itself.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Frost Giant Skeleton
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The skeleton doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skeleton makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Freezing Stare
actions.desc: The skeleton targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) cold damage and be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Frost Salamander
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Burning Fury
traits.desc:
When the salamander takes fire damage, its
Freezing Breath automatically recharges.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The salamander makes one Bite attack and four Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) cold damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Freezing Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The salamander exhales chill wind in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Frostmourn
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The frostmourn makes one Freezing Touch attack and one Icy Axe attack. It can replace one of these attacks with a Polar Ray attack.

actions.name: Freezing Touch
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 18 (4d8) cold damage plus 18 (4d8) necrotic damage. If this damage would reduce the target to 0 hit points, the target drops to 1 hit point instead and has the petrified condition, turning into a frozen statue.
If the statue takes bludgeoning damage, it shatters, killing the frozen creature. If the statue would take fire damage, it instead takes no damage and thaws, ending the petrification.

actions.name: Icy Axe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Polar Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 31 (5d10 + 4) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

reactions.name: Blizzard Escape
reactions.desc: Immediately after a creature the frostmourn can see hits it with an attack roll, the frostmourn momentarily dissolves into a blizzard, reducing the damage to itself by half. The frostmourn can then magically teleport to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of itself.

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.desc: When the fume drake dies, it explodes in a cloud of noxious fumes. Each creature within 5 feet of the fume drake must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or take 4 (1d8) poison damage.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The fume drake doesn't require food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) fire damage.

actions.name: Scalding Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The fume drake exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Each creature in that area must make a 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Fungal Servant
monsters.damage_immunities: necrotic, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: The languages it knew in life

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The fungal servant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: A destroyed fungal servant gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the fungal servant's heart.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fungal servant can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

actions.name: Rotting Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to spores. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.

actions.name: Dreadful Glare
actions.desc: The fungal servant targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it.
