If the target can see the fungal servant, it must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of the fungal servant's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all fungal servants for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The fungal servant makes one attack with its rotting fist or uses its Dreadful Glare.

legendary_actions.name: Blinding Spores
legendary_actions.desc: Blinding spores swirls magically around the fungal servant. Each creature within 5 feet of the fungal servant must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the creature's next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Blasphemous Word (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The fungal servant utters a blasphemous word. Each non-undead creature within 10 feet of the fungal servant that can hear the magical utterance must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the fungal servant's next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Channel Negative Energy (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The fungal servant magically unleashes negative energy. Creatures within 60 feet of the fungal servant, including ones behind barriers and around corners, can't regain hit points until the end of the fungal servant's next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Whirlwind of Spores (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The fungal servant magically transforms into a whirlwind of spores, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to its normal form. While in whirlwind form, the fungal servant is immune to all damage, and it can't be grappled, petrified, knocked prone, restrained, or stunned. Equipment worn or carried by the fungal servant remain in its possession.

spells: The fungal servant is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The fungal servant has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): sacred flame, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, guiding bolt, shield of faith

traits.name: Chilling Aura
traits.desc: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the fury must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) cold damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The fury has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fury makes two Fist or Rock attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage, or 17 (5d6) cold damage if the target took damage from the fury's Chilling Aura since the end of the fury's last turn.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

bonus_actions.name: Charge
bonus_actions.desc: The fury can move up to its speed toward an enemy it can see.

monsters.name: Gaj
monsters.languages: understands all languages but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gaj makes one Mandibles attack and uses Mind-Probing Antennae or Paralyze (if available).

actions.name: Mandibles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 11). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage at the start of each of the gaj's turns. While it is grappling a creature, the gaj can't use its mandibles to attack other creatures.

actions.name: Mind-Probing Antennae
actions.desc: The gaj targets one creature grappled by it. The target must make a 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage, and the gaj magically pulls one piece of information from the target's mind that the gaj wants to know. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the gaj learns nothing.

actions.name: Paralyze (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The gaj magically targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Galazeth Prismari

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Galazeth fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Galazeth makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 13 (1d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (1d6 + 8) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is knocked prone.

actions.name: Dancing Elements Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Galazeth exhales a blast of flames and ice in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 22 Dexterity saving throw, gaining no benefit from cover (other than total cover) and taking 38 (7d10) fire damage and 38 (7d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: Galazeth makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Lightning Flash (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Galazeth moves up to half his flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks. When he passes within 15 feet of a creature during this move, that creature must succeed on a 22 Dexterity saving throw or take 11 (2d10) lightning damage. A creature can take this damage no more than once during the move.

legendary_actions.name: Flowing Creation (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Galazeth magically summons 1d4 art elemental mascot in unoccupied spaces he can see within 60 feet of himself. The art elementals obey his commands and take their turns immediately after his. Any creature, other than an art elemental, takes 5 (1d10) cold, fire, or lightning damage (Galazeth's choice) if it ends its turn within 5 feet of one or more of these elementals. When one of these elementals drops to 0 hit points, Galazeth can fly up to 20 feet without provoking opportunity attacks. These elementals disappear after 10 minutes, when Galazeth dies, or when he uses this action again.

spells: Galazeth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 23):

spells.1/day each: control water, gust of wind, wall of stone

monsters.name: Galeb Duhr
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.speed: 15 ft. (30 ft. when rolling, 60 ft. rolling downhill)
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 11

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the galeb duhr remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal boulder.

traits.name: Rolling Charge
traits.desc: If the galeb duhr rolls at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Animate Boulders (1/Day)
actions.desc: The galeb duhr magically animates up to two boulders it can see within 60 feet of it. A boulder has statistics like those of a galeb duhr, except it has Intelligence 1 and Charisma 1, it can't be charmed or frightened, and it lacks this action option. A boulder remains animated as long as the galeb duhr maintains {@status concentration}, up to 1 minute (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

monsters.name: Gallows Speaker
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monsters.languages: any languages its component spirits knew in life

traits.name: Divination Senses
traits.desc: The gallows speaker can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane and vice versa.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The gallows speaker can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends it turn inside an object.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The gallows speaker doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Foretelling Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage, and the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the next attack roll or saving throw it makes before the start of the gallows speaker's next turn.

actions.name: Suffering Echoes
actions.desc: The gallows speaker targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 19 (3d12) psychic damage, and waves of painful memories leap from the target to up to three other creatures of the gallows speaker's choice that are within 30 feet of the target, each of which takes 13 (3d8) psychic damage.

monsters.name: Galvan Magen
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Fiery End
traits.desc: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The magen makes two Shocking Touch attacks.

actions.name: Shocking Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target (the magen has advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal). 7 (1d6 + 4) lightning damage.

actions.name: Static Discharge (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The magen discharges a lightning bolt in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw (with disadvantage if the creature is wearing armor made of metal), taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Galvanic Blastseeker
monsters.languages: Common and Primordial, plus any one language

traits.name: Galvanic Overcast (Recharge 5-6)
traits.desc: When the blastseeker casts lightning bolt or thunderwave, it can roll a die. On an odd number, the blastseeker takes 9 (2d8) force damage. On an even number, the spell also deals 9 (2d8) lightning damage to each target that fails its saving throw.

traits.name: Heart of the Storm
traits.desc: When the blastseeker casts lightning bolt or thunderwave, all other creatures within 10 feet of the blastseeker each take 3 lightning damage.

traits.name: Gust-Propelled Leap
traits.desc: The blastseeker can use a bonus action to fly up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage, or 4 (1d8) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

spells: The blastseeker's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The blastseeker can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components other than its Izzet gear, which doesn't function for others:

monsters.name: Galvanice Weird
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.desc: When the galvanice weird dies, it explodes in a burst of ice and lightning. Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding weird must make a 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or lose the ability to use reactions until the start of the weird's next turn.

traits.name: Weird Aura
traits.desc: At the start of each of the gargantua's turns, each creature of the gargantua's choice within 30 feet of it must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target sees the gargantua as a manifestation of the target's worst fears; it takes 17 (5d6) psychic damage and has the frightened condition until the start of the target's next turn. On a successful save, a target is immune to this gargantua's Weird Aura for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gargantua makes two Slam or Rock attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 27 (3d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +15 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 24 (3d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

bonus_actions.name: Baleful Hex
bonus_actions.desc: The gargantua curses one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 19 Wisdom saving throw or have the incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Teleport
bonus_actions.desc: The gargantua teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space that it can see within 120 feet of itself.

reactions.name: Flick
reactions.desc: Immediately after the gargantua takes damage from a Large or smaller creature it can see within 20 feet of itself, it attempts to flick the creature away. The target must succeed on a 23 Strength saving throw, or the target takes 18 (3d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage, is pushed horizontally up to 100 feet away from the gargantua, and has the prone condition.

reactions.name: Spell Mimicry (1/Day)
reactions.desc: Immediately after a creature the gargantua can see casts a spell of 5th level or lower, the gargantua tries to copy the spell. That creature must succeed on a 19 Charisma saving throw, or the gargantua immediately casts the same spell at the same level (+11 to hit with spell attacks, spell save 19), requiring no material components and choosing the spell's targets.

monsters.name: Gargantuan Rug of Smothering
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: The rug is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the rug must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: Damage Transfer
traits.desc: While it is grappling a creature, the rug takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the creature grappled by the rug takes the other half.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the rug remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal rug.

actions.name: Smother
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. The creature is grappled (escape 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, blinded, and at risk of suffocating, and the rug can't smother another target. In addition, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Gas Spore
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, prone
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 5

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.desc:
The gas spore explodes when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage and become infected with a disease on a failed save. Creatures immune to the poisoned condition are immune to this disease.
Spores invade an infected creature's system, killing the creature in a number of hours equal to 1d12 + the creature's Constitution score, unless the disease is removed. In half that time, the creature becomes poisoned for the rest of the duration. After the creature dies, it sprouts 2d4 Tiny gas spores that grow to full size in 7 days.

traits.name: Eerie Resemblance
traits.desc: The gas spore resembles a beholder. A creature that can see the gas spore can discern its true nature with a successful 15 Intelligence (Nature) check.

actions.name: Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1 poison damage, and the creature must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or become infected with the disease described in the Death Burst trait.

traits.name: Stunning Gaze
traits.desc:
When a creature that can see the gauth's central eye starts its turn within 30 feet of the gauth, the gauth can force it to make a 14 Wisdom saving throw if the gauth isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. A creature that fails the save is stunned until the start of its next turn.
Unless {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, a creature can avert its eyes at the start of its turn to avoid the saving throw. If the creature does so, it can't see the gauth until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the gauth in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the gauth dies, the magical energy within it explodes, and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 (3d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.desc: The gauth shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (roll three d6s, and reroll duplicates), targeting one to three creatures it can see within 120 feet of it:

actions.name: 1: Devour Magic Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 14 Dexterity saving throw or have one of its magic items lose all magical properties until the start of the gauth's next turn. If the object is a charged item, it also loses 1d4 charges. Determine the affected item randomly, ignoring single-use items such as potions and scrolls.

actions.name: 2: Enervation Ray
actions.desc: The target must make a 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: 3: Fire Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (4d10) fire damage.

actions.name: 4: Paralyzing Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 5: Pushing Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet away from the gauth and have its speed halved until the start of the gauth's next turn.

actions.name: 6: Sleep Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or fall asleep and remain unconscious for 1 minute. The target awakens if it takes damage or another creature takes an action to wake it. This ray has no effect on Constructs and Undead.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.desc: The gazer can mimic simple sounds of speech it has heard, in any language. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.desc: The gazer shoots two of the following magical eye rays at random (roll two d4s, and reroll duplicates), choosing one or two targets it can see within 60 feet of it:

actions.name: 1: Dazing Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the start of the gazer's next turn. While the target is charmed in this way, its speed is halved, and it has disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: 2: Fear Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of the gazer's next turn.

actions.name: 3: Frost Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) cold damage.

actions.name: 4: Telekinetic Ray
actions.desc: If the target is a creature that is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or be moved up to 30 feet directly away from the gazer. If the target is a Tiny object that isn't being worn or carried, the gazer moves it up to 30 feet in any direction. The gazer can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a container.

bonus_actions.name: Aggressive
bonus_actions.desc: The gazer moves up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

monsters.name: Gem Stalker
monsters.languages: telepathy 60 ft. understands Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The gem stalker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The gem stalker doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gem stalker makes four Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Crystal Dart
bonus_actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) force damage, and one of the following effects occurs, determined by the kind of dragon that created the gem stalker:

bonus_actions.name: Amethyst
bonus_actions.desc: The gem stalker can teleport to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it.

bonus_actions.name: Crystal
bonus_actions.desc: The gem stalker gains a number of temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

bonus_actions.name: Emerald
bonus_actions.desc: The target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the next attack roll it makes before the start of the gem stalker's next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Sapphire
bonus_actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be pushed horizontally up to 10 feet away from the gem stalker and be knocked prone.

bonus_actions.name: Topaz
bonus_actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the gem stalker's next turn.

reactions.name: Protective Link
reactions.desc: When another creature the gem stalker can see within 30 feet of it is about to take damage, the gem stalker reduces that damage by 10 (3d6). The gem stalker then takes damage equal to that amount.

monsters.name: Geryon
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Geryon fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Geryon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Geryon regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Geryon dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Geryon makes one Claw attack and one Stinger attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 23 (4d6 + 9) cold damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (24), and it is restrained until the grapple ends. Geryon can grapple one creature at a time. If the target is already grappled by Geryon, the target takes an extra 27 (6d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Stinger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. 14 (2d4 + 9) force damage, and the target must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (2d12) poison damage and become poisoned until it finishes a short or long rest. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the poison damage taken. This reduction lasts until the poisoned condition is removed. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Geryon teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary_actions.name: Infernal Glare
legendary_actions.desc: Geryon targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a 23 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of Geryon until the end of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Geryon uses Teleport.

legendary_actions.name: Swift Sting (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Geryon makes one Stinger attack.

spells: Geryon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 21):

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), detect magic, ice storm, invisibility (self only), locate object, suggestion, wall of ice

monsters.name: Ghost Dragon
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 24

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The ghost dragon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the ghost dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The ghost dragon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ghost dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 32 (6d8 + 5) cold damage, and the target's speed is halved until the start of the dragon's next turn.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Terrifying Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc:
The ghost dragon exhales shadowy mist in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 40 (9d8) cold damage and is frightened of the ghost dragon for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't frightened.
While frightened of the ghost dragon, a creature is paralyzed. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to this ghost dragon's Terrifying Breath for the next 24 hours.

monsters.name: Ghostblade Eidolon
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Blurred Form
traits.desc: Attack rolls against the eidolon are made with disadvantage unless the eidolon is incapacitated.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The eidolon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eidolon makes two ghostblade attacks.

actions.name: Ghostblade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage.

actions.name: Peck
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn. On a failed save, the target begins to hallucinate and is afflicted with a {@table short-term madness|DMG} effect (determined randomly or by the DM; see "Madness" in chapter 8 of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness}). The effect lasts 10 minutes.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The giant crayfish can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant crayfish makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 12). The crayfish has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

traits.name: Drone
traits.desc: When it beats its wings, the dragonfly emits a loud droning sound that can be heard out to a range of 120 feet.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.desc: The dragonfly halves the damage it takes from an attack made against it, provided it can see the attacker.

monsters.name: Giant Flying Spider
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.desc: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

actions.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

monsters.name: Giant Four-Armed Gargoyle
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gargoyle makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Giant Goose
monsters.languages: understands Giant and Sylvan but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The goose makes one Beak attack and two Wing attacks.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Wing
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

actions.name: Thunderous Honk (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The goose honks with ear-splitting volume. Each other creature within 30 feet of the goose must make a 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 16 (3d10) thunder damage and has the deafened condition until the start of the goose's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. The honk can be heard within 300 feet.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The toad can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Cold Aura
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the toad takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the toad can't bite another target.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature the toad is grappling. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage and 11 (2d10) cold damage at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: The eel can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eel makes two bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Jolt (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: One creature the eel touches within 5 feet of it outside water, or each creature within 15 feet of it in a body of water, must make a 12 Constitution saving throw. On failed save, a target takes 13 (3d8) lightning damage. If the target takes any of this damage, the target is stunned until the end of the eel's next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

traits.name: Lynx's Sight (1/Day)
traits.desc: The lynx can cast clairvoyance, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

traits.name: Woodland Camouflage
traits.desc: The lynx has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in undergrowth or snowy terrain.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the lynx moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. If the target has the prone condition, the lynx can make another Claws attack against it as a bonus action.

monsters.name: Giant Mutated Drow
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The drow has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drow makes two morningstar attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The drow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). The drow can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Giant Ox
monsters.languages: understands Giant and Sylvan but can't speak

traits.name: Beast of Burden
traits.desc: The ox is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage. If the ox moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage, and it must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The ram has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage. If the ram moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

actions.name: Force Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +4 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. 7 (2d6) force damage.

reactions.name: Absorbent Fleece (Recharge 6)
reactions.desc: Immediately after the ram succeeds on a saving throw against a spell or a spell's attack misses it, the ram can make one Force Bolt attack.

traits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
traits.desc: The raven has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The raven has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the raven's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The raven makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Camouflage
traits.desc: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

actions.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: The eel can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.desc: The giant shark skeleton has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the skeleton is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The skeleton has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Turn Immunity
traits.desc: The skeleton is immune to effects that turn undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skeleton makes three scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

traits.name: Salt Osmosis
traits.desc: Whenever the snail starts its turn in contact with a pound or more of salt, it takes 1d4 necrotic damage. Using an action to sprinkle a pound of salt on the snail deals 1d4 necrotic damage to it immediately and another 1d4 necrotic damage to it at the start of its next turn (after which the salt rubs off), provided the snail has not withdrawn into its shell.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.desc: The snail withdraws into its shell, gaining a +4 bonus to its AC until it emerges. It can emerge from its shell as a bonus action on its turn.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The turtle can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Stable
traits.desc: Whenever an effect knocks the turtle prone, it can make a 10 Constitution saving throw to avoid being knocked prone. A prone turtle is upside down. To stand up, it must succeed on a 10 Dexterity check on its turn and then use all its movement for that turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Fire Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the giant strider is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to half the fire damage dealt.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fire Burst (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The giant strider hurls a gout of flame at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners, and it ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lizard makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. One attack can be replaced by Swallow.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the lizard can't bite another target.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature the lizard is grappling. 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage. The target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the lizard, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the lizard's turns. The lizard can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If the lizard dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting prone.

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The swan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The swan makes two attacks with its beak.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Proboscis
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the tick attaches to the target. While attached, the tick can't make Proboscis attacks. The tick can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. As an action, a creature within reach of the tick can try to detach the tick, doing so with a successful 13 Strength check.

actions.name: Blood Drain
actions.desc: The tick deals 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage to one creature it is physically attached to, provided that creature isn't a Construct or an Undead, or 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage if the creature is a Giant. The tick regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

monsters.name: Giant Walrus
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The walrus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The walrus makes two attacks: one with its body flop and one with its tusks.

actions.name: Body Flop
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tusks
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The whirlwyrm makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. 17 (2d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape 16) if the whirlwyrm isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is restrained until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Thunder Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The whirlwyrm exhales a line of thunder that is 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc:
The whirlwyrm makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the whirlwyrm, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the whirlwyrm's turns. A whirlwyrm can have only one creature swallowed at a time.
If the whirlwyrm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the whirlwyrm must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within 10 feet of the whirlwyrm. If the whirlwyrm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: The eel can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Firearms Knowledge
traits.desc: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of muskets and pistols.

traits.name: Headfirst Charge
traits.desc: The giff can try to knock a creature over; if the giff moves at least 20 feet in a straight line and ends within 5 feet of a Large or smaller creature, that creature must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or take 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giff makes two Longsword, Musket, or Pistol attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Musket
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Pistol
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.desc: The giff throws a grenade up to 60 feet, and the grenade explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Firearms Knowledge
traits.desc: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of any firearm.

traits.name: Steady as She Goes
traits.desc: On the deck of a ship, the giff has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone or shove it overboard.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giff makes two Longsword or Musket attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Musket
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Force Grenade
actions.desc: The giff throws a grenade up to 60 feet, and the grenade explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After the giff throws the grenade, roll a d6; on a roll of 4 or lower, the giff has no more grenades to throw.

traits.name: Firearms Knowledge
traits.desc: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of any firearm.

traits.name: Headfirst Charge
traits.desc: If the giff moves at least 20 feet in a straight line and ends within 5 feet of a Large or smaller creature, that creature must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or take 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The giff deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giff makes two Greatsword or Musket attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Musket
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. 15 (2d12 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Thunder Bomb
actions.desc: The giff lights a grapefruit-sized bomb and throws it at a point up to 60 feet away, where it explodes. Each creature within a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After the giff throws the bomb, roll a d6; on a roll of 4 or lower, the giff has no more bombs to throw.

actions.name: Mandibles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 21 (4d6 + 7) slashing damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape 17). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 21 (4d6 + 7) slashing damage at the start of each of the gigant's turns. While the gigant is grappling a target, it can't use Mandibles against other targets.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 17 (3d6 + 7) slashing damage, and the target is pulled 10 feet straight toward the gigant.

actions.name: Scale Dust (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The gigant releases magical dust from its wings in a 30-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a success or failure, the creature has the poisoned condition for 1 hour. While poisoned this way, the creature can't regain hit points.

bonus_actions.name: Drone
bonus_actions.desc: The gigant produces a horrid droning sound by rapidly beating its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the gigant must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) thunder damage and have the incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn. The gigant can then fly up to half its flying speed.

traits.name: Alternate Forms

One form is an exact duplicate of a Tiny nonmagical object (such as a book, dagger, or gemstone) that its creator is carrying or wearing when the gingwatzim is conjured. The other form can be any Tiny beast. Once these alternate forms are chosen, they can't be changed.

actions.name: Energy Drain (True Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 16 (4d6 + 2) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion. When the target finishes a short or long rest, the target loses every level of exhaustion gained from this attack.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc: The gingwatzim changes from its true forma 3-foot-diameter sphere of luminous ectoplasminto one of its two alternate forms, or from one of those forms back into its true form. In object form, it can't move or make attacks but otherwise retains its statistics, and it is indistinguishable from the thing it is imitating. In beast form, it retains its hit points but otherwise uses the stat block of the beast it is imitating. When it dies, the gingwatzim reverts to its true form and then vanishes.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc:
If the vampire isn't in sunlight, it can use its action to polymorph into a Large hyena or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.
While in hyena form, the vampire can't speak, and its walking speed is 50 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. it is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The vampire doesn't require air.

traits.name: Vampire Weaknesses
traits.desc:
The vampire has the following flaws:
{@i Enraged by Celestial.} If it hears words of Celestial spoken, the vampire must try to attack the source of those spoken words on its next turn. If these words come from multiple sources and from opposite directions, the vampire is restrained. Otherwise, it moves to attack what it perceives to be the closest source.
{@i Repulsed by Perfume.} The vampire has disadvantage on melee attack rolls made against any creature wearing perfume or carrying an open container of it.
{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is paralyzed until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: The vampire makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite (Hyena or Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. the target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Claws (Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Frightful Cackle (Hyena or Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: The vampire emits a bone-chilling cackle. Each creature of the vampire's choice that is within 120 feet of the vampire and can hear its cackle must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the vampire's Frightful Cackle for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Sickening Gaze (Hyena or Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic or be poisoned for 24 hours. A creature whose saving throw is successful is immune to this vampire's Sickening Gaze for 24 hours.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The witherling doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The witherling makes two Bite or Spiked Club attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Spiked Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Rampage
bonus_actions.desc: After the witherling reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll moves up to half its speed and makes one Bite attack.

reactions.name: Vengeful Strike
reactions.desc: In response to a gnoll being reduced to 0 hit points within 30 feet of the witherling, the witherling makes one Bite or Spiked Club attack.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the ceremorph. 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ceremorph kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Laser Pistol
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. 12 (3d6 + 2) radiant damage.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)

Each creature in that area must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The ceremorph's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monsters.name: Gold Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft., swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Metallic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 450 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 120,000 XP (240,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Metallic Awakening activates.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 20) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)

actions.name: Elemental Breath
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales elemental energy in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw, taking 84 (13d12) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Sapping Breath
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales gas in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature falls unconscious for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the end of the greatwyrm's next turn. An unconscious creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically transforms into any creature that is Medium or Small, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the dragon is reduced to 0 hit points or uses its action to end it.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm beats its wings. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The greatwyrm can then fly up to half its flying speed.

mythic_actions.desc: If the greatwyrm's Metallic Awakening trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic_actions.name: Bite
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack.

mythic_actions.name: Shattering Roar (Costs 2 Actions)
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm unleashes a magical roar. Each creature in a 120-foot-radius sphere centered on the greatwyrm must succeed on a 26 Constitution saving throw or take 19 (3d12) thunder damage and be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

spells.Cantrips (at will): poison spray, shillelagh, thorn whip

spells.2nd level (3 slots): pass without trace, ray of enfeeblement, spike growth

spells.3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, dispel magic, plant growth
