traits.desc: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 14 (4d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hobgoblin makes three melee attacks. Alternatively, it can make two ranged attacks with its javelins.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shield Bash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: For 1 minute, the hobgoblin can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin is incapacitated.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The hobgoblin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the hobgoblin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Hollow Dragon
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 23

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the hollow dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Reconstruction
traits.desc: When the hollow dragon is reduced to 0 hit points, its body breaks into nine pieces: two arms, two legs, two wings, a tail, a torso, and a head. Each piece is a Large object with AC 19, 27 hit points, and immunity to psychic and poison damage. After 1d6 days, if all pieces are still within 6 miles of each other, they all teleport to the location of the head piece and merge with it, whereupon the hollow dragon regains all its hit points and becomes active again.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hollow dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks, and it can use Sapping Presence.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sapping Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the hollow dragon's choice within 60 feet of it must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's speed is halved and it has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this hollow dragon's Sapping Presence for 24 hours.

actions.name: Radiant Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The hollow dragon exhales radiant flames in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The hollow dragon makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Ghostly Binding (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The hollow dragon creates ethereal bindings around a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 19 Strength saving throw or be restrained until the end of the dragon's next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Booming Scales (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from the hollow dragon's frame. Each creature within 10 feet of the hollow dragon must make a 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Hollyphant
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Aura of Invulnerability
traits.desc: An invisible aura forms a 10-foot-radius sphere around the hollyphant for as long as it lives. Any spell of 5th level or lower cast from outside the barrier can't affect creatures or objects within it, even if the spell is cast using a higher level spell slot. Such a spell can target creatures and objects within the barrier, but the spell has no effect on them. Similarly, the area within the barrier is excluded from the areas affected by such spells. The hollyphant can use an action to suppress this trait until its {@status concentration} ends (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The hollyphant's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Tusks
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Trumpet (3/Day)
actions.desc: The hollyphant blows air through its trunk, creating a trumpet sound that can be heard out to a range of 600 feet. The trumpet also creates a 30-foot cone of energy that has one of the following effects, chosen by the hollyphant:

actions.name: Trumpet of Blasting
actions.desc: Each creature in the cone must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 17 (5d6) thunder damage and is deafened for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't deafened. Nonmagical objects in the cone that aren't being held or worn take 35 (10d6) thunder damage.

actions.name: Trumpet of Sparkles
actions.desc: Creatures in the cone must make a 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d8 + 4) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Evil creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw. Good creatures in the cone take no damage.

spells: The hollyphant's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.2/day each: bless, cure wounds, protection from evil and good

spells.1/day each: banishment, heal, raise dead, shapechange (into a golden-furred mammoth with feathered wings and a flying speed of 120 ft.), teleport (with no chance of error)

monsters.name: Homunculus Servant
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the homunculus is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.

actions.name: Force Strike
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 30 ft., one target you can see. 1d4 + PB force damage.

reactions.name: Channel Magic
reactions.desc: The homunculus delivers a spell you cast that has a range of touch. The homunculus must be within 120 feet of you.

monsters.name: Hook Horror
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 13

traits.name: Echolocation
traits.desc: The hook horror can't use its blindsight while deafened.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.desc: The hook horror has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hook horror makes two hook attacks.

actions.name: Hook
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Hook Horror Spore Servant
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spore servant makes two hook attacks.

actions.name: Hook
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Horncaller

traits.name: Speak with Beasts
traits.desc: The horncaller can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The horncaller makes two melee attacks with its staff and uses One with the Worldsoul.

actions.name: Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: One with the Worldsoul
actions.desc: The horncaller chooses one beast it can see within 30 feet of it. If the beast can hear the horncaller, the beast uses its reaction to make one melee attack against a target that the horncaller can see.

spells: The horncaller's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 14). The horncaller can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Hound Archon

traits.name: Aura of Menace
traits.desc: As long as the archon doesn't have the incapacitated condition, each creature of the archon's choice that starts its turn within 20 feet of the archon must make a 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the frightened condition until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to all archons' Aura of Menace for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archon makes two Bite attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a Shining Blade attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

actions.name: Shining Blade (True Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) radiant damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The archon teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 120 feet of itself.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: The archon magically transforms into any Medium or Large dog or wolf while retaining its game statistics (other than its size and losing its Shining Blade attack). The archon reverts to its true form if reduced to 0 hit points or if it uses a bonus action to do so.

spells: The archon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability:

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Cloak of Shadows
traits.desc: The hound appears with a number of temporary hit points equal to half your sorcerer level.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The hound can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The hound takes 5 force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Omen Sight
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the hound automatically knows its target's location. If the target was hidden, it is no longer hidden from the hound.

traits.name: Ever at Your Heels
traits.desc: On its turn, it can move only toward its target by the most direct route, and it can use its action only to attack its target. The hound can make opportunity attacks, but only against its target. Additionally, while the hound is within 5 feet of the target, the target has disadvantage on saving throws against any spell you cast. The hound disappears if it is reduced to 0 hit points, if its target is reduced to 0 hit points, or after 5 minutes.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

monsters.name: Howler
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: A howler has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the howler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The howler makes two Rending Bite attacks.

actions.name: Rending Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, plus 22 (4d10) psychic damage if the target is frightened. This attack ignores damage resistance.

actions.name: Mind-Breaking Howl (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The howler emits a keening howl in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or take 16 (3d10) psychic damage and be frightened until the end of the howler's next turn. While a creature is frightened in this way, its speed is halved, and it is incapacitated. A target that successfully saves is immune to the Mind-Breaking Howl of all howlers for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Guiding Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the initiate gains advantage on the next ranged attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The initiate can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Howling Hatred Priest

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The priest can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The priest makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

spells: The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): blade ward, gust

spells.1st level (4 slots): feather fall, shield, witch bolt

traits.name: Banded Claw
traits.desc: On one of its claws, the crab wears a rune-covered copper band that makes it immune to being charmed, frightened, and paralyzed. The copper band is worthless as a treasure, as the magic is keyed to this crab.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The crab can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 27 (4d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled, escape 14. The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

monsters.name: Huge Gray Ooze
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Corrode Metal
traits.desc:
Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the ooze corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative 1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to 5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the ooze is destroyed after dealing damage.
The ooze can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the ooze remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an oily pool or wet rock.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: As an action, it can make two attacks with its pseudopods.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (6d6) acid damage, or 42 (12d6) acid damage while the ooze is enlarged. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative 1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

actions.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: For 1 minute, the ooze magically increases in size. While enlarged, the ooze is Gargantuan, doubles its damage dice with its pseudopod attack, and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage.

actions.name: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The ooze magically turns invisible for up to 1 hour until it attacks, it uses its Enlarge, or its {@status concentration} is broken (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

monsters.name: Huge Ochre Jelly
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The jelly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage.

reactions.name: Split
reactions.desc: When a jelly that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new jellies if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new jelly has hit points equal to half the original jelly's, rounded down. New jellies are one size smaller than the original jelly.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Huge Stone Golem
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slow (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Hulgaz
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Hulgaz fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Hulgaz has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Hulgaz makes two Claw attacks and one Intoxicating Sting attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Intoxicating Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or have the charmed condition until the start of Hulgaz's next turn.

actions.name: Brimstone Vapor (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Hulgaz exhales a 30-foot cone of noxious, scorching-hot vapor. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, a creature takes 31 (7d8) fire damage at the start of each of its turns and has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws. A target can repeat the Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Hulgaz makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Charm
legendary_actions.desc: Hulgaz uses Spellcasting to cast Charm Person.

legendary_actions.name: Curdle Heart (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Hulgaz sours the good feelings of her charmed victims. She chooses any number of creatures she can see who are charmed by her. Each target takes 17 (5d6) psychic damage as the charmed condition applied by Hulgaz ends on it.

spells: Hulgaz casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 18):

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The crab can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Shell Camouflage
traits.desc: While the crab remains motionless with its eyestalks and pincers tucked close to its body, it resembles a natural formation or a pile of detritus. A creature within 30 feet of it can discern its true nature with a successful 15 Intelligence (Nature) check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The crab makes two attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 20 (3d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15). The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target

monsters.name: Hulking Shadow
monsters.damage_immunities: acid, poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Acid Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the shadow is subjected to acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

traits.name: Berserk
traits.desc: Whenever the shadow starts its turn with 60 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the shadow goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the shadow attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the shadow attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the shadow goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The shadow is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The shadow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The shadow's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shadow makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this attack reduces its hit point maximum to 0. The reduction lasts until removed by the  greater restoration spell or other magic.

actions.name: Haste (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Until the end of its next turn, the shadow magically gains a +2 bonus to its AC, has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and can use its slam attack as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the mutate has disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mutate makes two Unarmed Strike or Nightmare Blast attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Nightmare Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 7 (2d6) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or have the frightened condition until the start of the mutate's next turn.

reactions.name: Defensive Flight
reactions.desc: Immediately after taking damage, the mutate flies up to its speed. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

traits.name: Reactive
traits.desc: The giant can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

traits.name: Vigilant
traits.desc: The giant can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes four longsword attacks or two rock attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reactions.name: Deflect Attack
reactions.desc: The giant adds 5 to its AC against one weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, the giant must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Hungry Sorrowsworn
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Life Hunger
traits.desc: If a creature within 60 feet of the sorrowsworn regains hit points, the sorrowsworn gains two benefits until the end of its next turn: it has advantage on attack rolls, and its Bite deals an extra 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a hit.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sorrowsworn makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape 16), and it is restrained until the grapple ends. While grappling a creature, the sorrowsworn can't make a Claw attack.

monsters.name: Hurricane

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While the hurricane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

traits.name: Unarmored Movement
traits.desc: While the hurricane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its walking speed increases by 15 feet (included in its speed).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hurricane makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Deflect Missiles
reactions.desc: When the hurricane is hit by a ranged weapon attack, it reduces the damage from the attack by 1d10 + 9. If the damage is reduced to 0, the hurricane can catch the missile if it is small enough to hold in one hand and the hurricane has at least one hand free.

spells: The hurricane is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): blade ward, gust

spells.1st level (4 slots): feather fall, jump, thunderwave

monsters.name: Hutijin
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Infernal Despair
traits.desc: Each creature within 30 feet of Hutijin that isn't a devil makes saving throws with disadvantage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Hutijin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Hutijin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Hutijin regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Hutijin dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Hutijin makes one Bite attack, one Claw attack, one Mace attack, and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) fire damage. The target must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 10 (3d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) cold damage.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) force damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d10 + 8) thunder damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Hutijin teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

reactions.name: Fearful Voice (Recharge 5-6)
reactions.desc: In response to taking damage, Hutijin utters a dreadful word of power. Each creature within 30 feet of him that isn't a devil must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of him for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that saves against this effect is immune to his Fearful Voice for 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Hutijin makes one Claw, Mace, or Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Hutijin uses Teleport.

legendary_actions.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Hutijin releases lightning in a 30-foot radius, blocked only by total cover. All other creatures in that area must each make a 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: Hutijin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 22):

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), detect magic, hold monster, invisibility (self only), lightning bolt, suggestion, wall of fire

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The hybrid can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hybrid makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hybrid makes two javelin attacks. It can replace one javelin attack with Spit Acid.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spit Acid
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 10 (4d4) acid damage.

traits.name: Assassinate
traits.desc: During its first turn, the hybrid poisoner has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the hybrid scores against a {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} creature is a critical hit.

traits.name: Poisonous Skin
traits.desc: Any creature that touches the hybrid or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Toxic Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. At the end of each of the poisoned target's turns, it must repeat the save, taking 3 (1d6) poison damage on a failed save, or ending the effect on itself on a successful one.

traits.name: Electrified Body
traits.desc: Any creature that touches the hybrid or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The hybrid sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hybrid makes two attacks: one with its shocking touch and one with its tentacles.

actions.name: Shocking Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. The target is grappled (escape 11), and the hybrid pulls the target up to 15 feet straight toward it. Until this grapple ends, the target takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage at the start of each of its turns, and the hybrid shocker can't use its tentacles on another creature.

traits.name: Chameleon Skin
traits.desc: The hybrid has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The hybrid can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hybrid makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Hydroloth
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The hydroloth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The hydroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Secure Memory
traits.desc: The hydroloth is immune to the waters of the River Styx, as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

traits.name: Watery Advantage
traits.desc: While submerged in liquid, the hydroloth has advantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hydroloth makes two Bite or Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) force damage plus 9 (2d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.  14 (2d8 + 5) force damage plus 9 (2d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Steal Memory (1/Day)
actions.desc: The hydroloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target takes 14 (4d6) psychic damage, and it must make a 16 Intelligence saving throw. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to this hydroloth's Steal Memory for 24 hours. On a failed save, the target loses all proficiencies; it can't cast spells; it can't understand language; and if its Intelligence and Charisma scores are higher than 5, they become 5. Each time the target finishes a long rest, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A greater restoration or remove curse spell cast on the target ends this effect early.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The hydroloth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The hydroloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

spells.At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only)

spells.3/day each: control water, crown of madness, fear, suggestion

monsters.name: Hypnos Magen
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak, telepathy 30 ft.

traits.name: Fiery End
traits.desc: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Psychic Lash
actions.desc: The magen's eyes glow silver as it targets one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Suggestion
actions.desc: The magen casts the suggestion spell (save 12), requiring no material components. The target must be a creature that the magen can communicate with telepathically. If it succeeds on its saving throw, the target is immune to this magen's suggestion spell for the next 24 hours. The magen's spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

monsters.name: Hythonia

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Hythonia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Petrifying Gaze
traits.desc: When a creature that can see Hythonia's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of her, Hythonia can force it to make a 18 Constitution saving throw if she isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, on a failed save the creature begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic. Unless {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Hythonia until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Hythonia in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If Hythonia sees herself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of her and in an area of bright light, she is affected by her own gaze.

traits.name: Shed Skin (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If Hythonia is reduced to 0 hit points, she doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, she sheds her skin, regains 199 hit points, and moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Hythonia makes three attacks: one with her claws, one to constrict, and one with her snaky hair.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns, and Hythonia can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Snaky Hair
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 31 (4d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and Hythonia can pull the target up to 5 feet closer to her if it is a Large or smaller creature.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: Hythonia moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Snaky Hair
legendary_actions.desc: Hythonia makes one attack with her snaky hair.

legendary_actions.name: Petrified Earth (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Hythonia causes stone spikes to erupt from the ground in a 30-foot radius centered on her. The area becomes difficult terrain until the start of her next turn. Any creature, other than Hythonia, takes 9 (2d8) piercing damage for every 5 feet it moves on those spikes.

mythic_actions.desc: If Hythonia's mythic trait is active, she can use the options below as legendary actions for 1 hour after using Shed Skin.

mythic_actions.name: Numbing Claws
mythic_actions.desc: Hythonia makes two attacks with her claws. If both attacks hit the same creature, it takes an extra 7 (2d6) poison damage and must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or become paralyzed until the start of her next turn.

mythic_actions.name: Look at Me (Costs 3 Actions)
mythic_actions.desc: Hythonia can force a sighted creature she has grappled to see her eyes and be affected by her gaze.

spells: Hythonia's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 18). She can innately cast animate objects once per day requiring no material components.

monsters.name: Ice Piercer
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 8

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the ice piercer remains motionless on the ceiling, it is indistinguishable from a normal stalactite.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The ice piercer can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Drop
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, one creature directly underneath the piercer. 10 (3d6) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage. Miss: The piercer takes half the normal falling damage for the distance fallen.

monsters.name: Ice Spider
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.desc: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

actions.name: Icy Web (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. The target is restrained by webbing, and takes 1 cold damage at the start of each of its turns. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to poison, and psychic damage).

monsters.name: Ice Spider Queen
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Cold Aura
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spider takes 5 (2d4) cold damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.desc: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

actions.name: Icy Web (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. The target is restrained by webbing, and takes 2 (1d4) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to poison, and psychic damage).

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The toad can breathe air or water.

traits.name: Cold Aura
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the toad takes 3 (1d6) cold damage.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) cold damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it is grappled (escape 11). Until this grapple ends, the toad can't bite another target.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Icewind Kobold
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 1 (1d6 - 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Icewind Kobold Zombie
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The zombie doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Illithilich
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the illithilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed illithilich gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The illithilich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The illithilich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 21 (3d10 + 5) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape 15) and must succeed on a 20 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the lich. 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the lich kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The illithilich magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 18 Intelligence saving throw or take 27 (5d8 + 5) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary_actions.name: Tentacles
legendary_actions.desc: The illithilich makes one attack with its tentacles.

legendary_actions.name: Extract Brain (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The illithilich uses Extract Brain.

legendary_actions.name: Mind Blast (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The illithilich recharges its Mind Blast and uses it.

legendary_actions.name: Cast Spell (Costs 13 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The illithilich uses a spell slot to cast a 1st-, 2nd-, or 3rd-level spell that it has prepared. Doing so costs 1 legendary action per level of the spell.

spells: The illithilich's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 20). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components.
The illithilich is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). The lich has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, magic missile, shield, thunderwave

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, invisibility, Melf's acid arrow, mirror image

spells.3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, counterspell, dispel magic, fireball

monsters.name: Illusionist Wizard

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The illusionist makes two Arcane Burst attacks.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) psychic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Displacement (Recharge 5-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The illusionist projects an illusion that makes the illusionist appear to be standing in a place a few inches from its actual location, causing any creature to have disadvantage on attack rolls against the illusionist. The effect lasts for 1 minute, and it ends early if the illusionist takes damage, if it is incapacitated, or if its speed becomes 0.

spells: The illusionist casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 13):

spells.At will: dancing lights, mage hand, minor illusion

spells.2/day each: disguise self, invisibility, mage armor, major image, phantasmal force, phantom steed

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The monk makes two attacks.

actions.name: Force Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 14 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

monsters.name: Indentured Spirit
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Withering Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage plus 1 poison damage.

monsters.name: Infant Hook Horror
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 13

traits.name: Echolocation
traits.desc: The hook horror can't use its blindsight while deafened.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.desc: The hook horror has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

monsters.name: Infected Elder Brain
monsters.languages: telepathy 1 mile; understands Common, Deep Speech, and Undercommon but can't speak

traits.name: Creature Sense
traits.desc: The elder brain is aware of creatures within 1 mile of itself that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each one's Intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The elder brain has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Telepathic Hub
traits.desc: The elder brain can use its telepathy to initiate and maintain telepathic conversations with up to ten creatures at a time. The elder brain can let those creatures telepathically hear each other while connected in this way.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elder brain makes two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 15 (3d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape 14) and takes 9 (1d8 + 5) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns until the grapple ends. The elder brain can have up to four targets grappled at a time.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Creatures of the elder brain's choice within 60 feet of itself must succeed on a 17 Intelligence saving throw or take 32 (5d10 + 5) psychic damage and have the stunned condition for 1 minute. A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Psychic Link
bonus_actions.desc: The elder brain targets one creature with the incapacitated condition that the elder brain senses with its Creature Sense trait and establishes a psychic link with the target. Until the link ends, the elder brain can perceive everything the target senses. The target becomes aware that something is linked to its mind once it no longer has the incapacitated condition, and the elder brain can terminate the link at any time (no action required). The target can use an action on its turn to attempt to break the link, doing so with a successful 17 Charisma check. If the target breaks the link this way, the target takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage. The link also ends if the target and the elder brain are more than 1 mile apart. The elder brain can form psychic links with up to ten creatures at a time.

spells: The elder brain casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 17):

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the townsperson can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Psychic Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

monsters.name: Initiate of the Comet

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The initiate has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The initiate makes two Comet Strike attacks.

actions.name: Comet Strike
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) force damage.

reactions.name: Moment of Foresight (1/Day)
reactions.desc: When hit by an attack roll, the initiate can force the attacker to reroll it and use the new roll, possibly causing the attack to miss.

spells: The initiate casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 13):

monsters.name: Inkling Mascot
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The inkling can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

actions.name: Blot
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) psychic damage.

actions.name: Ink Spray (1/Day)
actions.desc: The inkling sprays viscous ink at one creature within 15 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the inkling's next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the inkling takes the Hide action.

monsters.name: Inquisitor of the Mind Fire

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The inquisitor attacks twice with its Silver Longsword or uses Mind Fire twice.

actions.name: Silver Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) force damage.

actions.name: Mind Fire
actions.desc: The inquisitor targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 17 (3d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned until the start of the inquisitor's next turn.

actions.name: Inquisitor's Command (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Each creature of the inquisitor's choice that it can see within 60 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the start of the inquisitor's next turn. On the charmed target's turn, the inquisitor can telepathically control the target's move, action, or both. When controlled in this way, the target can take only the Attack (inquisitor chooses the target) or Dash action.

spells: The inquisitor casts one of the following spells, requiring no components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 15):

spells.At will: arcane eye, calm emotions, detect magic, detect thoughts, dispel magic, sending, suggestion

monsters.name: Inquisitor of the Sword

traits.name: Metabolic Control
traits.desc: At the start of each of its turns, the inquisitor regains 10 hit points and can end one condition on itself, provided the inquisitor has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The inquisitor attacks twice with its Silver Longsword. After it hits or misses with an attack, the inquisitor can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Silver Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) force damage.

bonus_actions.name: Blink Step
bonus_actions.desc: The inquisitor teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The inquisitor casts one of the following spells, requiring no components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 15):

spells.At will: detect magic, detect thoughts, dispel magic, sending

monsters.name: Inquisitor of the Tome

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The inquisitor attacks twice.

actions.name: Force Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 22 (4d8 + 4) force damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, the inquisitor can push it up to 10 feet away.

actions.name: Silver Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) force damage.

actions.name: Implode (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the inquisitor can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or take 31 (6d8 + 4) force damage and be knocked prone and moved to the unoccupied space closest to the sphere's center. Large and smaller objects that aren't being worn or carried in the sphere automatically take the damage and are similarly moved.

reactions.name: Telekinetic Deflection
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by an attack roll, the inquisitor increases its AC by 4 against the attack. If this causes the attack to miss, the attacker is hit by the attack instead.

spells: The inquisitor casts one of the following spells, requiring no components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 15):

spells.At will: detect magic, dispel magic, levitate, mage armor, mage hand, sending

monsters.name: Inspired
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Dual Mind
traits.desc: The Inspired has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Inspired makes two crysteel dagger attacks. It can replace one attack with vicious mockery.

actions.name: Crysteel Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) force damage.

actions.name: Vicious Mockery (Cantrip)
actions.desc: The Inspired unleashes a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can hear the Inspired, the target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or take 2 (1d4) psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

spells: The Inspired's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.1/day each: charm person, dissonant whispers, hex, hold person, mage armor

monsters.name: Intellect Devourer
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 12
monsters.languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak, telepathy 60 ft.

traits.name: Detect Sentience
traits.desc: The intellect devourer can sense the presence and location of any creature within 300 feet of it that has an Intelligence of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a mind blank spell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The intellect devourer makes one attack with its claws and uses Devour Intellect.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Devour Intellect
actions.desc: The intellect devourer targets one creature it can see within 10 feet of it that has a brain. The target must succeed on a 12 Intelligence saving throw against this magic or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage. Also on a failure, roll 3d6: If the total equals or exceeds the target's Intelligence score, that score is reduced to 0. The target is stunned until it regains at least one point of Intelligence.

actions.name: Body Thief
actions.desc:
The intellect devourer initiates an Intelligence contest with an incapacitated humanoid within 5 feet of it that isn't protected by protection from evil and good. If it wins the contest, the intellect devourer magically consumes the target's brain, teleports into the target's skull, and takes control of the target's body. While inside a creature, the intellect devourer has total cover against attacks and other effects originating outside its host. The intellect devourer retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as its understanding of Deep Speech, its telepathy, and its traits. It otherwise adopts the target's statistics. It knows everything the creature knew, including spells and languages.
If the host body dies, the intellect devourer must leave it. A protection from evil and good spell cast on the body drives the intellect devourer out. The intellect devourer is also forced out if the target regains its devoured brain by means of a wish. By spending 5 feet of its movement, the intellect devourer can voluntarily leave the body, teleporting to the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The body then dies, unless its brain is restored within 1 round.

monsters.name: Intellect Snare
monsters.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (can't see beyond this radius), passive Perception 13

traits.name: Cacophony of Minds
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the intellect snare must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or have the incapacitated condition for 1 minute. An incapacitated creature can repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this intellect snare's Cacophony of Minds for 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The intellect snare has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The intellect snare makes two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) force damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the target has the grappled condition (escape 17).

bonus_actions.name: Siphon Thoughts
bonus_actions.desc: The intellect snare targets one creature it is grappling. The target must make a 17 Intelligence saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The intellect snare then regains a number of hit points equal to the amount of damage taken.

monsters.name: Intelligent Black Pudding
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8
monsters.languages: Elvish and Undercommon but can't speak

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The pudding can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Corrosive Form
traits.desc: A creature that touches the pudding or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 (1d8) acid damage. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the pudding corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative 1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to 5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal or wood that hits the pudding is destroyed after dealing damage. The pudding can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical wood or metal in 1 round.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The pudding can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) acid damage. In addition, nonmagical armor worn by the target is partly dissolved and takes a permanent and cumulative 1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

reactions.name: Split
reactions.desc: When a pudding that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new puddings if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new pudding has hit points equal to half the original pudding's, rounded down. New puddings are one size smaller than the original pudding.

spells: The pudding's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells, requiring no components:

traits.name: Tactical Discipline
traits.desc: The iron consul has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The iron consul makes one attack with its spear and can use its Voice of Command ability.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Voice of Command
actions.desc: The iron consul selects up to two allies within 90 feet of it that can hear its commands. Each ally can immediately use its reaction to make one melee attack.

monsters.name: Iron Defender
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.desc: The defender has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: While the defender is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or take an extra 3 (1d6) piercing damage and be grappled (escape 13). The defender can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

traits.name: Acidic Blood
traits.desc: When the hydra takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within 5 feet of the hydra takes 9 (2d8) acid damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

traits.name: Multiple Heads
traits.desc: The hydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hydra has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious. Whenever the hydra takes 35 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra dies. At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

traits.name: Reactive Heads
traits.desc: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

traits.name: Wakeful
traits.desc: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Isolde
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Fiendish Blessing
traits.desc: The AC of Isolde includes her Charisma bonus.

traits.name: Magic Resistance Aura
traits.desc: While holding Nepenthe, Isolde creates an aura in a 10-foot radius around her. While this aura is active, Isolde and all creatures friendly to her in the aura have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Isolde makes two melee attacks or uses its Fire Ray twice.

actions.name: Nepenthe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft.., one target. 11 (1d8 + 7) slashing damage, or 12 (1d10 + 7) slashing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the target is a fiend or an undead, it takes an extra 11 (2d10) radiant damage.

actions.name: Fire Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fiendish Charm
actions.desc: One humanoid Isolde can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys Isolde's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from Isolde or another creature or receives a suicidal command from Isolde, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Isolde's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

spells: Isolde's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 14). Isolde can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Isperia
monsters.damage_immunities: psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.desc: Isperia is immune to any effect that would sense her emotions or read her thoughts, as well as any divination spell that she refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain her intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Isperia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Isperia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Isperia makes two claw attacks. She can cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action in place of one claw attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 23 Wisdom saving throw or take 14 (4d6) psychic damage after each attack it makes against Isperia before the start of her next turn.

actions.name: Supreme Legal Authority
actions.desc: Isperia chooses up to three creatures she can see within 90 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a 23 Intelligence saving throw or Isperia chooses an action for that target: Attack, Cast a Spell, Dash, Disengage, Dodge, Help, Hide, Ready, Search, or Use an Object. The affected target can't take that action for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can end the effect on itself with a successful 23 Intelligence saving throw. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to Isperia's Supreme Legal Authority for 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Claw Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Isperia makes one claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Isperia casts a spell of 3rd level or lower from her list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary_actions.name: Supreme Legal Authority (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Isperia uses Supreme Legal Authority.

spells: Isperia's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 23). Isperia can innately cast imprisonment twice per day, requiring no material components.
Isperia is a 15th-level Azorius spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 23, +14 to hit with spell attacks). Isperia has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, resistance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, detect evil and good, ensnaring strike, sanctuary, shield of faith

spells.2nd level (3 slots): arcane lock, augury, calm emotions, hold person, silence, zone of truth

spells.3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, clairvoyance, counterspell, dispel magic, tongues

monsters.name: Istarian Drone
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10
monsters.languages: understands the languages spoken by its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The drone can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The drone doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drone makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) lightning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 15). The drone has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

actions.name: Crystalline Spit (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The drone spits crackling gel in a line 5 feet wide and 20 feet long. Each creature in the line must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 (4d6) lightning damage and is restrained by the gel, which hardens into crystal. The creature is restrained until the crystal is destroyed. The crystal has AC 15, 15 hit points, immunity to poison and psychic damage, and vulnerability to thunder damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't restrained.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Barbed Tail
reactions.desc:
When a creature provokes an opportunity attack from the ixitxachitl, the ixitxachitl can make the following attack instead of using its bite.
Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Ixitxachitl Cleric

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Barbed Tail
reactions.desc:
When a creature provokes an opportunity attack from the ixitxachitl, the ixitxachitl can make the following attack instead of using its bite.
Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

spells: The ixitxachitl is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as its spellcasting ability (spell save 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The ixitxachitl has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): guidance, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person, create or destroy water

monsters.name: Jabberwock
monsters.speed: 30 ft., climb 30 ft., fly 30 ft., swim 30 ft.

traits.name: Confusing Burble
traits.desc: The jabberwock burbles to itself unless it is incapacitated. Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the jabberwock and is able to hear its burbling must make a 18 Charisma saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn, and it rolls a d4 to determine what it does during its current turn:
The creature does nothing.
