If the target is a creature other than an Undead, it must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Raise Ghoul (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The maurezhi targets one dead ghoul or ghast it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is revived with all its hit points.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Disgorge (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The demon vomits in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 11 Dexterity saving throw or take 11 (2d10) acid damage and fall prone in the spew.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The maw has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The maw makes two Bite or Fang Fling attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d12 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fang Fling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. 11 (1d10 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Gorging Charge (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The maw moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks and can move through the spaces of Large or smaller creatures. Each time the maw enters a creature's space for the first time during this move, that creature must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or take 25 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage and have the grappled condition (escape 16); if a creature is already grappled this way, it has the prone condition. Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition. The maw can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

reactions.name: Fanged Rebuke
reactions.desc: In response to taking damage, the maw makes one Bite attack against a random creature within 10 feet of itself. If no creature is within reach, the maw can make two Fang Fling attacks.

actions.name: Garrote
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target of the meazel's size or smaller. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 13 with disadvantage). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the meazel's turns. The meazel can't make weapon attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage

actions.name: Shadow Teleport (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc:
The meazel, any equipment it is wearing or carrying, and any creature it is grappling teleport to an unoccupied space within 500 feet of it, provided that the starting space and the destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination must be a place the meazel has seen before, but it need not be within line of sight. If the destination space is occupied, the teleportation leads to the nearest unoccupied space.
Any other creature the meazel teleports becomes cursed for 1 hour or until the curse is ended by remove curse or greater restoration. Until this curse ends, every Undead and every creature native to the Shadowfell within 300 feet of the cursed creature can sense it, which prevents that creature from hiding from them.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the meazel takes the {@action Hide} action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws. When its fire breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its bite or horns.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Horns
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon head exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d3) piercing damage, and the bird is destroyed by the impact.

traits.name: Petrifying Gaze
traits.desc:
When a creature that can see the medusa's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the medusa, the medusa can force it to make a 14 Constitution saving throw if the medusa isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the  greater restoration spell or other magic.
Unless {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the medusa until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the medusa in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the medusa sees itself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of it and in an area of bright light, the medusa is, due to its curse, affected by its own gaze.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The medusa makes either three melee attacksone with its snake hair, one to constrict, and one with its shortswordor two ranged attacks with its longbow.

actions.name: Snake Hair
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the medusa can't constrict another target.

traits.name: Fear Aura
traits.desc: Any Beast or Humanoid that starts its turn within 10 feet of the meenlock must succeed on a 11 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of the creature's next turn.

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in bright light, the meenlock has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Teleport (Recharge 5-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The meenlock teleports to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of it, provided that both the space it's teleporting from and its destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination need not be within line of sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The megapede makes one Bite attack and uses either Life Drain or Psychic Bomb.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 22 (5d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: The megapede magically drains life energy from other creatures nearby. Each creature within 15 feet of the megapede must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Psychic Bomb
actions.desc: The megapede targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must make a 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 (5d8) psychic damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated.

monsters.name: Meletian Hoplite

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hoplite makes three weapon attacks. It can replace one weapon attack with ray of frost.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Shield Bash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Ray of Frost (Cantrip)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 4 (1d8) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the hoplite's next turn.

spells: The hoplite is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand, minor illusion, ray of frost (see "Actions" below)

spells.1st level (4 slots): color spray, expeditious retreat, sleep

monsters.name: Mercane
monsters.languages: Common, Giant, telepathy 60 ft. (see also Mercane telepathy)

traits.name: Mercane Telepathy
traits.desc: The mercane can communicate telepathically with any other mercane it knows, regardless of the distance between them.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mercane makes three Psi-Imbued Blade attacks.

actions.name: Psi-Imbued Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the mercane until the end of the target's next turn.

spells: The mercane casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 15):

spells.1/day each: dimension door, invisibility, mage armor (self only)

traits.name: Portal Sense
traits.desc: The bloodhound can sense the presence of portals within 30 feet of itself, including inactive portals, and instinctively knows the destination of each portal.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bloodhound makes three Clawed Gauntlet attacks.

actions.name: Clawed Gauntlet
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Marked for Pursuit (3/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: The bloodhound attempts to place a magical mark on a creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 13 Charisma saving throw or become cursed for 24 hours. A creature missing any of its hit points has disadvantage on this saving throw. While cursed in this way, the bloodhound can sense the direction and distance to the target as long as the two are on the same plane of existence. If the target isn't on the same plane, the bloodhound knows what plane the target is on.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The salvager can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The salvager makes two attacks with its coral rapier.

actions.name: Coral Rapier
actions.desc: {@atk m} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Inject Toxin (2/Day)
actions.desc: {@atk m} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the creature must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.desc: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The merfolk scout can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Merregon
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
monsters.languages: understands Infernal but can't speak, telepathy 120 ft.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the merregon's {@sense darkvision}.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The merregon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The merregon makes three Halberd attacks.

actions.name: Halberd
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Loyal Bodyguard
reactions.desc: When another Fiend within 5 feet of the merregon is hit by an attack roll, the merregon causes itself to be hit instead.

monsters.name: Merrenoloth
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The merrenoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The merrenoloth makes one Oar attack and uses Fear Gaze.

actions.name: Oar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) fire damage.

actions.name: Fear Gaze
actions.desc: The merrenoloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the merrenoloth for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Teleport
bonus_actions.desc: The merrenoloth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The merrenoloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 13):

spells.At will: charm person, darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, gust of wind

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The merrow can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The merrow makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Metal Wasp
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

monsters.name: Metallic Peacekeeper
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The peacekeeper is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: While the peacekeeper is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The peacekeeper makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (3d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Calming Mist (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The peacekeeper releases a calming gas in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 14 Charisma saving throw or become charmed by the peacekeeper for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the creature is incapacitated and has a speed of 0.

monsters.name: Metallic Warbler
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The warbler is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: While the warbler is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Calming Mist (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The warbler releases a calming gas in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 11 Charisma saving throw or become charmed by the warbler for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the creature is incapacitated and has a speed of 0.

monsters.name: Mezzoloth
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The mezzoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The mezzoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mezzoloth makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its trident.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage when held with two claws and used to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The mezzoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The mezzoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 11). The mezzoloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Mighty Servant of Leuk-o
monsters.damage_immunities: acid, bludgeoning, cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained, stunned, unconscious
monsters.languages: understands the languages of creatures attuned to it but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Existence
traits.desc: The servant is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form or send it to another plane of existence.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The servant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and spell attacks made against it have disadvantage.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The servant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If it is reduced to 0 hit points, this trait doesn't function until an attuned creature spends 24 hours repairing the artifact or until the artifact is subjected to lightning damage.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The servant's long jump is up to 50 feet and its high jump is up to 25 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The servant doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Destructive Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage. If the target is an object, it takes triple damage.

actions.name: Crushing Leap
actions.desc: If the servant jumps at least 25 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures is pushed to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the servant and must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 26 (4d12) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
traits.desc: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape 10). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

traits.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
traits.desc: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

traits.name: Grappler
traits.desc: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.

monsters.name: Mind Drinker Vampire
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the vampire can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the vampire has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The vampire can also grapple the target (escape 13) if it is a creature and the vampire has a hand free.

actions.name: Mind Siphon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The vampire targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a 14 Intelligence saving throw, with disadvantage if the vampire has previously consumed the target's blood. On a failed save, the target takes 28 (8d6) psychic damage, and the vampire discerns the target's surface emotions and thoughts. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the vampire discerns the target's general emotional state but not its thoughts.

spells: The vampire's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.3/day each: charm person, hold person, mirror image, sleep

monsters.name: Mind Flayer
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Eberron: Rising from the Last War
Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape 15) and must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the mind flayer. The target takes 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The mind flayer magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The mind flayer's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monsters.name: Mind Flayer Arcanist
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape 15) and must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the mind flayer. The target takes 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The mind flayer magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The mind flayer's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
The mind flayer is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The mind flayer has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): blade ward, dancing lights, mage hand, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, disguise self, shield, sleep

monsters.name: Mind Flayer Clairvoyant
monsters.senses: darkvision 120 ft., truesight 15 ft., passive Perception 17

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the mind flayer fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mind flayer makes two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 21 (3d10 + 5) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the grappled condition (escape 17) and must succeed on a 17 Intelligence saving throw or have the incapacitated condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated Humanoid grappled by the mind flayer. 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills it by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Unleash Void (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The mind flayer opens a rift into the Far Realm, centered on a point the mind flayer can see within 60 feet of itself, and a tentacle lashes across creatures near the rift. Each creature other than mind flayers within 30 feet of the rift must make a 17 Intelligence saving throw, after which the tentacle disappears and the rift closes. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) cold damage from the rift plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage from the tentacle and has the stunned condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reactions.name: Warp Reality
reactions.desc: When hit by an attack roll, the mind flayer gains a +4 bonus to its AC against that attack roll, potentially causing it to miss. Then the mind flayer, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, magically teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The mind flayer casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 17):

spells.At will: detect magic, detect thoughts, mage hand (the hand is invisible)

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The nothic has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The nothic makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The nothic magically emits psychic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 12 Intelligence saving throw or take 10 (2d8 + 1) psychic damage and have the stunned condition until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Weird Insight
actions.desc: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must contest its Charisma (Deception) check against the nothic's Wisdom (Insight) check. If the nothic wins, it magically learns one fact or secret about the target. The target automatically wins if it is immune to being charmed.

monsters.name: Mind Flayer Prophet

traits.name: Awareness
traits.desc: The mind flayer has advantage on initiative rolls and can't be surprised as long as it doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 16 (2d10 + 5) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the grappled condition (escape 16) and must succeed on a 16 Intelligence saving throw or have the stunned condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Humanoid grappled by the mind flayer. 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills it by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Whip (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The mind flayer lashes out with psychic energy, targeting up to two creatures it can see within 60 feet of itself. Each target must succeed on a 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 23 (4d8 + 5) psychic damage and have the stunned condition for 1 minute. A stunned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The mind flayer casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

spells.1/day each: dominate monster, plane shift (self only), true seeing

monsters.name: Mind Flayer Psion

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape 15) and must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the mind flayer. The target takes 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The mind flayer magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The mind flayer is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 15; +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person, command, comprehend languages, sanctuary

spells.2nd level (3 slots): crown of madness, phantasmal force, see invisibility

spells.At will: guidance, mage hand, vicious mockery, true strike, detect thoughts, levitate

monsters.name: Mind Mage

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: The mage wears a Spies' Murmur (see chapter 5).

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The mage's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.3/day each: charm person, detect thoughts, mage armor, sleep, suggestion

spells.1/day each: dominate person, mass suggestion, modify memory

monsters.name: Mind's Eye Matter Smith

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The matter smith makes two Manifested Force attacks.

actions.name: Manifested Force
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) force damage.

bonus_actions.name: Planar Smithing
bonus_actions.desc: The matter smith magically manipulates the energy of the plane of existence it's on to produce one of the following effects (choose one or roll a d4):

bonus_actions.name: 1-2: Chains
bonus_actions.desc: The matter smith creates spectral bindings around a creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or have the restrained condition until the end of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: 3-4: Magic Shield
bonus_actions.desc: The matter smith conjures a floating, spectral shield that grants the matter smith a +5 bonus to its AC until the shield disappears at the start of the matter smith's next turn. The first time a creature misses a melee attack roll against the matter smith while the shield is conjured, that creature takes 7 (2d6) force damage.

spells: The matter smith casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability:

spells.1/day each: create food and water, fabricate (as an action)

traits.name: Telepathic Hub
traits.desc: When the mindwitness receives a telepathic message, it can telepathically share that message with up to seven other creatures within 600 feet of it that it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mindwitness makes one Bite attack and one Tentacles attack, or it uses Eye Ray three times.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (4d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 20 (4d8 + 2) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape 13), and it must succeed on a 13 Intelligence saving throw or be restrained until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Eye Ray
actions.desc: The mindwitness shoots one magical eye ray at random (roll a d6, and reroll if the ray has already been used this turn), choosing one target it can see within 120 feet of it:

actions.name: 1: Aversion Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must make a 13 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 2: Fear Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 3: Psychic Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 13 Intelligence saving throw or take 27 (6d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: 4: Slowing Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must make a 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target's speed is halved for 1 minute. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn but not both. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 5: Stunning Ray
actions.desc: The targeted creature must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 6: Telekinetic Ray
actions.desc:
If the target is a creature, it must make a 13 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the mindwitness moves it up to 30 feet in any direction, and it is restrained by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the mindwitness's next turn or until the mindwitness is incapacitated.
If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is telekinetically moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The mindwitness can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.desc: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage. If the minotaur moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before it hit, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 11 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet from the minotaur and have the prone condition.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.desc: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage while enlarged. If the minotaur moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before it hit, the target takes an extra 4 (1d8) piercing damage, or 9 (2d8) piercing damage if the minotaur is enlarged. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet from the minotaur and have the prone condition.

actions.name: Mattock
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 17 (2d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage while enlarged. If the target is a creature and the minotaur is enlarged, the target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

actions.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: For 1 minute, the minotaur magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the minotaur is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the minotaur lacks the room to become Large, the minotaur doesn't change size.

bonus_actions.name: Unerring Tracker
bonus_actions.desc: The minotaur magically creates a psychic link with one creature it can see. For the next hour, the minotaur knows the current distance and direction to the target if it is on the same plane of existence. The link ends if the minotaur has the incapacitated condition or uses this ability on a different target.

monsters.name: Minotaur Living Crystal Statue
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The statue makes two attacks: one with its greataxe and one gore attack.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Flying Shards
reactions.desc: In response to a creature hitting the statue with a melee weapon attack, the statue deals 11 (2d10) piercing damage to the attacker.

traits.name: Air Form
traits.desc: The mist hulk can enter another creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.desc: When the mist hulk dies, it bursts in a wave of water. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 11 (2d10) bludgeoning damage and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mist hulk makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) cold damage.

actions.name: Hideous Wailing (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The mist hulk releases a wail infused with magical anguish. Each creature within 30 feet of it must make a 14 Wisdom saving throw. A creature in the mist hulk's space has disadvantage on the saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 (4d6) psychic damage and has the incapacitated condition for 1 minute. The affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Modron Planar Incarnate
monsters.damage_immunities: necrotic, poison, radiant, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained, stunned, unconscious

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the incarnate fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The incarnate has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The incarnate deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The incarnate makes two Slam or Energy Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 27 (3d12 + 8) force damage.

actions.name: Energy Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 32 (5d12) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Planar Exhalation (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The incarnate exhales concentrated energy native to its plane in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 52 (8d12) necrotic damage, and the creature has the blinded condition until the end of the incarnate's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

reactions.name: Searing Gaze
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by an attack roll, the incarnate turns its magical gaze toward one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself and commands it to combust. The target must succeed on a 20 Wisdom saving throw or take 16 (3d10) fire damage.

reactions.name: Teleport
reactions.desc: Immediately after a creature the incarnate sees ends its turn, the incarnate teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

monsters.name: Moloch
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Moloch fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Moloch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Moloch regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Moloch dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Moloch makes one Bite attack, one Claw attack, and one Many-Tailed Whip attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 26 (4d8 + 8) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) force damage.

actions.name: Many-Tailed Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 13 (2d4 + 8) lightning damage plus 11 (2d10) thunder damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 24 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 30 feet in a straight line toward Moloch.

actions.name: Breath of Despair (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Moloch exhales in a 30-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 21 Wisdom saving throw or take 27 (5d10) psychic damage, drop whatever it is holding, and become frightened of Moloch for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, a creature must take the {@action Dash} action and move away from Moloch by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the {@action Dash} action. If the creature ends its turn in a location where it doesn't have line of sight to Moloch, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Moloch teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Moloch makes one Bite, Claw, or Many-Tailed Whip attack.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Moloch uses Teleport.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Moloch uses Spellcasting.

spells: Moloch casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 21):

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), confusion, detect magic, fly, major image, stinking cloud, suggestion, wall of fire

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the roper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

traits.name: Grasping Tendrils
traits.desc: The roper can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a 15 Strength check against it.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The roper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The roper makes four attacks with its tendrils, uses Reel, and makes one attack with its bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (4d8 + 4) fire damage.

actions.name: Tendril
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 50 ft., one creature. 4 (1d8) fire damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained and has disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, and the roper can't use the same tendril on another target. A creature takes 4 (1d8) fire damage each time it ends its turn grappled by the roper.

actions.name: Reel
actions.desc: The roper pulls each creature grappled by it up to 25 feet straight toward it.

monsters.name: Molydeus
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, poisoned, stunned

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the molydeus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The molydeus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The molydeus makes one Demonic Weapon attack, one Snakebite attack, and one Wolf Bite attack.

actions.name: Demonic Weapon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 35 (4d12 + 9) force damage. If the target has at least one head and the molydeus rolled a 20 on the attack roll, the target is decapitated and dies if it can't survive without that head. A target is immune to this effect if it takes none of the damage, has legendary actions, or is Huge or larger. Such a creature takes an extra 27 (6d8) force damage from the hit.

actions.name: Snakebite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. 16 (2d6 + 9) poison damage. The target must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw, or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target transforms into a manes if this reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This transformation can be ended only by a wish spell.

actions.name: Wolf Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 25 (3d10 + 9) necrotic damage.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The molydeus makes one Demonic Weapon or Snakebite attack.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The molydeus moves without provoking {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The molydeus uses Spellcasting.

spells: The molydeus casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 22):

traits.name: Extraordinary Feature
traits.desc:
The mongrelfolk has one of the following extraordinary features, determined randomly by rolling a d20 or chosen by the DM:
13: Amphibious. The mongrelfolk can breathe air and water.
49: Darkvision. The mongrelfolk has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.
10: Flight. The mongrelfolk has leathery wings and a flying speed of 40 feet.
1115: Keen Hearing and Smell. The mongrelfolk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
1617: Spider Climb. The mongrelfolk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
1819: Standing Leap. The mongrelfolk's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.
20: Two-Headed. The mongrelfolk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.desc: The mongrelfolk can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful 12 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mongrelfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw or dagger.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.desc: The monodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.desc: If the monodrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Monstrous Peryton
monsters.languages: understands Common and Elvish but can't speak

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The peryton doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
traits.desc: The peryton has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the peryton fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The peryton makes two attacks: one with its gore and one with its talons.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Warp Shadow
actions.desc: The peryton chooses up to three creatures within 60 feet of it that it can see. Each creature must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or become cursed. While cursed, whenever the creature makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, it must roll a d4 and subtract that number from the roll. A cursed creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw is immune to this peryton's Warp Shadow for 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The peryton makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Talons Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The peryton makes one attack with its talons.

legendary_actions.name: Dive Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The peryton moves up to its speed toward one target of its choosing. It then makes a gore attack that deals an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage on a hit.

monsters.name: Moonstone Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) radiant damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

actions.name: Dream Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales mist in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious for 10 minutes. This effect ends for a creature if the creature takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

actions.name: Moonlight Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a beam of moonlight in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Mordakhesh
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Limited Magic Immunity
traits.desc: Mordakhesh can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless he wishes to be. Mordakhesh has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Mordakhesh makes three greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) force damage.

actions.name: Chromatic Orb
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +10 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 13 (3d8) damage of a type chosen by Mordakhesh: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Mordakhesh makes one weapon attack or casts chromatic orb.

legendary_actions.name: Chromatic Resistance
legendary_actions.desc: Modakhesh gains resistance to one damage type of his choiceacid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunderuntil the start of his next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Warlord's Command (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Mordakhesh targets up to two allies that he can see within 30 feet of him. If a target can see and hear him, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

spells: Mordakhesh's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). Mordakhesh can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: chromatic orb (see "Actions" below), detect thoughts, disguise self

spells.1/day each: banishing smite, destructive wave, fly, mass suggestion, staggering smite, suggestion, true seeing

monsters.name: Morkoth
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 20

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The morkoth can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The morkoth makes either two Bite attacks and one Tentacles attack or three Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 15 (3d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 15 (3d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns, and the morkoth can't use its tentacles on another target.

actions.name: Hypnosis
actions.desc: The morkoth projects a 30-foot cone of magical energy. Each creature in that area must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the morkoth for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the target tries to get as close to the morkoth as possible, using its actions to {@action Dash} until it is within 5 feet of the morkoth. A charmed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns and whenever it takes damage, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature has advantage on saving throws against the morkoth's Hypnosis for 24 hours.

reactions.name: Spell Reflection
reactions.desc: If the morkoth makes a successful saving throw against a spell or a spell attack misses it, the morkoth can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 120 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the morkoth. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

spells: The morkoth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 17):

spells.3/day each: darkness, dimension door, dispel magic, lightning bolt, sending

monsters.name: Mountain Goat
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
traits.desc: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Mouth of Chaos
traits.desc:
The giant is immune to the confusion spell.
On each of its turns, the giant uses all its movement to move toward the nearest creature or whatever else it might perceive as food. Roll a d10 at the start of each of the giant's turns to determine its action for that turn:

The giant makes three Fist attacks against one random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, the giant flies into a rage and gains advantage on all attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
The giant makes one Fist attack against each creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, the giant makes one Fist attack against itself.
The giant makes one Bite attack against one random creature within reach. If no other creatures are within reach, its eyes glaze over and it is stunned until the start of its next turn.

The giant makes one Bite attack and two Fist attacks against one random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, the giant flies into a rage and gains advantage on all attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the giant magically regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The mud hulk can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

traits.name: Sticky Mud
traits.desc: The ground within 15 feet of the mud hulk is difficult terrain for other creatures.

actions.name: Enveloping Slam
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d12 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be pulled into the mud hulk's space and be engulfed by the mud hulk. While engulfed, the target can't breathe, has the restrained condition, and takes 6 (1d12) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. When the mud hulk moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mud hulk can have only one target engulfed at a time. While a creature is engulfed, the mud hulk can't use its Amorphous trait.
An engulfed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space.

actions.name: Mud Splash
actions.desc: The mud hulk lobs a mass of mud that splashes in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 30 feet of the mud hulk. Each creature in that area must make a 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The affected area is difficult terrain until the start of the mud hulk's next turn.

monsters.name: Mud Mephit
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.desc: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of sticky mud. Each Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 11 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained until the end of the creature's next turn.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of mud.

actions.name: Fists
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Mud Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The mephit belches viscid mud onto one creature within 5 feet of it. If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a 11 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Murder Comet
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, unconscious

traits.name: Explode
traits.desc: When the comet drops to 0 hit points, it explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in the sphere must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The comet doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The comet sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The comet deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The comet doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The comet makes one Slam attack and one Spit Fire attack.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Spit Fire
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 13 (2d10 + 2) fire damage.

traits.name: Blood Aegis
traits.desc: The AC of Murgaxor includes his Constitution modifier while he isn't wearing armor or wielding a shield.

traits.name: Oriq Mask
traits.desc: Murgaxor wears an Oriq mask. While wearing the mask, Murgaxor can't be targeted by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors, and he adds double his proficiency bonus to Charisma (Deception) checks (included above).

traits.name: Sanguine Sense
traits.desc: While Murgaxor isn't blinded, he can see any creature that isn't an Undead or a Construct within 60 feet of himself, even through total cover, heavily obscured areas, invisibility, or any other phenomena that would prevent sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Murgaxor makes two Blood Lash attacks.

actions.name: Blood Lash
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d10 + 5) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of Murgaxor's next turn.

actions.name: Blood Boil (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: Murgaxor chooses a point within 150 feet of himself, and a 20-foot radius sphere centered on that point fills with a burst of searing, blood-red mist. Each creature of Murgaxor's choice that he can see in that area must make a 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 (7d10) necrotic damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated. A creature dies if reduced to 0 hit points by this necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Musteval Guardinal

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The musteval makes two Bone Blade attacks.

actions.name: Bone Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) radiant damage.

reactions.name: Skirmish Movement
reactions.desc: When a creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the musteval, the musteval can move up to half its speed. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

spells: The musteval casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability:

monsters.name: Myconid Adult
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Distress Spores
traits.desc: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

traits.name: Sun Sickness
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.

actions.name: Pacifying Spores (3/Day)
actions.desc: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Rapport Spores
actions.desc: A 20-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intelligence of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

monsters.name: Myconid Sovereign
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Distress Spores
traits.desc: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

traits.name: Sun Sickness
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The myconid uses either its Hallucination Spores or its Pacifying Spores, then makes a fist attack.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (3d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (3d4) poison damage.

actions.name: Animating Spores (3/Day)
actions.desc: The myconid targets one corpse of a humanoid or a Large or smaller beast within 5 feet of it and releases spores at the corpse. In 24 hours, the corpse rises as a spore servant. The corpse stays animated for 1d4 + 1 weeks or until destroyed, and it can't be animated again in this way.

actions.name: Hallucination Spores
actions.desc: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target is incapacitated while it hallucinates. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Pacifying Spores
actions.desc: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Rapport Spores
actions.desc: A 30-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intelligence of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

monsters.name: Myconid Sprout
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Distress Spores
traits.desc: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

traits.name: Sun Sickness
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 (1d4 - 1) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage.

actions.name: Rapport Spores (3/Day)
actions.desc: A 10-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intelligence of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

monsters.name: Nabassu
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Demonic Shadows
traits.desc: The nabassu darkens the area around its body in a 10-foot radius. Nonmagical light can't illuminate this area of dim light.

traits.name: Devour Soul
traits.desc: A nabassu can eat the soul of a creature it has killed within the last hour, provided that creature is neither a Construct nor an Undead. The devouring requires the nabassu to be within 5 feet of the corpse for at least 10 minutes, after which it gains a number of Hit Dice (d8s) equal to half the creature's number of Hit Dice. Roll those dice, and increase the nabassu's hit points by the numbers rolled. For every 4 Hit Dice the nabassu gains in this way, its attacks deal an extra 3 (1d6) damage on a hit. The nabassu retains these benefits for 6 days. A creature devoured by a nabassu can be restored to life only by a wish spell.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The nabassu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The nabassu makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack, and it uses Soul-Stealing Gaze.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 38 (5d12 + 6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) force damage.

actions.name: Soul-Stealing Gaze
actions.desc: The nabassu targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target isn't a Construct or an Undead, it must succeed on a 16 Charisma saving throw or take 13 (2d12) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage dealt, and the nabassu regains hit points equal to half that amount. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0, and if the target is a Humanoid, it immediately rises as a ghoul under the nabassu's control.

monsters.name: Nagpa
monsters.languages: Common plus up to five other languages

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The nagpa makes three Staff or Deathly Ray attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 24 (7d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Deathly Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 30 (7d6 + 6) necrotic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Corruption
bonus_actions.desc: The nagpa targets one creature it can see within 90 feet of it. The target must make a 20 Charisma saving throw. An evil creature makes the save with disadvantage. On a failed save, the target is charmed by the nagpa until the start of the nagpa's next turn. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to the nagpa's Corruption for the next 24 hours.

bonus_actions.name: Paralysis (Recharge 6-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The nagpa forces each creature within 30 feet of it to make a 20 Wisdom saving throw, excluding Undead and Constructs. On a failed save, a target is paralyzed for 1 minute. A paralyzed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The nagpa casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 20):

spells.At will: detect magic, mage hand, message, minor illusion

spells.2/day each: fireball, fly, hold person, suggestion, wall of fire

monsters.name: Naiad

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The naiad can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Invisible in Water
traits.desc: The naiad is invisible while fully immersed in water.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The naiad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The naiad makes two psychic touch attacks.

actions.name: Psychic Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) psychic damage.

spells: The naiad's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Narzugon
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Infernal Tack
traits.desc: The narzugon wears spurs that are part of infernal tack companion as an action.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The narzugon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The narzugon makes three Hellfire Lance attacks. It also uses Infernal Command or Terrifying Command.

actions.name: Hellfire Lance
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) fire damage. If this damage kills a creature with a soul, the soul rises from the River Styx as a lemure in Avernus in 1d4 hours. If the creature isn't revived before then, only a wish spell or killing the lemure and casting true resurrection on the creature's original body can restore it to life. Constructs and devils are immune to this effect.

actions.name: Infernal Command
actions.desc: Each ally of the narzugon within 60 feet of it can't be charmed or frightened until the end of the narzugon's next turn.

actions.name: Terrifying Command
actions.desc: Each creature within 60 feet of the narzugon that isn't a Fiend must succeed on a 17 Charisma saving throw or become frightened of the narzugon for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that makes a successful saving throw is immune to this narzugon's Terrifying Command for 24 hours.

actions.name: Healing (1/Day)
actions.desc: The narzugon, or one creature it touches, regains 100 hit points.

monsters.name: Necrichor
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, restrained
monsters.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 11

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
traits.desc: If the necrichor fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: Unless its lifeless remains are splashed with holy water or placed in a vessel under the effects of the hallow spell, the destroyed necrichor re-forms in 1d10 days, regaining all its hits points and appearing in the place it died or in the nearest unoccupied space.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The necrichor can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The necrichor doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The necrichor makes two attacks.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the start of the necrichor's next turn.
