traits.name: Shark Telepathy
traits.desc: The wave shaper can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The wave shaper makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d8 + 1) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d8 + 1) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Whirlpool (1/Day)
actions.desc:
The wave shaper targets a body of water at least 50 feet square and 25 feet deep, causing a whirlpool to form in the center of the area. The whirlpool forms a vortex that is 5 feet wide at the base, up to 50 feet wide at the top, 25 feet tall, and lasts for 1 minute or until the wave shaper is incapacitated. Any creature or object in the water and within 25 feet of the vortex is pulled 10 feet toward it. A creature can swim away from the vortex by succeeding on a 14 Strength (Athletics) check.
When a creature enters the vortex for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a 14 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and is caught in the vortex until it ends. On a success, the creature takes half damage and isn't caught in the vortex. A creature caught in the vortex can use its action to try to swim away from the vortex as described above, but it has disadvantage on the Strength (Athletics) check to do so.
The first time each turn that an object enters the vortex, the object takes 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. This damage occurs each round it remains in the vortex.

spells: The wave shaper's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

monsters.name: Sapphire Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.speed: 30 ft., burrow 15 ft., climb 30 ft., fly 60 ft.
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 15

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The dragon can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and can leave a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) thunder damage.

actions.name: Debilitating Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a pulse of high-pitched, nearly inaudible sound in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 (4d10) thunder damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated.

spells: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

monsters.name: Sapphire Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft. (hover), swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Gem Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 400 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use its Mass Telekinesis action during the next hour. Award a party an additional 90,000 XP (180,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Gem Awakening activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d8 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 19) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales crushing force in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) force damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. On a success or failure, the creature's speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Mass Telekinesis (Gem Awakening Only; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc:
The greatwyrm targets any number of creatures and objects it can see within 120 feet of it. No one target can weigh more than 4,000 pounds, and objects can't be targeted if they're being worn or carried. Each targeted creature must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be restrained in the greatwyrm's telekinetic grip. At the end of a creature's turn, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
At the end of the greatwyrm's turn, it can move each creature or object it has in its telekinetic grip up to 60 feet in any direction, but not beyond 120 feet of itself. In addition, it can choose any number of creatures restrained in this way and deal 45 (7d12) force damage to each of them.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically transforms into any creature that is Medium or Small, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the greatwyrm is reduced to 0 hit points or uses a bonus action to end it.

bonus_actions.name: Psychic Step
bonus_actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm uses Psychic Step or Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Psychic Beam (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm emits a beam of psychic energy in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 26 Intelligence saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The greatwyrm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 26, +18 to hit with spell attack):

spells.1/day each: dispel magic, forcecage, plane shift, reverse gravity, time stop

monsters.name: Sapphire Sentinel
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slow (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Sapphire
actions.desc: The sapphire has 3 charges. As an action, the golem can expend 1 charge to cast dispel magic (as a 9th-level spell) from the sapphire using Constitution as its spellcasting ability. The sapphire ceases to glow if all its charges are expended, but it regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn and glows again once it has 1 or more charges.

traits.name: Enthralling Performance
traits.desc: If the satyr performs for at least 1 minute, it chooses up to four humanoids within 60 feet of it who watched or listened to the entire performance. Each target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed. While charmed in this way, the target idolizes the satyr and will take part in the satyr's revels. The charmed condition ends for the creature after 1 hour, if it takes any damage, if the satyr attacks the target, or if the target witnesses the satyr attacking or damaging any of the target's allies.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sleepless Reveler
traits.desc: Magic can't put the satyr to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The satyr makes two ram attacks or two shortbow attacks.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sleepless Reveler
traits.desc: Magic can't put the satyr to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The satyr makes three ram attacks or three shortbow attacks.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hail of Arrows (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The satyr fires an arrow that magically transforms into a flurry of missiles in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Scaladar
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.damage_resistances: fire, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the scaladar is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage, and its sting deals an extra 11 (2d10) lightning damage until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Scaladar Link
traits.desc: The scaladar knows the location of other scaladar within 100 feet of it, and it can sense when any of them take damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scaladar makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15). The scaladar has two claws, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) lightning damage.

monsters.name: Scarecrow
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, unconscious
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the scarecrow remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary, inanimate scarecrow.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scarecrow makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 11 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the scarecrow's next turn.

actions.name: Terrifying Glare
actions.desc: The scarecrow targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the scarecrow, the target must succeed on a 11 Wisdom saving throw or be magically frightened until the end of the scarecrow's next turn. The frightened target is paralyzed.

monsters.name: Scion of Grolantor
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (6/Day)
traits.desc: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scion makes one Great Tree Club attack and two Slam attacks, or it makes three Boulder attacks.

actions.name: Great Tree Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 23 Strength saving throw or be pushed horizontally up to 100 feet straight away from the scion and have the prone condition.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 26 (4d8 + 8) force damage.

actions.name: Boulder
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +15 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 27 (3d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Inhale (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc:
The scion inhales a vortex of air in a 120-foot line that is 15 feet wide. Each creature in that area that is Huge or smaller must succeed on a 23 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 120 feet straight toward the scion and be swallowed. A swallowed creature has the restrained condition, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the scion, and takes 24 (7d6) force damage at the start of each of the scion's turns.
The scion's stomach can hold up to two creatures at a time. If the scion takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the scion must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within 10 feet of the scion and has the prone condition. If the scion dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting with the prone condition.

bonus_actions.name: Earth-Shaking Movement
bonus_actions.desc: The scion moves up to its speed and then sends a shock wave through the ground in a 60-foot-radius circle centered on itself. Each creature on the ground in that area that is {@status concentration||concentrating} must succeed on a 23 Constitution saving throw or lose {@status concentration}.

reactions.name: Feed
reactions.desc: Immediately after taking damage, if it has at least one creature swallowed, the scion deals 10 (3d6) force damage to each swallowed creature and regains 10 hit points.

monsters.name: Scion of Memnor
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The scion doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (6/Day)
traits.desc: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scion makes one attack using Cloud Morningstar or Wind Javelin, as well as two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Cloud Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 32 (4d10 + 10) force damage plus 22 (4d10) thunder damage.

actions.name: Wind Javelin
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +18 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 42 (5d12 + 10) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 28 (4d8 + 10) force damage.

actions.name: Thunderous Vortex (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The scion magically creates a vortex of wind in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 120 feet of itself. Each creature in the sphere must succeed on a 24 Strength saving throw or be pulled straight toward the sphere's center, ending in an unoccupied space as close as possible to the center. Then a burst of thunder erupts in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the same point. Each creature in that area takes 52 (8d12) thunder damage and must succeed on a 24 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition until the end of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Fog of Deception
bonus_actions.desc: The scion conjures a magical cloud that fills a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 90 feet of itself. Each creature in that area must make a 24 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature has the charmed condition until the end of its next turn. While it has the charmed condition, the creature must use its action to make a melee attack against a creature other than itself of the scion's choice. If no creature is within its reach, the affected creature makes a ranged attack against a creature of the scion's choice, throwing its weapon if necessary. On a successful save, a creature is immune to the scion's Fog of Deception for the next 24 hours.

monsters.name: Scion of Skoraeus
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (6/Day)
traits.desc: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scion makes one Crystal Club attack and two Slam attacks, then uses Entombing Grasp if available. Alternatively, the scion makes two Runic Boulder attacks.

actions.name: Crystal Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 35 (4d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage. Hit or Miss: The scion can cause the club to flare with bright light, and the target must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw or take 18 (4d8) radiant damage and have the blinded condition until the start of the scion's next turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 31 (4d10 + 9) force damage.

actions.name: Runic Boulder
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +16 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 27 (4d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage. Hit or Miss: The boulder explodes. The target and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a 22 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 19 (3d12) force damage and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: Entombing Grasp (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The scion wreathes its hand in petrifying magic and touches one Huge or smaller creature it can see within 20 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 24 Dexterity saving throw or take 28 (8d6) force damage and have the grappled condition (escape 19). At the start of the scion's next turn, if the target is still grappled, the target has the petrified condition.

bonus_actions.name: Earth-Shaking Movement
bonus_actions.desc: The scion moves up to its speed and then sends a shock wave through the ground in a 60-footradius circle centered on itself. Each creature on the ground in that area that is {@status concentration||concentrating} must succeed on a 24 Constitution saving throw or lose {@status concentration}.

monsters.name: Scion of Stronmaus
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The scion doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (6/Day)
traits.desc: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scion makes one attack using Lightning Sword or Hailstone, as well as two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Lightning Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage plus 22 (4d10) lightning damage.

actions.name: Hailstone
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +18 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 32 (4d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage.

bonus_actions.name: Vengeful Storm (Recharge 6)
bonus_actions.desc:
The scion conjures a churning storm cloud in a 30-foot-radius, 10-foot-tall cylinder centered on a point within 120 feet of itself. The cloud's area is heavily obscured. The cloud lasts for 1 minute, until the scion dies, or when the scion uses this bonus action again.
When the cloud appears, and as a bonus action on later turns, the scion can move the cloud up to 30 feet and cause one of the following effects in a 30-foot-radius, 120-foot-high cylinder directly below it; the scion can't choose the same effect two rounds in a row:

bonus_actions.name: Acid Rain
bonus_actions.desc: The cloud rains acid. Each creature in the cylinder must succeed on a 25 Constitution saving throw or be covered in acid for 1 minute or until a creature uses its action to remove the acid from itself or another creature. A creature covered in the acid takes 26 (4d12) acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

bonus_actions.name: Freezing Storm
bonus_actions.desc: Shards of ice pelt down, and freezing wind fills the area. Each creature in the cylinder must succeed on a 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 28 (8d6) cold damage and be hindered by ice formations for 1 minute or until it or another creature within reach of it uses an action to break away the ice. A creature hindered by ice has its speed reduced to 0.

bonus_actions.name: Lightning Bolts
bonus_actions.desc: Bolts of lightning strike down. Each creature in the cylinder must succeed on 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 18 (4d8) lightning damage and have the stunned condition until the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Scion of Surtur
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (6/Day)
traits.desc: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scion makes one attack using Lava Blade or Lava Ball, as well as two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Lava Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 32 (4d10 + 10) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Lava Ball
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +18 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 29 (3d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 28 (4d8 + 10) force damage.

actions.name: Lava Wave (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The scion emits a wave of lava from its blade, hands, or mouth in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 60 (11d10) fire damage and has the restrained condition from being embedded in hardening rock. A creature can make a 25 Strength (Athletics) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within reach from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 40 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

bonus_actions.name: Earth-Shaking Movement
bonus_actions.desc: The scion moves up to its speed and then sends a shock wave through the ground in a 60-foot-radius circle centered on itself. Each creature on the ground in that area that is {@status concentration||concentrating} must succeed on a 26 Constitution saving throw or lose {@status concentration}.

bonus_actions.name: Incendiary Smoke
bonus_actions.desc: The scion causes smoke and white-hot embers to billow from its skin, filling a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself that moves with it. While the scion's skin billows smoke, ranged attacks against the scion are made with disadvantage. A creature that moves into the smoke for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must succeed on a 25 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (4d6) fire damage. The scion's skin stops billowing smoke after 1 minute, when the scion dies, or when the scion uses this bonus action to stop the smoke.

monsters.name: Scion of Thrym
monsters.damage_resistances: fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (6/Day)
traits.desc: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scion makes one Ice Axe and two Slam attacks, or it makes two Glacier Throw attacks.

actions.name: Ice Axe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage plus 18 (4d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 32 (4d10 + 10) force damage.

actions.name: Glacier Throw
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +17 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a 25 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

actions.name: Glacial Upheaval (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc:
The scion digs its hands into the ground at a point it can see within 30 feet of itself and launches a magically conjured mass of ice into the air. Each creature other than the scion in a 30-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 36 (8d8) bludgeoning damage plus 19 (3d12) cold damage and is pushed vertically to the top of the cylinder, at which point the creature falls. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is pushed to the nearest unoccupied space outside the cylinder with no additional effects.
At the start of the scion's next turn, a mass of ice plummets to the ground on a point the scion can see within 60 feet of the point the scion dug its hands into. Each creature in a 30-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must succeed on a 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) cold damage.

bonus_actions.name: Earth-Shaking Movement
bonus_actions.desc: The scion moves up to its speed and sends a shock wave through the ground in a 60-foot-radius circle centered on itself. Each creature on the ground in that area that is {@status concentration||concentrating} must succeed on a 25 Constitution saving throw or lose {@status concentration}.

traits.name: Explosive Tank
traits.desc: When the guard dies, or if it rolls a 1 when checking whether its Scorchbringer action recharges, the tank on its back explodes in a 10-foot radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the scorchbringer.

actions.name: Light Hammer
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Scorchbringer (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The guard's scorchbringer spouts a stream of flame in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Scufflecup Teacup
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d3 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The sea elf has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the sea elf to sleep.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The sea elf can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage, or 4 (1d8) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.desc: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The scout has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

traits.name: Child of the Sea
traits.desc: The scout can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The sea lion can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The sea lion has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The sea lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sea lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Swimming Leap
traits.desc: With a 10-foot swimming start, the sea lion can long jump out of or across the water up to 25 feet.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sea lion makes three attacks: one bite attack and two claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Sea Spawn
monsters.languages: understands Aquan and Common but can't speak

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
traits.desc: The sea spawn can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged in the sea at least once a day for 1 minute to avoid suffocating.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sea spawn makes two Unarmed Strike attacks and one Piscine Anatomy attack.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Piscine Anatomy
actions.desc: The sea spawn uses one of the following options (choose one or roll a d6):

actions.name: 12: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: 34: Poison Quills
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 3 (1d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 56: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 12) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the sea spawn can't use this tentacle on another target.

monsters.name: Seal
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The seal can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The seal has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

monsters.name: Sentient Gray Ooze
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Corrode Metal
traits.desc:
Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the ooze corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative 1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to 5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the ooze is destroyed after dealing damage.
The ooze can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the ooze remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an oily pool or wet rock.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage, and if the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative 1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

monsters.name: Sentient Ochre Jelly
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The jelly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage.

reactions.name: Split
reactions.desc: When a jelly that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new jellies if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new jelly has hit points equal to half the original jelly's, rounded down. New jellies are one size smaller than the original jelly.

monsters.name: Septon Modron

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.desc: The septon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Combat Ready
traits.desc: The septon has advantage on initiative checks.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.desc: If the septon dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The septon makes four Tentacle attacks and uses Lightning Network or Spellcasting.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape 14). Until this grapple ends, the septon can't use this tentacle against other targets. The septon has seven tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Lightning Network
actions.desc: The septon conjures a field of electricity that fills a 30-foot cube originating from itself before dissipating. Each creature in that area must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10) lightning damage and has the stunned condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The septon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

spells.At will: detect magic, dispel magic, mending (as an action)

spells.1/day each: plane shift (self only), protection from evil and good, sending

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Self-Sacrifice
reactions.desc: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrull is hit by an attack, the thrull swaps places with that creature and is hit instead.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The hoplite has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hoplite's allies is within 5 feet of the hoplite and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hoplite makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

monsters.name: Shadar-kai Gloom Weaver

traits.name: Burden of Time
traits.desc: Beasts and Humanoids (except elves) have disadvantage on saving throws while within 10 feet of the shadar-kai.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The shadar-kai has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shadar-kai makes three Shadow Spear attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Shadow Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120, one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 26 (4d12) necrotic damage. Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the shadar-kai's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

reactions.name: Misty Escape (Recharge 6-6)
reactions.desc: When the shadar-kai takes damage, it turns invisible and teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains invisible until the start of its next turn or until it attacks or casts a spell.

spells: The shadar-kai casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

spells.At will: arcane eye, mage armor, minor illusion, prestidigitation, speak with dead

spells.1/day each: arcane gate, bane, confusion, darkness, fear, major image, true seeing

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The shadar-kai has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc:
The shadar-kai makes three Spiked Chain attacks.
It can use Shadow Jump after one of these attacks.

actions.name: Spiked Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a 14 Dexterity saving throw or suffer one of the following effects (choose one or roll a d6):

actions.name: 12: Decay
actions.desc: The target takes 22 (4d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: 34: Grapple
actions.desc: The target is grappled (escape 14) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the shadar-kai can't grapple another target.

actions.name: 56: Topple
actions.desc: The target is knocked prone.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Jump
bonus_actions.desc: The shadar-kai teleports, along with any equipment is it wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it teleports from and the space it teleports to must be in dim light or darkness.

monsters.name: Shadar-kai Soul Monger

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The shadar-kai has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The shadar-kai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Soul Thirst
traits.desc: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the shadar-kai can gain temporary hit points equal to half the creature's hit point maximum. While the shadar-kai has temporary hit points from this trait, it has advantage on attack rolls.

traits.name: Weight of Ages
traits.desc: Any Beast or Humanoid (except an elf) that starts its turn within 5 feet of the shadar-kai has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shadar-kai makes two Shadow Dagger attacks.

actions.name: Shadow Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 13 (4d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on saving throws until the end of the shadar-kai's next turn. Hit or Miss: The dagger magically returns to the shadar-kai's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

actions.name: Wave of Weariness (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The shadar-kai emits weariness in a 60-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 (10d8) psychic damage and suffers 1 level of exhaustion. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and doesn't gain a level of exhaustion.

spells: The shadar-kai casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

spells.1/day each: bestow curse, finger of death, gaseous form, seeming

monsters.name: Shadow Assassin
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The assassin can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the assassin can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Weakness
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the assassin has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The assassin makes two Shadow Blade attacks.

actions.name: Shadow Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. Unless the target is immune to necrotic damage, the target's Strength score is reduced by 1d4 each time it is hit by this attack. The target dies if its Strength is reduced to 0. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a shadow (see the Monster Manual) rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

monsters.name: Shadow Demon
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
Critical Role: Call of the Netherdeep
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, necrotic, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in bright light, the demon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the demon can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (2d6 + 3) psychic damage or, if the demon had advantage on the attack roll, 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The horror can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the horror can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Shadow Stride
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the horror can step into a shadow within 5 feet of it and magically appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of a second shadow that is up to 60 feet away. Both shadows must be cast by a Small or larger creature or object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The horror makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the horror until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Lashing Shadows (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Each creature within 60 feet of the horror, except other horrors, must succeed on a 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 27 (6d8) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Shadow Mastiff
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Ethereal Awareness
traits.desc: The shadow mastiff can see ethereal creatures and objects.

traits.name: Sunlight Weakness
traits.desc: While in bright light created by sunlight, the shadow mastiff has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Blend
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow mastiff becomes invisible, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. The invisibility lasts until the shadow mastiff uses a bonus action to end it or until the shadow mastiff attacks, is in bright light, or is incapacitated.

monsters.name: Shadow Mastiff Alpha
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Ethereal Awareness
traits.desc: The shadow mastiff can see ethereal creatures and objects.

traits.name: Sunlight Weakness
traits.desc: While in bright light created by sunlight, the shadow mastiff has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Terrifying Howl (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The shadow mastiff howls. Any Beast or Humanoid within 300 feet of it must succeed on a 11 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of it for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's save is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to any shadow mastiff's Terrifying Howl for the next 24 hours.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Blend
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow mastiff becomes invisible, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. The invisibility lasts until the shadow mastiff uses a bonus action to end it or until the shadow mastiff attacks, is in bright light, or is incapacitated.

monsters.name: Shadow Spirit
monsters.ac: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

traits.name: Terror Frenzy (Fury Only)
traits.desc: The spirit has advantage on attack rolls against frightened creatures.

traits.name: Weight of Sorrow (Despair Only)
traits.desc: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Chilling Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel cold damage.

actions.name: Dreadful Scream (1/Day)
actions.desc: The spirit screams. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth (Fear Only)
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the spirit takes the Hide action.

monsters.name: Shadrix Silverquill

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Shadrix fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Shadrix makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 12 (1d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d6 + 7) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it is wracked with despair and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Illuminating Shadow Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Shadrix exhales an entwined burst of blinding radiance and unnerving shadow in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 31 (7d8) radiant damage and 31 (7d8) psychic damage and is blinded until the start of Shadrix's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't blinded.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: Shadrix makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Shadow Slip (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Shadrix becomes an inky cloud of shadow and can move up to half his flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks, then resumes his true form. During this movement, he can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If he moves through a creature, it must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw or become blinded until the end of its next turn. If Shadrix ends this move inside an object, he takes 5 (1d10) force damage and is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space.

legendary_actions.name: Flash of Inspiration (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Shadrix magically summons 1d4 inkling mascot in unoccupied spaces he can see within 60 feet of himself. The inklings obey his commands and take their turns immediately after his. While any of these inklings live, Shadrix has advantage on attack rolls and saving throws. These inklings disappear after 10 minutes, when Shadrix dies, or when he uses this action again.

spells: Shadrix casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 23):

spells.1/day each: darkness, daylight, hypnotic pattern, sending, suggestion

monsters.name: Shapechanged Roper
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the roper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

traits.name: Grasping Tendrils
traits.desc: The roper can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a 15 Strength check against it.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The roper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The roper can use its action to polymorph into a stone object or back to its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The roper makes four attacks with its tendrils, uses Reel, and makes one attack with its bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (4d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tendril
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 50 ft., one creature. The target is grappled (escape 15). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained and has disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, and the roper can't use the same tendril on another target.

actions.name: Reel
actions.desc: The roper pulls each creature grappled by it up to 25 feet straight toward it.

monsters.name: Shard Shunner
monsters.damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft. (rat form only), passive Perception 12

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The Shard Shunner can use their action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, or back into their true form, which is humanoid. Their statistics, other than their size, are the same in each form. Any equipment they are wearing or carrying isn't transformed. They revert to their true form if they die.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The Shard Shunner has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.desc: The Shard Shunner can move through the space of creatures that is of a size larger than them.

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: The Shard Shunner has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: The Shard Shunner makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite.

actions.name: Bite (Rat or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

actions.name: Shortsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Shator Demodand
monsters.languages: Abyssal, Common, Demodand, Infernal, telepathy 120 ft.

traits.name: Boundless Movement
traits.desc: The shator ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed. It can spend 5 feet of movement to automatically remove the grappled condition from itself.

traits.name: Jailer (1/Day)
traits.desc: The shator can cast the imprisonment spell, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (chaining effect only; spell save 18).

traits.name: Liquefaction Ritual
traits.desc: The shator can perform a 1-minute ritual that turns all willing farastus and kelubars of its choice within 60 feet of itself into a living liquid form. Each liquefied demodand becomes enough liquid to fill a flask. A demodand's liquefaction lasts until a shator uses an action to end it or a creature opens a container holding the liquid. While liquefied in this way, a demodand has the paralyzed condition despite any immunity to that condition, it has immunity to all damage, and any curse affecting it is suspended.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The shator has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Numbing Secretions
traits.desc: A creature that touches the shator or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 17 Dexterity saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls and its speed halved until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shator makes one Bite attack and two Enervating Trident attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (3d6 + 7) piercing damage plus 26 (4d12) acid damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or have the paralyzed condition until the start of the shator's next turn.

actions.name: Enervating Trident
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d10 + 7) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Inhibitory Spray (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The shator exhales a spray of slime in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 40 (9d8) acid damage and has the paralyzed condition for 1 minute. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: Summon Demodand (1/Day)
actions.desc: The shator has a 50 percent chance of summoning its choice of 1d4 farastu demodands, 1d2 kelubar demodands, or 1 shator demodand. A summoned demodand appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the shator, acts as an ally of the shator, and can't summon other demodands. It remains for 1 minute, until it or the shator dies, or until the shator dismisses it as an action.

spells: The shator casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks):

spells.1/day each: dispel magic, plane shift (to Carceri only), scrying (as an action)

traits.name: Sure-Footed
traits.desc: The sheep has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.desc: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The shark has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: The shark can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shark makes two bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Shemeshka
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If Shemeshka fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Shemeshka has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Shemeshka carries a magic crown called the Razorvine Tiara. In the hands of anyone other than Shemeshka, the Razorvine Tiara functions as a tentacle rod that deals slashing damage instead of bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Shemeshka uses Arcane Flux or Spellcasting. She then makes one Claw attack or one attack with her Razorvine Tiara.

actions.name: Arcane Flux
actions.desc: Shemeshka causes a surge of arcane energy to burst around one creature she can see within 120 feet of herself. The target must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 45 (7d12) force damage and has the incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Razorvine Tiara
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw, or its speed is halved and it has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Teleport
bonus_actions.desc: Shemeshka teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

reactions.name: Fell Counterspell (3/Day)
reactions.desc: Shemeshka utters a magical word to interrupt a creature she can see that is casting a spell. If the spell is 5th level or lower, it fails and has no effect. If the spell is 6th level or higher, Shemeshka makes an Intelligence check (10 + the spell's level). On a success, the spell fails and has no effect. Whatever the spell's level, the caster gains the poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.

spells: Shemeshka casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 18):

spells.At will: alter self, darkness, invisibility (self only), mage hand, prestidigitation

spells.1/day each: banishment, contact other plane (as an action), mind blank

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: The shield dwarf guard has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: The shield dwarf noble has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Shifter
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Shifting (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the shifter takes on a more bestial form for 1 minute or until it dies. The shifter gains 5 temporary hit points. It can make a bite attack when it activates this trait and also as a bonus action on each of its turns while in its bestial form.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shoosuva makes one Bite attack and one Tail Stinger attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 26 (4d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail Stinger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, the target is also paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Rampage
bonus_actions.desc: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the shoosuva can move up to half its speed and make one Bite attack.

monsters.name: Sibriex
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Contamination
traits.desc: The sibriex emits an aura of corruption 30 feet in every direction. Vegetation withers in the aura, and the ground in the aura is difficult terrain for other creatures. Any creature that starts its turn in the aura must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (4d6) poison damage. A creature that succeeds on the save is immune to this sibriex's Contamination for 24 hours.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the sibriex fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The sibriex has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sibriex makes three Chain attacks, and it uses Squirt Bile.

actions.name: Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d12 + 7) force damage.

actions.name: Squirt Bile
actions.desc: The sibriex targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 31 (9d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Warp Creature
actions.desc: The sibriex targets up to three creatures it can see within 120 feet of it. Each target must make a 20 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, a creature becomes immune to this sibriex's Warp Creature. On a failed save, the target is poisoned, which causes it to also gain 1 level of exhaustion. While poisoned in this way, the target must repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns. Three successful saves against the poison end it, and ending the poison removes any levels of exhaustion caused by it. Each failed save causes the target to gain another level of exhaustion. Once the target reaches 6 levels of exhaustion, it dies and instantly transforms into a living manes under the sibriex's control. The transformation of the body can be undone only by a wish spell.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex uses Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Spray Bile
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex uses Squirt Bile.

legendary_actions.name: Warp (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex uses Warp Creature.

spells: The sibriex casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 21):

monsters.name: Silver Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft., swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Metallic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 450 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 120,000 XP (240,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Metallic Awakening activates.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 20) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The greatwyrm uses one of the following breath weapons:

actions.name: Elemental Breath
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales elemental energy in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw, taking 84 (13d12) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Sapping Breath
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales gas in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature falls unconscious for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the end of the greatwyrm's next turn. An unconscious creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically transforms into any creature that is Medium or Small, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the dragon is reduced to 0 hit points or uses its action to end it.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm beats its wings. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The greatwyrm can then fly up to half its flying speed.

mythic_actions.desc: If the greatwyrm's Metallic Awakening trait has activated in the last hour, it can use the options below as legendary actions.

mythic_actions.name: Bite
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack.

mythic_actions.name: Shattering Roar (Costs 2 Actions)
mythic_actions.desc: The greatwyrm unleashes a magical roar. Each creature in a 120-foot-radius sphere centered on the greatwyrm must succeed on a 26 Constitution saving throw or take 19 (3d12) thunder damage and be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Silverquill Apprentice

actions.name: Ink Blade
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage.

reactions.name: Rousing Verse
reactions.desc: When a creature the apprentice can see within 30 feet of it fails a saving throw, the apprentice magically weaves together stirring prose, allowing the creature to reroll the saving throw and use the higher result.

spells: The apprentice casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12):

monsters.name: Silverquill Pledgemage

actions.name: Ink Blade
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Demotivate (2/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: The pledgemage hurls magical insults at one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the pledgemage for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, the target can't take reactions, its speed is halved, and any hit the pledgemage scores against the creature is a critical hit. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reactions.name: Rousing Verse
reactions.desc: When a creature the pledgemage can see within 30 feet of it fails a saving throw, the pledgemage magically weaves together stirring prose, allowing the creature to reroll the saving throw and use the higher result.

spells: The pledgemage casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 13):

monsters.name: Silverquill Professor of Radiance

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The professor makes two Radiant Strike attacks. The professor can replace one of the attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Radiant Strike
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 17 (3d8 + 4) radiant damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw be blinded until the end of its next turn.

spells: The professor casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 15):

spells.2/day each: bless, command, cure wounds, daylight, mage armor

monsters.name: Silverquill Professor of Shadow

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the professor's darkvision.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The professor makes two Ink Lance attacks. The professor can replace one of the attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Ink Lance
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 17 (3d8 + 4) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw be blinded until the end of its next turn.

spells: The professor casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 15):

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The merfolk can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage, or 4 (1d8) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Jared makes three Longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) radiant damage. On a roll of 19 or 20, Jared scores a critical hit.

reactions.name: Protect Ally
reactions.desc: When a creature Jared can see attacks a target other than Jared that is within 5 feet of him, Jared imposes disadvantage on the attack roll.

monsters.name: Sire of Insanity
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Aura of Mind Erosion
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the sire must make a 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage for 1 minute on Wisdom and Charisma checks and on Wisdom and Charisma saves. At the start of each of its turns, the sire can suppress this aura until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The sire has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sire makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 25 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage.

spells: The sire's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The sire can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: clairvoyance, crown of madness, major image, suggestion

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points by a creature that is Large or smaller, the draconian crumbles into dust that then forms a spectral, shrieking image of the creature that killed it. The image lasts for 1 minute. Each creature hostile to the draconian within 10 feet of the image must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the spectral image for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draconian makes two Serrated Sword attacks and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Serrated Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reactions.name: Shape Theft
reactions.desc: After the draconian kills a Medium or smaller Humanoid, the draconian magically cloaks itself in an illusion to look and feel like that creature while retaining the draconian's game statistics (other than its size). This transformation lasts until the draconian dies or uses a bonus action to end it.

monsters.name: Skeletal Alchemist
monsters.languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The skeletal alchemist has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skeletal alchemist makes two Lob Acid attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lob Acid
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) acid damage.

traits.name: Disassemble
traits.desc: If the juggernaut is reduced to 0 hit points, twelve skeletons rise from its remains.

traits.name: Falling Apart
