traits.desc: If the juggernaut does not have all of its hit points at the start of its turn, it loses 10 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The juggernaut makes two claws attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Avalanche of Bones (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The juggernaut collapses into a large heap before quickly reforming. Each creature within 10 feet of the juggernaut must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is also knocked prone.

monsters.name: Skeletal Knight
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the skeletal knight to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is bludgeoning or from a critical hit. On a success, the skeletal knight drops to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The skeletal knight doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skeletal knight makes three Enervating Blade or Throwing Axe attacks in any combination.

actions.name: Enervating Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the skeletal knight's next turn.

actions.name: Throwing Axe
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Skeletal Rats
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 7 (2d6) piercing damage, or 3 (1d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Skeletal Swarm
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Deafening Clatter
traits.desc: Creatures are deafened while in the swarm's space.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Small humanoid. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Slash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 11 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

monsters.name: Skeleton Key
monsters.languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The skeleton can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skeleton makes two dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The horror can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The horror can use its Maddening Presence and make three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 24 (4d8 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Maddening Presence
actions.desc: The horror targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the horror, the target must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target becomes paralyzed until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the horror's Maddening Presence for the next 24 hours.

monsters.name: Skitterwidget
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, deafened, exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the skitterwidget is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The skitterwidget doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skitterwidget makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled by the skitterwidget (escape 13).

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) lightning damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

reactions.name: Good Parent
reactions.desc: The skitterwidget imposes disadvantage on one attack roll made against a kiddywidget it can see within 5 feet of it.

traits.name: Fallible Invisibility
traits.desc: The skulk is invisible. This invisibility can be circumvented by three things:

traits.name: Charnel Candles
traits.desc: The skulk appears as a dim, translucent form in the light of a candle made of fat rendered from a corpse whose identity is unknown.

traits.name: Children
traits.desc: Humanoid children, aged 10 and under, can see through this invisibility.

traits.name: Reflective Surfaces
traits.desc: The skulk appears as a drab, smoothskinned biped if its reflection can be seen in a mirror or on another surface.

traits.name: Trackless
traits.desc: The skulk leaves no tracks to indicate where it has been or where it's headed.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

monsters.name: Skull Lasher of Myrkul

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skull lasher makes two attacks with its flail.

actions.name: Iron Skull Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on all saving throws until the end of the skull lasher's next turn.

actions.name: Ray of Sickness (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of the skull lasher's next turn. If the skull lasher casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

spells: The skull lasher is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand, message, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, protection from evil and good, ray of sickness (see "Actions" below), shield

monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, stunned, unconscious
monsters.languages: all the languages it knew in life

traits.desc: If the skull lord is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half the damage, the skull lord instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if it fails, provided it isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Master of the Grave
traits.desc: While within 30 feet of the skull lord, any Undead ally of the skull lord makes saving throws with advantage, and that ally regains 1d6 hit points whenever it starts its turn there.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The skull lord doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Deathly Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +10 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 27 (5d8 + 5) necrotic damage.

Undead summoned in this way roll initiative, act in the next available turn, and obey the skull lord. The skull lord can have no more than five Undead summoned by this ability at a time.

actions.name: Talons

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The skyswimmer can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skyswimmer makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its slam.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 19 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the skyswimmer. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the skyswimmer, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the skyswimmer's turns. If the skyswimmer takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the skyswimmer must succeed on a 18 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within 10 feet of the skyswimmer. If the skyswimmer dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 19 (2d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Skyweaver

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

spells: The Skyweaver is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): blade ward, light, message, ray of frost, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): feather fall, mage armor, witch bolt

monsters.name: Slaad Tadpole
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The dog has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dog's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

monsters.name: Slithering Tracker
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, deafened, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, unconscious
monsters.languages: understands languages it knew in its previous form but can't speak

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: If the slithering tracker is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the slithering tracker move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the slithering tracker isn't a puddle.

traits.name: Liquid Form
traits.desc: The slithering tracker can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can also move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The slithering tracker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Life Leech
actions.desc:
One Large or smaller creature that the slithering tracker can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. In addition, the grappled target takes 16 (3d10) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The slithering tracker can grapple only one target at a time.
While grappling the target, the slithering tracker takes only half any damage dealt to it (rounded down), and the target takes the other half.

bonus_actions.name: Watery Stealth
bonus_actions.desc: If underwater, the slithering tracker takes the {@action Hide} action, and it makes the Dexterity (Stealth) check with advantage.

monsters.name: Smoke Mephit
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.desc: When the mephit dies, it leaves behind a cloud of smoke that fills a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on its space. The sphere is heavily obscured. Wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise lasts for 1 minute.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Cinder Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of smoldering ash. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 10 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of the mephit's next turn.

spells: The mephit can innately cast dancing lights, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

monsters.name: Snake Horror
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 14
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The snake horror has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spell Immunity
traits.desc: The snake horror is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical immunities include fireball, heat metal, and lightning bolt.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The snake horror makes two longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Disengage
bonus_actions.desc: You take the Disengage action.

monsters.name: Snow Golem
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.damage_immunities: cold, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

traits.name: Cold Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the golem is subjected to cold damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the cold damage dealt.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Melt
traits.desc: While in an area of extreme heat, the golem loses 1d6 hit points at the start of each of its turns.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Snowball
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +0 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) cold damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The leopard has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.desc: If the leopard moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the leopard can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Snow Maiden
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious
monsters.languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the specter has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

monsters.name: Snowy Owlbear
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
traits.desc: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The owlbear makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Society of Sensation Muse

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The muse makes two Beguiling Resonance attacks.

actions.name: Beguiling Resonance
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft., one target. 9 (2d8) psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes until the end of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Enchanting Presence
bonus_actions.desc:
Each creature within 30 feet of the muse must make a 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the charmed condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any muse's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the muse deals damage to the charmed creature, the charmed creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The muse casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 13):

monsters.name: Solar Bastion Knight

traits.name: Aura of Protection
traits.desc: The knight and each ally within 10 feet of it have advantage on saving throws. This trait is suppressed while the knight has the incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The knight makes three Sunspear attacks.

actions.name: Sunspear
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4) radiant damage, or 21 (5d6 + 4) radiant damage if the target is a Fiend or an Undead.

actions.name: Solar Flare (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The knight unleashes a blaze of brilliant energy that fills a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the knight. Each creature of the knight's choice in that area must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 (4d10) radiant damage and has the blinded condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. For the next minute, the affected area is filled with bright light that is sunlight.

spells: The knight casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 15):

spells.1/day each: Greater Restoration, Sending, Word of Recall (the prepared sanctuary is the Solar Bastion)

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The dragon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The dragon doesn't require air.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) radiant damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Photonic Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a flashing mote of radiant energy that travels to a point the dragon can see within 120 feet of itself, then blossoms into a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each creature in the sphere must make a 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Formation Tactics
traits.desc: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, grappled, or restrained while it is within 5 feet of at least one ally.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The soldier makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

monsters.name: Soul Shaker
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

traits.name: Enthralled Lure (1/Day)
traits.desc: The soul shaker can cast the geas spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12).

traits.name: Reconstruction
traits.desc: When the soul shaker is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes into 7 (1d4 + 5) crawling claws. After 6 (1d12) days, if at least two of those crawling claws are alive, they teleport to the location of the soul shaker's death and merge together, whereupon the soul shaker reforms and regains all its hit points.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The soul shaker doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Crushing Grasp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 15). The soul shaker can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

bonus_actions.name: Consume Vitality
bonus_actions.desc: The soul shaker targets a creature it is grappling. If the target is not a Construct or an Undead, the target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or take 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the soul shaker regains hit points equal to that amount. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

monsters.name: Space Clown

traits.name: Dying Burst
traits.desc: When the clown drops to 0 hit points, it pops like a balloon, releasing a splash of putrid, corrosive ichor. Each creature within 5 feet of the clown when it bursts must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Squeakers
traits.desc: The clown wears shoes that squeak when it walks. The squeaking can be heard out to a range of 30 feet. The squeaking is silenced while the clown's Phantasmal Form is in effect.

actions.name: Shock
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (4d6 + 3) lightning damage.

actions.name: Ray Gun
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 7 (2d6) psychic damage, and if the target is a Humanoid with an Intelligence score of 3 or higher, it must make a 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target perceives everything it sees or hears as hilariously funny and is incapacitated for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Phantasmal Form (3/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: The clown veils itself and everything it is wearing and carrying in an illusion that makes it look like some other creature of its size or smaller (such as a child) or an object small enough to fit in the clown's space (such as a floating balloon). Maintaining this effect requires the clown's {@status concentration} (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell), and the illusion fails to hold up to physical inspection. As an action, a creature that can see the clown's illusory form can make a 15 Wisdom (Insight) check, piercing the illusion and discerning the clown's true form on a success.

spells: The clown casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability:

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The eel doesn't require air.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: If it isn't attached to a creature, the eel makes one Bite attack and one Tail Spine attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the eel attaches to the target. While attached, the eel can't make Bite attacks. Instead, the target takes 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage at the start of each of the eel's turns. The eel can detach itself as a bonus action. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the eel.

actions.name: Tail Spine
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Air Envelope
traits.desc: If it has at least 1 hit point, the guppy can generate an air envelope around itself when in a vacuum. This air envelope can sustain the guppy and one other Tiny creature in its space indefinitely.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The guppy doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Tail Slap
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Space Hamster
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: the hamster has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The mollymawk doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The mollymawk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Spawn of Kyuss
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The spawn of Kyuss regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or a body of running water. If the spawn takes acid, fire, or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the spawn's next turn. The spawn is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Worms
traits.desc: If the spawn of Kyuss is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away, and it loses its Burrowing Worm action.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The spawn of Kyuss requires no air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spawn of Kyuss makes two Claw attacks, and it uses Burrowing Worm.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Burrowing Worm
actions.desc: A worm launches from the spawn of Kyuss at one Humanoid that the spawn can see within 10 feet of it. The worm latches onto the target's skin unless the target succeeds on a 11 Dexterity saving throw. The worm is a Tiny Undead with AC 6, 1 hit point, a 2 (-4) in every ability score, and a speed of 1 foot. While on the target's skin, the worm can be killed by normal means or scraped off using an action (the spawn can use Burrowing Worm to launch a scraped-off worm at a Humanoid it can see within 10 feet of the worm). Otherwise, the worm burrows under the target's skin at the end of the target's next turn, dealing 1 piercing damage to it. At the end of each of its turns thereafter, the target takes 7 (2d6) necrotic damage per worm infesting it (maximum of 10d6), and if it drops to 0 hit points, it dies and then rises 10 minutes later as a spawn of Kyuss. If a worm-infested target is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away.

monsters.name: Spectator
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
The Lost Dungeon of Rickedness: Big Rick Energy
Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.desc: The spectator shoots up to two of the following magical eye rays at one or two creatures it can see within 90 feet of it. It can use each ray only once on a turn.

actions.name: 1. Confusion Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw, or it can't take reactions until the end of its next turn. On its turn, the target can't move, and it uses its action to make a melee or ranged attack against a randomly determined creature within range. If the target can't attack, it does nothing on its turn.

actions.name: 2. Paralyzing Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 3. Fear Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the spectator is visible to the target, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 4. Wounding Ray
actions.desc: The target must make a 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Create Food and Water
actions.desc: The spectator magically creates enough food and water to sustain itself for 24 hours.

reactions.name: Spell Reflection
reactions.desc: If the spectator makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, the spectator can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 30 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the spectator. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

monsters.name: Spectral Cloud
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Blurred Form
traits.desc: Attack rolls against the spectral cloud are made with disadvantage unless the attacker is within 15 feet of the spectral cloud or the spectral cloud is incapacitated.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The spectral cloud can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spectral cloud makes two Spectral Touch attacks.

actions.name: Spectral Touch
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 20 (3d8 + 7) force damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw, or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.
A Humanoid slain by this attack immediately rises as a miniature spectral cloud (use the specter stat block in the Monster Manual). The miniature spectral cloud acts as an ally of its creator but isn't under its control.

actions.name: Chilling Winds (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc:
The spectral cloud emits intensely cold wind in a 60-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 20 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 (7d10) cold damage and has the incapacitated condition for 1 minute. The affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.
If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, that creature is immune to this spectral cloud's Chilling Winds for the next 24 hours.

monsters.name: Sperm Whale
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Echolocation
traits.desc: The whale can't use its blindsight while deafened.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The whale can hold its breath for 90 minutes.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.desc: The whale has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The whale makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 14 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the whale. A swallowed creature has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the whale, and it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of the whale's turns. If the whale takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the whale must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the whale. If the whale dies, a swallowed creature can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 18 (3d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage, or 37 (6d6 + 16) bludgeoning damage if the target is an object.

monsters.name: Sphinx of Judgment
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.desc: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sphinx makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

legendary_actions.name: Claw Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The sphinx makes one claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spells: The sphinx is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): friends, mage hand, message

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, ensnaring strike, shield

monsters.name: Spiked Tomb Guardian
monsters.damage_immunities: lightning, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Berserk
traits.desc: Whenever the tomb guardian starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the tomb guardian goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the tomb guardian attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the tomb guardian attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the tomb guardian goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points. The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk tomb guardian, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The tomb guardian must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the tomb guardian ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the tomb guardian might go berserk again.

traits.name: Aversion of Fire
traits.desc: If the tomb guardian takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The tomb guardian is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the tomb guardian is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The tomb guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Chained
traits.desc:
{@note This trait applies when two guardians are chained together.}
A magical spiked chain that binds a pair of guardians together prevents them from moving more than 15 feet apart. Additionally, as long as the chain is intact, damage dealt to either guardian is divided evenly between them. The spiked chain can be attacked separately and has AC 18, a damage threshold of 10, 5 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. If the chain breaks, both tomb guardians instantly go berserk.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tomb guardian makes two spiked gauntlet attacks.

actions.name: Spiked Gauntlet
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d6) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Spined Devil
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The devil doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Limited Spines
traits.desc: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The devil makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its fork or two with its tail spines.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (2d4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fork
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail Spine
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 20/80 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

monsters.name: Spirit Statue Mascot
monsters.languages: any languages it knew in life

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.desc: When the spirit statue is reduced to 0 hit points, the statue crumbles, and the spirit returns to the afterlife in a burst of ghostly white flame. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or take 3 (1d6) radiant damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Counsel of the Past (2/Day)
actions.desc: The spirit statue touches one creature. Once within the next 10 minutes, that creature can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice, immediately after rolling the d20.

monsters.name: Spirit Troll
monsters.damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The troll can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes psychic or force damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 19 (3d10 + 3) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 19 (3d10 + 3) psychic damage.

monsters.name: Spitting Mimic
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
traits.desc: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape 16). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

traits.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
traits.desc: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

traits.name: Grappler
traits.desc: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The mimic has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mimic attacks three times: twice with its pseudopods and once with its bite.

actions.name: Pseudopods
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Spit Acid (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The mimic spits acid at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 32 (9d6 + 1) acid damage on failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Defensive Advantage
traits.desc: As long as two or more of Splugoth's allies are within 5 feet of him and are not incapacitated, attack rolls against him are made with disadvantage.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: Splugoth can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

traits.name: Touch of Madness
traits.desc: Splugoth has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Splugoth makes two attacks with his dagger.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Word From Beyond (1/Day)
actions.desc: Splugoth remembers and repeats aloud a few words from a place he entered while walking back from the next world to this one. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him that can hear him must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

reactions.name: Absorb Attack
reactions.desc: When a creature Splugoth can see hits him with a melee weapon attack, the weapon snags on a pocket of residual resurrectional energy and is caught fast. The attack is negated and the weapon cannot be used until the creature succeeds on a 12 Strength (Athletics) check as an action to pull it out of Splugoth. Natural weapons can have their attacks negated by this feature, but can then be retracted automatically at the end of the attacking creature's turn.

monsters.name: Spore Servant Octopus
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage. If the lion moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. If the target has the prone condition, the lion can make another Rend attack against it as a bonus action.

monsters.name: Spring Eladrin

traits.name: Joyful Presence
traits.desc:
Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Joyful Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, the charmed creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The eladrin teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.

bonus_actions.name: Shove
bonus_actions.desc: While wielding a shield, you try to shove one creature within 5 feet of you.

monsters.name: Ssurran Defiler

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The ssurran can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

traits.name: Intellect Fortress
traits.desc: The ssurran's AC includes its Intelligence modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ssurran makes two Claw attacks and uses Defile (if available).

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Defile (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Ordinary vegetation within 10 feet of the ssurran withers and dies. In addition, each creature within 10 feet of the ssurran must make a 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The ssurran regains 5 (1d10) hit points for each creature that fails the saving throw.

spells: The ssurran casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The ssurran can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ssurran makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Poison Bomb
actions.desc: The ssurran throws a tangerine-sized bomb at a point up to 60 feet away, where it explodes, releasing a 10-foot-radius sphere of poisonous gas that disperses quickly. Each creature in the sphere must make a 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After the ssurran throws a bomb, roll a d6; on a roll of 4 or lower, the ssurran has no more bombs to throw.

monsters.name: Stalker of Baphomet

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.desc: The stalker can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The stalker has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The stalker makes two Glaive attacks or two Rock attacks.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 18 (2d10 + 7) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) force damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 19 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. After the stalker throws the rock, roll a d6; on a roll of 3 or lower, the stalker has no more rocks to throw.

actions.name: Erupting Horns (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc:
The stalker causes the earth to churn at a point on the ground it can see within 60 feet of itself. Six horn-shaped stones erupt in a 30-foot-radius, 30-foot-high cylinder centered on that point and then crumble to dust.
Each creature in that area must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10) piercing damage and is pushed up to 30 feet upward and then falls. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

spells: The stalker casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 15):

spells.1/day each: meld into stone, stone shape, wall of stone

traits.name: Aura of Shrieks
traits.desc: Creatures within 20 feet of the grue that aren't Aberrations have disadvantage on saving throws, as well as on attack rolls against creatures other than a star spawn grue.

actions.name: Confounding Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 10 Wisdom saving throw or attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of the grue's next turn.

monsters.name: Star Spawn Hulk
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Psychic Mirror
traits.desc: If the hulk takes psychic damage, each creature within 10 feet of the hulk takes that damage instead; the hulk takes none of the damage. In addition, the hulk's thoughts and location can't be discerned by magic.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hulk makes two Slam attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the target also takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage and must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Reaping Arms (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The hulk makes a separate Slam attack against each creature within 10 feet of it. Each creature that is hit must also succeed on a 17 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

monsters.name: Star Spawn Larva Mage
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained

traits.name: Return to Worms
traits.desc: When the mage is reduced to 0 hit points, it breaks apart into a swarm of insects in the same space. Unless the swarm is destroyed, the mage reforms from it 24 hours later.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mage makes three Slam or Eldritch Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Eldritch Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +8 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 19 (3d10 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Plague of Worms (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Each creature other than a star spawn within 10 feet of the mage must succeed on a 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (5d8) necrotic damage and be blinded and restrained by masses of swarming worms. The affected creature takes 22 (5d8) necrotic damage at the start of each of the mage's turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reactions.name: Feed on Weakness
reactions.desc: When a creature within 20 feet of the mage fails a saving throw, the mage gains 10 temporary hit points.

legendary_actions.name: Slam
legendary_actions.desc: The mage makes one Slam attack.

legendary_actions.name: Eldritch Bolt (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The mage makes one Eldritch Bolt attack.

legendary_actions.name: Feed (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature restrained by the mage's Plague of Worms takes 13 (3d8) necrotic damage, and the mage gains 6 temporary hit points.

spells: The mage casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 16):

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.desc: The mangler has advantage on initiative rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mangler makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the attack roll has advantage, the target also takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Flurry of Claws (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The mangler makes six Claw attacks. Either before or after these attacks, it can move up to its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the mangler takes the {@action Hide} action.

monsters.name: Star Spawn Seer
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Out-Of-Phase Movement
traits.desc:
The seer can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain, and its movement doesn't provoke {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}.
Each creature it moves through takes 5 (1d10) psychic damage; no creature can take this damage more than once per turn.
The seer takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The seer makes two Comet Staff or Psychic Orb attacks.

actions.name: Comet Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Psychic Orb
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +11 to hit, range 120 feet, one creature. 27 (5d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Collapse Distance (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The seer warps space around one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. That creature must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, is teleported up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space the seer can see, and then each creature within 10 feet of the target's original space takes 39 (6d12) psychic damage. On a successful save, the target takes 19 (3d12) psychic damage and isn't teleported.

reactions.name: Bend Space
reactions.desc: When the seer would be hit by an attack roll, it teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, exchanging positions with another star spawn it can see within 60 feet of it. The other star spawn is hit by the attack instead.

monsters.name: Starlight Apparition
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Astral Existence
traits.desc: The apparition can exist only on the Astral Plane. If it is sent to a location not on the Astral Plane, the apparition is destroyed.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: While it has at least 1 hit point, the apparition sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The apparition can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The apparition doesn't require air, drink, food, or sleep.

actions.name: Radiant Eruption
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 20 (5d6 + 3) radiant damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Possession (Recharge 6)
actions.desc:
One Humanoid that the apparition can see within 5 feet of itself must succeed on a 14 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the apparition; the apparition then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The apparition now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The apparition can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.
The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the apparition ends it as a bonus action, the body leaves the Astral Plane, or the apparition is forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the apparition reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. If it reappears in a location not on the Astral Plane, the apparition is destroyed. The target is immune to this apparition's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

monsters.name: Statue of Talos
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The statue makes five attacks: one with its headbutt and four with its lightning bolt blades.

actions.name: Headbutt
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Bolt Blades
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Statue of Vergadain
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The statue has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The statue's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Magic Theft
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the golem targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw, or all magic items in its possession are teleported to the bottom of the pit in {@adventure area 31|WDMM|15|31. Hall of Embers}.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The statue makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slow (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The statue targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Steel Defender
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Vigilant
traits.desc: The defender can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

actions.name: Force-Empowered Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. 1d8 + PB force damage.

actions.name: Repair (3/Day)
actions.desc: The magical mechanisms inside the defender restore 2d8 + PB hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

reactions.name: Deflect Attack
reactions.desc: The defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the defender.

monsters.name: Steel Predator
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 17
monsters.languages: understands Modron and the language of its owner but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The steel predator has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The steel predator doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The steel predator makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 18 (2d10 + 7) lightning damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d8 + 7) force damage.

actions.name: Stunning Roar (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The steel predator emits a roar in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 19 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10) thunder damage, drops everything it's holding, and is stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

spells: The steel predator casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

spells.3/day each: dimension door (self only), plane shift (self only)

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 26 (6d6 + 5) piercing damage.

traits.name: Stench
traits.desc: Any creature other than a stench kow that starts its turn within 5 feet of the stench kow must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the Stench of all stench kows for 1 hour.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the stench kow moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Stomping Foot
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

traits.name: Turn Immunity
traits.desc: The foot is immune to effects that turn undead.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Stone Cursed
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Cunning Opportunist
traits.desc: The stone cursed has advantage on the attack rolls of {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: If the stone cursed is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the stone cursed move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the stone cursed isn't a statue.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The stone cursed doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Petrifying Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw, or it begins to turn to stone and is restrained until the end of its next turn, when it must repeat the saving throw. The effect ends if the second save is successful; otherwise the target is petrified for 24 hours.

monsters.name: Stone Dragon Statue
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The statue has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The statue's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Steam Breath
actions.desc: The statue exhales steam in a line that is 30 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 (2d4 + 2) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Dreamwalker's Charm
traits.desc: An enemy that starts its turn within 30 feet of the giant must make a 13 Charisma saving throw, provided that the giant isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the giant. A creature charmed in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, the creature is immune to this giant's Dreamwalker's Charm for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Greatclub or Rock attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Petrifying Touch
actions.desc: The giant touches one Medium or smaller creature within 10 feet of it that is charmed by it. The target must make a 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes petrified, and the giant can adhere the target to its stony body. greater restoration spells and other magic that can undo petrification have no effect on a petrified creature adhered to the giant unless the giant is dead, in which case the magic works normally, freeing the petrified creature as well as ending the petrified condition on it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Thundering Stone Club or Boulder attacks in any combination.

actions.name: Thundering Stone Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage. The giant can cause the club to emit a burst of thunderous energy that deals 10 (3d6) thunder damage to each creature, other than the giant, within 30 feet of the target. The club can emit a burst this way only once per turn.

actions.name: Boulder
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. After the giant throws the boulder, roll a d6; on a roll of 3 or lower, the giant has no more boulders to throw.

reactions.name: Unyielding
reactions.desc: In response to failing a saving throw to avoid being moved, having the prone condition, or both, the giant succeeds instead.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Stone Rune
traits.desc:
The giant has a stone rune inscribed on a mineral object in its possession. While holding or wearing the object bearing the rune, the giant can use its Prismatic Rays action.
The object bearing the rune has AC 18; 30 hit points; and immunity to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. The object regains all its hit points at the end of every turn, but it turns to dust if reduced to 0 hit points or when the giant dies. If the rune is destroyed, the giant can inscribe a stone rune on an object in its possession when it finishes a short or long rest.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes three Prism Staff attacks.

actions.name: Prism Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Exploding Geode
actions.desc: The giant throws a geode at a point within 60 feet of itself, and the geode explodes in a dazzling flash. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 13 (3d8) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage and has the blinded condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. After the giant throws the geode, roll a d6; on a roll of 4 or lower, the giant has no more geodes to throw.

actions.name: Prismatic Rays (Requires Stone Rune)
actions.desc: The giant's stone rune emits beams of light that form a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 17 Dexterity saving throw. For each creature in that area, roll a d6 to determine what ray affects it:

actions.name: 1-2: Blazing Red
actions.desc: On a failed save, the creature takes 35 (10d6) radiant damage and has the blinded condition until the end of the giant's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: 3-4: Dreadful Blue
actions.desc: On a failed save, the creature takes 35 (10d6) necrotic damage and has the frightened condition until the end of the giant's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: 5-6: Sapping Green
actions.desc: On a failed save, the creature takes 35 (10d6) force damage and has the incapacitated condition until the end of the giant's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

monsters.name: Stone Giant Statue
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

monsters.name: Stone Juggernaut
monsters.speed: 50 ft. (in one direction chosen at the start of its turn)
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone

traits.name: Devastating Roll
traits.desc: The juggernaut can move through the space of a prone creature. A creature whose space the juggernaut enters for the first time on a turn must make a 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The juggernaut is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: As long as it has 1 hit point left, the juggernaut magically regains all its hit points daily at dawn. The juggernaut is destroyed and doesn't regenerate if it drops to 0 hit points.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The juggernaut deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 25 (3d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

monsters.name: Stone Warrior
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slow (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Stonecloak
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands Abyssal, Celestial, Common, Draconic, Dwarvish, , Infernal, and Undercommon but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The stonecloak is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
