traits.desc: The stonecloak has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The stonecloak's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The stonecloak makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slow (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The stonecloak targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Stonemelder

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.desc: When the Stonemelder dies, it turns to stone and explodes in a burst of rock shards, becoming a smoking pile of rubble. Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding Stonemelder must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Black Earth Rod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage. The Stonemelder can also expend a spell slot to deal extra damage, dealing 2d8 bludgeoning damage for a 1st level slot, plus an additional 1d8 for each level of the slot above 1st.

spells: The Stonemelder is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): acid splash, blade ward, light, mending, mold earth

spells.1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, false life, shield

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The crab can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The crab makes two Claw attacks and one Stinger attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape 16). The crab has four claws, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Stinger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned and paralyzed conditions for 1 minute. The affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending both the poisoned and paralyzed conditions on itself on a success.

actions.name: Water Jet (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The crab exhales water in a 150-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (6d8) bludgeoning damage, is pushed up to 30 feet from the crab, and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

monsters.name: Storm Giant Quintessent
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The giant can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.desc: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Lightning Sword attacks, or it uses Wind Javelin twice.

actions.name: Lightning Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 40 (9d6 + 9) lightning damage.

actions.name: Wind Javelin
actions.desc: The giant coalesces wind into a javelin-like form and hurls it at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The javelin deals 19 (3d6 + 9) force damage to the target, striking unerringly. The javelin disappears after it hits.

legendary_actions.name: Gust
legendary_actions.desc: The giant targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates a magical gust of wind around the target, who must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or be moved up to 20 feet in any horizontal direction the giant chooses.

legendary_actions.name: Thunderbolt (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The giant hurls a thunderbolt at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The target must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: One with the Storm (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The giant vanishes, dispersing itself into the storm surrounding its lair. The giant can end this effect at the start of any of its turns, becoming a giant once more and appearing in any location it chooses within its lair. While dispersed, the giant can't take any actions other than lair actions, and it can't be targeted by attacks, spells, or other effects. The giant can't use this ability outside its lair, nor can it use this ability if another creature is using a control weather spell or similar magic to quell the storm.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two attacks with its greatsword or hurls two rocks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 30 (6d6 + 9) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 60/240 ft., one target. 35 (4d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The giant hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Storm Giant Tempest Caller

traits.name: Alert
traits.desc: The giant can't be surprised, and it has advantage on initiative rolls.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The giant can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the giant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Scrying (Requires Storm Rune)
traits.desc: The giant can use its crystal ball to cast the scrying spell (save 17).

traits.name: Storm Rune
traits.desc:
The giant has a storm rune inscribed on a crystal ball. While the object bearing the rune is embedded in its body, the giant can use its Tempest Call action and its Scrying trait.
The object bearing the storm rune has AC 17; 50 hit points; and immunity to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. The object regains all its hit points at the end of every turn, but it turns to dust if reduced to 0 hit points or when the giant dies. If the rune is destroyed, the giant can inscribe a storm rune on another crystal ball in its possession when it finishes a short or long rest.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes three Lightning Blade or Lightning Lance attacks.

actions.name: Lightning Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d8 + 9) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Lance
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +13 to hit, range 500 ft., one target. 39 (5d12 + 7) lightning damage.

actions.name: Tempest Call (Requires Storm Rune)
actions.desc: The giant creates an elemental vortex that fills a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area other than the giant must make a 21 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 43 (8d8 + 7) damage of a type of the giant's choosing: cold, lightning, or thunder. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

spells: The giant casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 21, +13 to hit with spell attacks):

spells.1/day each: control water, control weather (as an action), dispel magic, plane shift, sending, time stop

monsters.name: Storm Herald

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The herald can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The herald has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The herald makes one Claw attack, one Tentacles attack, and one Trident attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (3d6 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape 18). It also has the restrained condition and takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns until this grapple ends. The herald can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (3d6 + 8) piercing damage or 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Psychic Wave (Recharge 6)
actions.desc:
The herald unleashes a blast of psionic energy into the minds of up to three creatures it can see within 90 feet of itself. Each target must make a 21 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 23 (3d10 + 7) psychic damage and has the stunned condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage only. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
If a creature is reduced to 0 hit points by this psychic damage, it dies and its head explodes if it has one.

spells: The herald casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 21):

spells.At will: detect magic, detect thoughts, mage hand (the hand is invisible)

spells.1/day each: control water, control weather (as an action), sending

monsters.name: Strahd Zombie
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Loathsome Limbs
traits.desc:
Whenever the zombie takes at least 5 bludgeoning or slashing damage at one time, roll a d20 to determine what else happens to it:
18: One leg is severed from the zombie if it has any legs left.
916: One arm is severed from the zombie if it has any arms left.
1720: The zombie is decapitated.
If the zombie is reduced to 0 hit points, all parts of it die. Until then, a severed part acts on the zombie's initiative and has its own action and movement. A severed part has AC 8. Any damage it takes is subtracted from the zombie's hit points.
A severed leg is unable to attack and has a speed of 5 feet.
A severed arm has a speed of 5 feet and can make one claw attack on its turn, with disadvantage on the attack roll. Each time the zombie loses an arm, it loses a claw attack.
If its head is severed, the zombie loses its bite attack and its body is blinded unless the head can see it. The severed head has a speed of 0 feet. It can make a bite attack, but only against a target in its space.
The zombie's speed is halved if it's missing a leg. If it loses both legs, it falls prone. If it has both arms, it can crawl. With only one arm, it can still crawl, but its speed is halved. With no arms or legs, its speed is 0 feet, and it can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The zombie makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

traits.name: Stirge Telepathy
traits.desc: The strigoi can magically command any stirge within 120 feet of it, using a limited form of telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The strigoi makes one Claw attack and makes one Proboscis attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 6 (1d12) acid damage.

actions.name: Proboscis
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, and the strigoi regains hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. A creature reduced to 0 hit points from this attack dies and leaves nothing behind except its skin and its equipment.

actions.name: Ravenous Children (1/Day)
actions.desc: The strigoi magically summons 1d4 + 2 stirge (see their entry in the Monster Manual) in unoccupied spaces it can see within 30 feet of it. The stirges are under the strigoi's control and act immediately after the strigoi in the initiative order. The stirges disappear after 1 hour, when the strigoi dies, or when the strigoi dismisses them (no action required).

monsters.name: Strixhaven Campus Guide
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, deafened, exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Campus Knowledge
traits.desc: While at Strixhaven, the guide can't become lost by magical or nonmagical means. The guide also has advantage on ability checks made to locate creatures or objects at Strixhaven.

traits.name: Univocal Speech
traits.desc: When the guide speaks, any creature that knows at least one language and can hear the guide understands what it says.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The guide doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The guide makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Smile and Wave
actions.desc:
Each creature of the guide's choice that is within 30 feet of the guide must succeed on a 11 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed by the guide for 1 hour.
A charmed target must move on its turn toward the guide, trying to get within 5 feet of the guide. The target doesn't move into obviously dangerous ground, such as a fire or a pit. Whenever the charmed target takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
A target that successfully saves is immune to any guide's Smile and Wave ability for the next 24 hours.

bonus_actions.name: Need Directions
bonus_actions.desc: The guide takes the Help action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The su-monster makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage, or 12 (4d4 + 2) slashing damage if the su-monster is hanging by its tail and all four of its limbs are free.

actions.name: Psychic Crush (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The su-monster targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 11 Wisdom saving throw or take 17 (5d6) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Sul Khatesh
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Sul Khatesh fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Sul Khatesh has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Master of Magic
traits.desc: Sul Khatesh has advantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain {@status concentration}.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Sul Khatesh makes four attacks with Arcane Blast.

actions.name: Arcane Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +18 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 15 (1d10 + 10) force damage.

actions.name: Magic Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 36 (5d12 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Arcane Cataclysm (Recharges after a Long Rest)
actions.desc: Sul Khatesh conjures orbs of magical energy that plummet to the ground at three different points she can see within 1 mile of her. Each creature in a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on each point must make a 26 Dexterity saving throw, taking 71 (11d12) force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in the area of more than one arcane burst is affected only once. The area of each arcane burst then acts as an antimagic field for 1 hour. Sul Khatesh and spells she casts are unaffected by these fields.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc:
Sul Khatesh magically polymorphs into a humanoid, beast, or giant that has a challenge rating no higher than her own, or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Sul Khatesh's choice).
In a new form, Sul Khatesh retains her alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Her statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Sul Khatesh makes two attacks with her Arcane Blast or one attack with her magic staff.

legendary_actions.name: Consume Magic (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Sul Khatesh targets a creature within 120 feet of her who is {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell. The target must succeed on a 26 Constitution saving throw or its {@status concentration} is broken on the spell, and Sul Khatesh gains 5 temporary hit points per level of that spell.

legendary_actions.name: Maddening Secrets (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Sul Khatesh whispers an arcane secret into the mind of a creature she can see within 60 feet of her. The target must succeed on a 26 Wisdom saving throw or expend one of its spell slots of 3rd level or lower and deal 26 (4d12) force damage to each creature within 30 feet of it. A creature that fails the saving throw but can't expend a spell slot is instead stunned until the end of its next turn.

spells: Sul Khatesh's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 26, +18 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: counterspell, detect magic, detect thoughts, dispel magic, eyebite, fireball, lightning bolt, shield

spells.3/day each: chain lightning, create undead, dream, hold monster, mass suggestion, scrying

spells.1/day each: foresight, gate, power word kill, teleport

traits.name: Fearsome Presence
traits.desc: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened of the eladrin for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

bonus_actions.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The eladrin teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The eladrin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the eladrin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the giant can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The giant deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.desc: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two slam attacks. The first of those attacks that hits deals an extra 18 (4d8) damage if the giant has taken damage since its last turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Additionally, if the sunfly is on an Outer Plane, it injects the target with a toxin, the effect of which is determined by the sunfly's location:

actions.name: Upper Plane
actions.desc: The target sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Neutral Plane
actions.desc: If the target is {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell or similar effect, it makes the Constitution saving throw with disadvantage to maintain its {@status concentration}.

actions.name: Lower Plane
actions.desc: The target's speed is reduced by 5 feet until the end of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Illumination
bonus_actions.desc: The sunfly sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet, or it uses a bonus action to extinguish the light.

monsters.name: Svirfneblin Wererat
monsters.damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
monsters.languages: Common (can't speak in rat form), Gnomish, Terran, Undercommon

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The wererat can use its action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The wererat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.desc: The svirfneblin wererat has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.desc: The svirfneblin wererat has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: The wererat makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite.

actions.name: Bite (Rat or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

actions.name: Shortsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The svirfneblin wererat's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 10). The svirfneblin wererat can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Swarm of Animated Books
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

traits.name: False Objects
traits.desc: If the swarm is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the swarm move or act, that creature must succeed on a 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the swarm is animate.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a 1-foot-tall, 8-inch-wide, 2-inch-thick object. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Book Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 6 (2d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer.

monsters.name: Swarm of Books
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned, grappled

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny book. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage, or 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

monsters.name: Swarm of Campestris
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned
monsters.languages: understands Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.desc: Each campestri in the swarm can mimic any voice or song it has heard, albeit in a nasal falsetto.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough to accommodate an individual campestri. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Head Butts
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (4d4) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer.

actions.name: Spores (1/Day)
actions.desc: A 20-foot radius of spores extends from the swarm. These spores can go around corners, and they have no effect on Constructs, Elementals, Plants, or Undead. Each other creature in the area must make a 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is incapacitated and its speed is halved, both for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Swarm of Cranium Rats
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
traits.desc: The swarm is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to all divination spells.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Illumination
bonus_actions.desc: The swarm sheds dim light from its brains in a 5-foot radius, increases the illumination to bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius (and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius), or extinguishes the light.

spells: As long as it has more than half of its hit points remaining, the swarm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 13):

monsters.name: Swarm of Gremishkas
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Limited Spell Immunity
traits.desc: The swarm automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells of 3rd level or lower, and the attack rolls of such spells always miss it.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny gremishka. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer, plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

reactions.name: Spell Redirection
reactions.desc: In response to a spell attack roll missing the swarm, the swarm causes that spell to hit another creature of its choice within 30 feet of it that it can see.

monsters.name: Swarm of Hoard Scarabs
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 9

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: If the swarm is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the swarm move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the swarm is animate.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny scarab. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Swarm of Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage if the swarm is at half of its hit points or fewer, and the target has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Scale Dust (1/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: The swarm releases magical glittering dust from its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the swarm must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or be outlined in blue light for 10 minutes. While outlined in this way, a creature sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from being invisible. In addition, every Dragon within 1 mile of the creature becomes aware of it and can unerringly track the creature. Casting dispel magic on the creature ends the effect on it.

monsters.name: Swarm of Maggots
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny maggot. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Infestation
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 10 (4d4) piercing damage, or 5 (2d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. A creature damaged by the swarm must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or contract a disease.
Each time the diseased creature finishes a long rest, roll a d6 to determine the disease's effect:
The creature is blinded until it finishes a long rest.
The creature's hit point maximum decreases by 5 (2d4), and the reduction can't be removed until the disease ends. The creature dies if its hit point maximum drops to 0.

The creature has disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls until it finishes its next long rest.
The disease lasts until it's removed by magic or until the creature rolls the same random effect for the disease two long rests in a row.

monsters.name: Swarm of Mechanical Spiders
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned, poisoned

traits.name: Constructed Nature
traits.desc: The swarm doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.desc: While in contact with a web, the swarm knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The swarm ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 10 (4d4) piercing damage, or 5 (2d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

monsters.name: Swarm of Rot Grubs
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny maggot. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +0 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 7 (2d6) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. At the end of each of the poisoned target's turns, the target takes 3 (1d6) poison damage. Whenever the poisoned target takes fire damage, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the poisoned target ends its turn with 0 hit points, it dies.

monsters.name: Swarm of Scarabs
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny scarab. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Skeletonize
traits.desc: If the swarm starts its turn in the same space as a dead creature that is Large or smaller, the corpse is destroyed, leaving behind only equipment and bones (or exoskeleton).

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Ravenous Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. If the target is a creature, scarabs burrow into its body, and the creature takes 3 (1d6) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. Any creature can use an action to kill or remove the scarabs with fire or a weapon that deals piercing damage, causing 1 damage of the appropriate type to the target. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by the swarm's piercing damage dies.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny dragonfly. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Stings
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 10 (3d4 + 3) piercing damage, or 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. Additionally, if the swarm is on an Outer Plane, it injects the target with a toxin, the effect of which is determined by the swarm's location:

actions.name: Upper Plane
actions.desc: The target sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius until the end of its next turn. During that time, the invisible condition has no effect on it.

actions.name: Neutral Plane
actions.desc: If the target is {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell or similar effect, it loses its {@status concentration}.

actions.name: Lower Plane
actions.desc: The target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Dazzling Lights (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The swarm shines its lights in a dazzling display. Each creature within 15 feet of the swarm must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Illumination
bonus_actions.desc: The swarm sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet, or it uses a bonus action to extinguish the light.

monsters.name: Swarm of Zombie Limbs
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 9

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny limb. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The swarm doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The swarm makes one Undead Mass attack and one Grasping Limbs attack.

actions.name: Undead Mass
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

actions.name: Grasping Limbs
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 7 (2d6) necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or be restrained. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, taking 7 (2d6) necrotic damage on a failed save. The creature is freed if it succeeds on this saving throw, the swarm moves out of the creature's space, or the swarm dies.

traits.name: Suave Defense
traits.desc: While the swashbuckler is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Charisma modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The swashbuckler makes one Dagger attack and two Rapier attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Lightfooted
bonus_actions.desc: The swashbuckler takes the {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} action.

monsters.name: Sword Wraith Commander
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Turning Defiance
traits.desc: The commander and any other sword wraiths within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn Undead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The commander doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The commander makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Call to Honor (1/Day)
actions.desc: If the commander has taken damage during this combat, it gives itself advantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn, and 1d4 + 1 sword wraith warrior appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of it. The warriors last until they drop to 0 hit points, and they take their turns immediately after the commander's turn on the same initiative count.

bonus_actions.name: Martial Fury
bonus_actions.desc: The commander makes one Longsword or Longbow attack, which deals an extra 9 (2d8) necrotic damage on a hit, and attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

monsters.name: Sword Wraith Warrior
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The warrior doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Martial Fury
bonus_actions.desc: The warrior makes one Battleaxe or Longbow attack, and attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Feline Agility
traits.desc: When the tabaxi moves on its turn in combat, it can double its speed until the end of the turn. Once it uses this ability, the tabaxi can't use it again until it moves 0 feet on one of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tabaxi makes two attacks with its claws, its shortsword, or its shortbow.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Feline Agility
traits.desc: When the tabaxi moves on its turn in combat, it can double its speed until the end of the turn. Once it uses this ability, the tabaxi can't use it again until it moves 0 feet on one of its turns.

traits.name: Inspire (1/Day)
traits.desc: While taking a short rest, the tabaxi can spend 1 minute singing, playing an instrument, telling a story, or reciting a poem to soothe and inspire creatures other than itself. Up to five creatures of the tabaxi's choice that can see and hear its performance gain 8 temporary hit points at the end of the tabaxi's short rest.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tabaxi makes two claws attacks or two dart attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 20/ 60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The talon beast has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sense Magic
traits.desc: The talon beast can detect and pinpoint the location of magic within 120 feet of itself.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The talon beast makes two Talon attacks or a Talon attack and a Beak attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage, and if the target has any spell effects on itself or any magic items in its possession, the target must make a 15 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a random spell effect on the target ends. If the target has no spell effects on it, one random magic item in its possession has its magical properties suppressed for 1 minute. If the item is a potion or scroll, it becomes nonmagical instead.

actions.name: Talon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape 17). Until the grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition, and the talon beast can't use Talon on another target.

monsters.name: Tanarukk
monsters.languages: Abyssal, Common, plus any one language

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The tanarukk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tanarukk makes one Bite attack and one Greatsword attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Aggressive
bonus_actions.desc: The tanarukk moves up to its speed toward an enemy that it can see.

reactions.name: Unbridled Fury
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by a melee attack, the tanarukk can make one Bite or Greatsword attack with advantage against the attacker.

monsters.name: Tanazir Quandrix

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Tanazir fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Tanazir makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 14 (1d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d6 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it is addled by recursive thoughts, reducing its speed to 0 until the start of Tanazir's next turn.

actions.name: Diminution Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Tanazir exhales a weakening equation in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 (13d6) force damage and 45 (13d6) psychic damage and is weakened until the start of Tanazir's next turn. While weakened, it has disadvantage on the following rolls that rely on Strength: attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't weakened.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Tanazir teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 100 feet of herself.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: Tanazir makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Fold Space (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Tanazir uses Teleport, and each other creature within 20 feet of the space she left must succeed on a 24 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 30 feet closer to the center of that space and take 16 (3d10) force damage.

legendary_actions.name: Fractal Refraction (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Tanazir magically summons 1d4 fractal mascot in unoccupied spaces she can see within 120 feet of herself. The fractals obey her commands and take their turns immediately after hers. While any of these fractals remain, attack rolls made against Tanazir have disadvantage. A summoned fractal disappears after 1 minute, when it or Tanazir dies, or when she uses this action again.

spells: Tanazir casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 24):

spells.1/day each: divination, enlarge/reduce, mirage arcane (as an action), polymorph, scrying (as an action), seeming

monsters.name: Tarkanan Assassin
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil

traits.name: Unstable Mark
traits.desc: When the assassin casts an innate spell, each creature within 10 feet of the assassin must make a 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The assassin makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +4 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 11 (2d10) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

actions.name: Chromatic Orb (1/Day)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +4 to hit, range 90 ft., one creature. 18 (4d8) damage of a type chosen by the assassin: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

spells: The assassin's spellcasting ability is Constitution (+4 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Telepathic Pentacle
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The Telepathic Pentacle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

traits.name: Multiple Heads
traits.desc:
The Telepathic Pentacle has five heads. While it has more than one head, the Telepathic Pentacle has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.
Whenever the Telepathic Pentacle takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the Telepathic Pentacle dies.
At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The Telepathic Pentacle regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

traits.name: Reactive Heads
traits.desc: For each head the Telepathic Pentacle has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

traits.name: Wakeful
traits.desc: While the Telepathic Pentacle sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Telepathic Pentacle makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Tempest Spirit
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, necrotic, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The spirit takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the spirit fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spirit makes two Lightning Fist or Hailstone attacks in any combination.

actions.name: Lightning Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 25 (4d8 + 7) lightning damage.

actions.name: Hailstone
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +12 to hit, range 90/180 ft., one target. 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Death Bolt (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The spirit hurls a magical lightning bolt in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) lightning damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a success or failure, an affected creature's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The creature dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

bonus_actions.name: Hailstorm (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The spirit conjures a hailstorm in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point it can see within 120 feet of itself. Each creature in that area must make a 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

monsters.name: Terracotta Warrior
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

traits.name: Fragile
traits.desc: If a critical hit is scored against the terracotta warrior, it shatters and is destroyed.

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: The terracotta warrior is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the terracotta warrior must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the terracotta warrior remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a terracotta statue.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The terracotta warrior makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Thayan Apprentice
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil

traits.name: Doomvault Devotion
traits.desc: Within the Doomvault, the apprentice has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The apprentice is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): burning hands, detect magic, mage armor, shield

monsters.name: Thayan Warrior
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil

traits.name: Doomvault Devotion
traits.desc: Within the Doomvault, the warrior has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The warrior makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The Bagman has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The Bagman regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the Bagman takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the Bagman's next turn. The Bagman dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Grappler
traits.desc: The Bagman has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The Bagman can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Alien Mind
traits.desc: If a creature tries to read the Bagman's thoughts, that creature must succeed on a 8 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Bagman makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.name: The Lord of Blades
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Adamantine Plating
traits.desc: Any critical hit against the Lord of Blades becomes a normal hit.

traits.name: Bladed Armor
traits.desc: A creature that grapples the Lord of Blades or is grappled by him takes 13 (3d8) slashing damage. A creature takes 13 (3d8) slashing damage if it starts its turn grappling or being grappled by the Lord of Blades.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the Lord of Blades moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with his adamantine sixblade on the same turn, the target takes an extra 11 (2d10) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 19 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

traits.name: Warforged Resilience
traits.desc: The Lord of Blades has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned, is immune to disease, and magic can't put him to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Lord of Blades makes three attacks: two with his adamantine sixblade and one with his bladed wings.

actions.name: Adamantine Sixblade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

actions.name: Bladed Wings
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 22 (4d10) fire damage.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The Lord of Blades makes one weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.desc: The Lord of Blades casts one of his cantrips.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The Lord of Blades casts a spell of 2nd level or lower from his spell list that takes 1 action to cast.

legendary_actions.name: Blade Dash (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The Lord of Blades moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks, then makes one attack with his adamantine sixblade. He can make one bladed wings attack against each creature he moves past.

spells: The Lord of Blades is a 20th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following artificer spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt (see "Actions" below), mage hand, mending, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, sanctuary, thunderwave

spells.2nd level (3 slots): blur, heat metal, scorching ray, see invisibility

spells.4th level (3 slots): freedom of movement, Mordenkainen's faithful hound

traits.name: Spell Turning
traits.desc: The chimera has advantage on a saving throw against any spell that targets only the chimera (not an area). If the chimera's saving throw is successful and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the chimera and instead targets the caster.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its claws, one with its head, and one with its tail. When its breath weapon is available, it can use the breath in place of its head or its claws.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Head
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The chimera exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 32 (5d12) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Thorn Slinger
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

traits.name: Adhesive Blossoms
traits.desc:
The thorn slinger adheres to anything that touches it. A Medium or smaller creature adhered to the thorn slinger is also grappled by it (escape 11). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.
At the end of each of the thorn slinger's turns, anything grappled by it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the thorn slinger remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate bush.

actions.name: Thorns
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Plant Camouflage
traits.desc: The thorny has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring vegetation.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The thorny regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the thorny's next turn. The thorny dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Thorny Body
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the thorny deals 2 (1d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d8 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Thought Spy

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.desc: On each of its turns, the thought spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The thought spy makes two melee attacks, or it makes three ranged attacks with its daggers.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The thought spy's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 13). The thought spy can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.At will: charm person, disguise self, encode thoughts (see chapter 2)

traits.name: Chameleon Carapace
traits.desc: The thri-kreen can change the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings. As a result, it has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The thri-kreen's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The thri-kreen makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned in this way. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka attacks and one Chatkcha attack.

actions.name: Gythka
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit (with advantage if the thri-kreen is missing any hit points), reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Chatkcha
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit (with advantage if the thri-kreen is missing any hit points), range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Leap
bonus_actions.desc: The thri-kreen leaps up to 20 feet in any direction, provided its speed isn't 0.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The thri-kreen adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the thri-kreen must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka or Chatkcha attacks.

actions.name: Gythka
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Chatkcha
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Chameleon Carapace
bonus_actions.desc: The thri-kreen changes the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings, gaining advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes to hide in those surroundings.

bonus_actions.name: Leap
bonus_actions.desc: The thri-kreen leaps up to 20 feet in any direction, provided its speed isn't 0.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The thri-kreen adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the thri-kreen must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Thri-kreen Mystic

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka attacks or four Psychic Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Gythka
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d8 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Psychic Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3) psychic damage.

actions.name: Drain Vitality (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The thri-kreen targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must make a 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 32 (5d12) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The thri-kreen regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

bonus_actions.name: Chameleon Carapace
bonus_actions.desc: The thri-kreen changes the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings, gaining advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes to hide in those surroundings.

spells: The thri-kreen casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

spells.At will: levitate (self only), mage hand (the hand is invisible)

spells.1/day each: freedom of movement (self only), invisibility (self only)

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., 18 (4d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Succeed on a DC14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Time Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 17

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

actions.name: Time Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a wave of shimmering light in a 15-foot cone. Nonmagical objects and vegetation in that area that aren't being worn or carried crumble to dust. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (6d8) force damage and is magically weakened as it is desynchronized from the time stream. While the creature is in this state, attack rolls against it have advantage. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A weakened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Tin Soldier
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: The tin soldier is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the tin soldier must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the tin soldier remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tin soldier makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Tiny Servant
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Beast of Burden
traits.desc: The titanothere is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the titanothere moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 13 (3d8) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition if it is a creature.

monsters.name: Titivilus
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Titivilus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Titivilus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Titivilus regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Titivilus dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Ventriloquism
traits.desc: Whenever Titivilus speaks, he can choose a point within 60 feet of him; his voice emanates from that point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Titivilus makes one Silver Sword attack, and he uses Frightful Word.

actions.name: Silver Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) force damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) force damage if used with two hands, plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the necrotic damage taken.

actions.name: Frightful Word
actions.desc: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of him for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, the target must take the {@action Dash} action and move away from Titivilus by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the {@action Dash} action. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Titivilus teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

actions.name: Twisting Words
actions.desc: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a 21 Charisma saving throw or become charmed by Titivilus for 1 minute. The charmed target can repeat the saving throw if Titivilus deals any damage to it. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to Titivilus's Twisting Words for 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Corrupting Guidance
legendary_actions.desc: Titivilus uses Twisting Words. Alternatively, he targets one creature charmed by him that is within 60 feet of him; that charmed target must succeed on a 21 Charisma saving throw, or Titivilus decides how the target acts during its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Titivilus uses Teleport.

legendary_actions.name: Assault (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Titivilus makes one Silver Sword attack, or he uses Frightful Word.

spells: Titivilus casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 21):

spells.At will: alter self, major image, nondetection, sending, suggestion

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The tlacatecolo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tlacatecolo makes two Talon attacks.

actions.name: Talon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (3d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc: The tlacatecolo magically transforms into a Medium owl, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the tlacatecolo is reduced to 0 hit points or if it uses its action to end it.

actions.name: Plague Winds (Fiend Form Only; Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc:
The tlacatecolo emits a chilling, disease-ridden wind in a 60-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or take 26 (4d12) cold damage and become poisoned.
While poisoned in this way, the creature can't regain hit points. At the end of every hour, the creature must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion. If the creature is in direct sunlight when it makes this saving throw, it automatically succeeds on the save.
If the creature is targeted by magic that ends a poison or disease, such as lesser restoration, while the creature isn't in direct sunlight, the effect does not end.

monsters.name: Tlexolotl
monsters.senses: darkvision 120 ft., tremorsense 120 ft., passive Perception 11

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.desc: At the start of each of the tlexolotl's turns, each creature within 10 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in that aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the tlexolotl or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The tlexolotl sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The tlexolotl regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the tlexolotl takes cold damage or is immersed in water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the tlexolotl's next turn. The tlexolotl dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tlexolotl makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (1d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (1d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 19 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the tlexolotl and knocked prone.

actions.name: Pyroclasm (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Gouts of molten lava erupt from the tlexolotl's body. Each creature in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the tlexolotl must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 21 (6d6) fire damage and 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage. On a successful saving throw, a creature takes half as much damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tlincalli makes one Longsword or Spiked Chain attack and one Sting attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Spiked Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 11) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tlincalli can't use the spiked chain against another target.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If it fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Tomb Dwarf
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the tomb dwarf has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tomb dwarf makes two longsword attacks or two crossbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the tomb dwarf's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The tomb dwarf can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Tomb Guardian
monsters.damage_immunities: lightning, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Berserk
traits.desc: Whenever the tomb guardian starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the tomb guardian goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the tomb guardian attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the tomb guardian attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the tomb guardian goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.
