The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk tomb guardian, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The tomb guardian must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the tomb guardian ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the tomb guardian might go berserk again.

traits.name: Aversion of Fire
traits.desc: If the tomb guardian takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The tomb guardian is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the tomb guardian is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The tomb guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tomb guardian makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Tomb Tapper
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.senses: blindsight 240 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 16
monsters.languages: understands Common and Undercommon but doesn't speak, telepathy 60 ft.

traits.name: Petrified Death
traits.desc: A tomb tapper reduced to 0 hit points turns into a lifeless stone statue. Anything it's wearing or carrying is not transformed.

traits.name: Sense Magic
traits.desc: The tomb tapper senses magic within 30 feet of it and can use an action to pinpoint the location of any creature, object, or area in that range that bears magic. This sense penetrates barriers but is blocked by a thin sheet of lead.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The tomb tapper can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-wide, 20-foot-tall tunnel in its wake.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The tomb tapper doesn't require air or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tomb tapper makes two melee attacks with its sledgehammer or with its claws. If it hits the same creature with both claws, it can pull that creature within 5 feet of its mouth and make a bite attack against it.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sledgehammer
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 27 (6d6 + 6) bludgeoning or force damage (tomb tapper's choice). If thrown, the hammer returns to the tomb tapper at the end of its turn, landing at the tomb tapper's feet if it doesn't have a hand free to catch the weapon.

monsters.name: Topaz Dragon Wyrmling
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 15

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe both air and water.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Desiccating Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales yellowish necrotic energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 21 (6d6) necrotic damage and is weakened until the end of its next turn. A weakened creature has disadvantage on Strength-based ability checks and Strength saving throws, and the creature's weapon attacks that rely on Strength deal half damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't weakened.

spells: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12):

monsters.name: Topaz Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft. (hover), swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Gem Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 400 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use its Mass Telekinesis action during the next hour. Award a party an additional 90,000 XP (180,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Gem Awakening activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d8 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 19) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales crushing force in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) force damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. On a success or failure, the creature's speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Mass Telekinesis (Gem Awakening Only; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc:
The greatwyrm targets any number of creatures and objects it can see within 120 feet of it. No one target can weigh more than 4,000 pounds, and objects can't be targeted if they're being worn or carried. Each targeted creature must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be restrained in the greatwyrm's telekinetic grip. At the end of a creature's turn, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
At the end of the greatwyrm's turn, it can move each creature or object it has in its telekinetic grip up to 60 feet in any direction, but not beyond 120 feet of itself. In addition, it can choose any number of creatures restrained in this way and deal 45 (7d12) force damage to each of them.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically transforms into any creature that is Medium or Small, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the greatwyrm is reduced to 0 hit points or uses a bonus action to end it.

bonus_actions.name: Psychic Step
bonus_actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm uses Psychic Step or Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Psychic Beam (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm emits a beam of psychic energy in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 26 Intelligence saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The greatwyrm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 26, +18 to hit with spell attack):

spells.1/day each: dispel magic, forcecage, plane shift, reverse gravity, time stop

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands in melee.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.desc: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

monsters.name: Tortle Druid

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tortle makes four Claw attacks or two Nature's Wrath attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Nature's Wrath
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +4 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) damage of a type chosen by the tortle: cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.desc: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

spells: The tortle casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12):

spells.2/day each: cure wounds, hold person, speak with animals, thunderwave

traits.name: Instinctive Reflexes
traits.desc: The conduit has advantage on initiative rolls, and it can't have disadvantage on attack rolls.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While the conduit is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The conduit makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the conduit can choose one of the following additional effects (up to once per turn each):

actions.name: Incapacitate
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or have the incapacitated condition until the end of the conduit's next turn.

actions.name: Push
actions.desc: The target is pushed up to 10 feet horizontally away from the conduit.

reactions.name: Deflect Attack
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by an attack roll, the conduit partially deflects the blow. The damage the conduit takes from the attack is reduced by 1d10.

reactions.name: Don't Be There
reactions.desc: When the conduit must make a saving throw, it can move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If its new position moves it out of range or otherwise makes it impossible to be targeted by the effect, the conduit avoids the effect entirely.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While the instinct is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The instinct makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Deflect Blow
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by a melee attack roll, the instinct partially deflects the blow. The damage the instinct takes from the attack is reduced by 1d6.

monsters.name: Transmuter Wizard

traits.name: Transmuter's Stone
traits.desc: The transmuter carries a magic stone it crafted. The stone grants it one of the following benefits while bearing the stone; the transmuter chooses the benefit at the end of each long rest:

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: The transmuter has {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet.

traits.name: Resilience
traits.desc: The transmuter has proficiency in Constitution saving throws.

traits.name: Resistance
traits.desc: Resistance. The transmuter has resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage (transmuter's choice whenever choosing this benefit).

traits.name: Speed
traits.desc: The transmuter's walking speed is increased by 10 feet.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The transmuter makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 19 (3d10 + 3) acid damage.

bonus_actions.name: Transmute (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The transmuter casts alter self or changes the benefit of Transmuter's Stone if bearing the stone.

spells: The transmuter casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 14):

spells.2/day each: fireball, hold person, knock, mage armor, polymorph, slow

monsters.name: Trapper
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 11

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: If the trapper is motionless on a floor, wall, or ceiling at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the trapper move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the trapper isn't part of the floor, wall, or ceiling.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The trapper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Smother
actions.desc: One Large or smaller creature within 10 feet of the trapper must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape 14). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. While grappled in this way, the target is restrained, blinded, and deprived of air. The trapper can smother only one creature at a time.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: If the treant is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the treant move or act, that creature must succeed on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the treant is animate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The treant makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
actions.desc: The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as an awakened tree (see the Monster Manual), except they can't speak. An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies, until the treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree, or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

monsters.name: Tree Blight
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10
monsters.languages: understands Common and Druidic but doesn't speak

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a dead tree.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The blight deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The blight makes one Branch attack and one Grasping Root attack.

actions.name: Branch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Grasping Root
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature not grappled by the blight. The target is grappled (escape 15). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 9 (1d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The root has AC 15 and can be severed by dealing 6 slashing damage or more to it at once. Cutting the root doesn't hurt the blight, but ends the grapple.

bonus_actions.name: Bite
bonus_actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature grappled by the blight. 19 (3d8 + 6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Detect Invisibility
traits.desc: Within 60 feet of the tressym, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the tressym's sight.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The tressym has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Poison Sense
traits.desc: The tressym can detect whether a substance is poisonous by taste, touch, or smell.

traits.name: Familiar
traits.desc: With the DM's permission, a person who casts the find familiar spell can choose to conjure a tressym in stead of a normal cat.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 slashing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tri-flower frond uses its orange blossom, then its yellow blossom, and then its red blossom.

actions.name: Orange Blossom
actions.desc: The tri-flower frond chooses one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. While poisoned in this way, the target is unconscious. At the end of each minute, the poisoned target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Yellow Blossom
actions.desc: The tri-flower frond chooses one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 11 Dexterity saving throw, or it is covered with corrosive sap and takes 5 acid damage at the start of each of its turns. Dousing the target with water reduces the acid damage by 1 point per pint or flask of water used.

actions.name: Red Blossom
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 2 (1d4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 11). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 5 (2d4) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The red blossom can grapple only one target at a time. Another creature within reach of the tri-flower frond can use its action to end the grapple on the target.

monsters.name: Tribal Warrior Spore Servant
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.desc: The tridrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.desc: If the tridrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tridrone makes three fist attacks or three javelin attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Triton Master of Waves

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The triton can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Summon Water Weird (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the triton magically summons 1d4 water weird. The summoned weirds appear in unoccupied spaces in water within 60 feet of the triton. The water weirds act immediately after the triton on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear if the triton dies.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The triton makes two attacks using Wave Touch and casts ray of frost.

actions.name: Wave Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (4d10) cold damage.

actions.name: Ray of Frost (Cantrip)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 13 (3d8) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the triton's next turn.

reactions.name: Frigid Shield
reactions.desc: When a creature the triton can see targets the triton with an attack, the triton gains 10 temporary hit points. If the attack hits and reduces the temporary hit points to 0, each creature within 5 feet of the triton takes 9 (2d8) cold damage.

spells: The triton's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.1/day each: fog cloud, gust of wind, wind wall

monsters.name: Triton Shorestalker

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The triton can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The triton can take the Disengage or Hide actions as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The triton makes two urchin-spine shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Urchin-Spine Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, that creature is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

actions.name: Poisoned Spine
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

spells: The triton's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Troglodyte
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Chameleon Skin
traits.desc: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Stench
traits.desc: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troglodyte makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Chameleon Skin
traits.desc: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Stench
traits.desc: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troglodyte makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with either its claws or its greatclub.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The troglodyte spits acid in a line 15 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Troll Amalgam
monsters.damage_resistances: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the amalgam fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The amalgam has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The amalgam regains 15 hit points at the start of its turn. If the amalgam takes acid or fire damage, it regains only 5 hit points at the start of its next turn. The amalgam dies only if it takes 20 or more acid or fire damage while it has 0 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The amalgam makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 25 (4d8 + 7) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Fling Limb (3/Day)
bonus_actions.desc:
Ranged Weapon Attack +13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 11 (1d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the limb hits a Medium or smaller creature, that creature has the grappled condition (escape 17). The limb has the statistics of a troll amalgam, except for the following: it is Medium, it has 45 hit points, its speed is 30 ft., it doesn't have a challenge rating or Legendary Resistance, and the only action it can take is the Attack action, which it can use only to grapple.
Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition and takes 25 (4d8 + 7) slashing damage at the start of each of its turns. If the limb is not destroyed within 24 hours of being flung, roll a d12; on a roll of 12, the limb regenerates into a troll (see the Monster Manual). Otherwise, the limb withers away.

traits.name: Mutation
traits.desc: When the troll mutate is created, it gains one of four possible body mutations at random: 1, Elastic Body; 2, Psionic Mirror; 3, Spell Scarred; or 4, Winged Form. This mutation determines certain traits in this stat block.

traits.name: Amorphous (Elastic Body Only)
traits.desc: The mutate can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

traits.name: Magic Resistance (Spell Scarred Only)
traits.desc: The mutate has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Psychic Rebuke (Psionic Mirror Only)
traits.desc: If the mutate takes psychic damage, each creature within 20 feet of it takes that damage as well.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The mutate regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the mutate takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the mutate's next turn. The mutate dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate. If the mutate starts its turn with 0 hit points and regenerates, it randomly gains a mutation it doesn't already have (up to a maximum of four mutations).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mutate makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. (or 15 ft. if the mutate has the Elastic Body mutation), one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) force damage.

actions.name: Psychic Burst (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The mutate unleashes a wave of psychic energy. Each creature within 30 feet of the mutate must make a 14 Intelligence saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Tromokratis
monsters.damage_immunities: fire, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: Tromokratis can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Hearts of the Kraken (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: When Tromokratis is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, the damage creates cracks in its carapace, revealing its hearts. Tromokratis has four hearts: two on its chest, one on its back, and one at the base of its tail. A heart has an AC of 22 and 100 hit points. It is immune to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks, and it is immune to all conditions. If it is forced to make a saving throw, treat its ability scores as 10 (+0). If it finishes a short or long rest, the carapace heals, any destroyed hearts regenerate, and the hearts are covered again. Tromokratis dies when all the hearts are destroyed.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Tromokratis fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Tromokratis's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: Tromokratis deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Spell-Resistant Carapace
traits.desc: Tromokratis has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature that makes a spell attack against Tromokratis has disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Tromokratis makes three attacks: one with its pincer, one with its tail, and one with its tentacle grasp.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape 26). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Tromokratis can't use this attack on anyone else.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 23 (3d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is knocked prone.

actions.name: Tentacle Grasp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 26). If the target doesn't escape by the end of its next turn, Tromokratis throws the target up to 60 feet in a straight line. The target lands prone and takes 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 29 (3d12 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by Tromokratis, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Tromokratis, and it takes 42 (12d6) acid damage at the start of each of Tromokratis's turns. If Tromokratis takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, Tromokratis must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of Tromokratis. If Tromokratis dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: Tromokratis moves up to half its speed.

legendary_actions.name: Tail
legendary_actions.desc: Tromokratis makes one tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Bite (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Tromokratis makes one bite attack.

mythic_actions.desc: If Tromokratis's mythic trait is active, it can use the options below as legendary actions for 1 hour after using Hearts of the Kraken.

mythic_actions.name: Rampage
mythic_actions.desc: Tromokratis makes two attacks: one with its tail and one with its tentacle grasp.

mythic_actions.name: Coral Growth (Costs 2 Actions)
mythic_actions.desc: Each creature within 10 feet of Tromokratis must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 (3d8) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Until the start of its next turn, Tromokratis and its hearts gain a +2 bonus to AC.

monsters.name: Trostani

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Trostani fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Trostani has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Trostani's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
traits.desc: Trostani can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

traits.name: Tree Stride
traits.desc: Once on her turn, Trostani can use 10 feet of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Trostani takes three actions: she uses Constrict and Touch of Order, and she casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Trostani can grapple no more than three targets at a time.

actions.name: Touch of Order
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 23 (3d8 + 10) radiant damage, and Trostani can choose one magic item she can see in the target's possession. Unless it's an artifact, the item's magic is suppressed until the start of Trostani's next turn.

actions.name: Wrath of Mat'Selesnya (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Trostani conjures a momentary whirl of branches and vines at a point she can see within 60 feet of her. Each creature in a 30-foot cube on that point must make a 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage and 21 (6d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Voice of Harmony
legendary_actions.desc: Trostani makes one melee attack, with advantage on the attack roll.

legendary_actions.name: Voice of Life
legendary_actions.desc: Trostani bestows 20 temporary hit points on another creature she can see within 120 feet of her.

legendary_actions.name: Voice of Order
legendary_actions.desc: Trostani casts dispel magic.

legendary_actions.name: Chorus of the Conclave (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Trostani casts suggestion. This counts as one of her daily uses of the spell.

legendary_actions.name: Awaken Grove Guardians (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Trostani animates one or two trees she can see within 120 feet of her, causing them to uproot themselves and become awakened trees (see the Monster Manual for their stat blocks) for 1 minute or until Trostani uses a bonus action to end the effect. These trees understand Druidic and obey Trostani's spoken commands, but can't speak. If she issues no commands to them, the trees do nothing but follow her and take the Dodge action.

spells: Trostani's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 24). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.3/day each: bless, conjure animals, giant insect, moonbeam, plant growth, spike growth, suggestion

monsters.name: Tsucora Quori
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The quori makes three attacks: one pincer attack, one attack with its claws, and one stinger attack.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature. The quori has two pincers, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (4d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Stinger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the quori for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Possession (Recharge 6)
actions.desc:
One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 14 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.
The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the quori ends it as a bonus action, or the quori is forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the quori reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this quori's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

spells: The quori's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monsters.name: Twig Blight
source: The Lost Dungeon of Rickedness: Big Rick Energy
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 9

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a dead shrub.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Two-Headed Cerberus
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, stunned

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the cerberus can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

traits.name: Multiheaded
traits.desc: The cerberus can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, and it has advantage on saving throws against being knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The cerberus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the cerberus's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cerberus makes two bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The cerberus exhales a 15-foot cone of molten rock. Each creature in the cone must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a creature is also restrained by the hardening rock. A creature can make a 12 Strength (Athletics) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within reach from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 10 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The typhon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The typhon regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The typhon dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The typhon makes three attacks: one with its Flurry of Bites, one to constrict, and one with its maw.

actions.name: Flurry of Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 35 (8d6 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The typhon can have up to two creatures constricted.

actions.name: Maw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 26 (3d12 + 7) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12) acid damage.

traits.name: Disgorge Zombie
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the tyrannosaurus zombie can disgorge a normal zombie, which appears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of it. The disgorged zombie acts on its own initiative count. After a zombie is disgorged, roll a d6. On a roll of 1, the tyrannosaurus zombie runs out of zombies to disgorge and loses this trait. If the tyrannosaurus zombie still has this trait when it dies, 1d4 normal zombies erupt from its corpse at the start of its next turn. These zombies act on their own initiative count.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the tyrannosaurus zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tyrannosaurus zombie makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 33 (4d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and the tyrannosaurus zombie can't bite another target or disgorge zombies.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Ulitharid

traits.name: Creature Sense
traits.desc: The ulitharid is aware of the presence of creatures within 2 miles of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The ulitharid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Psionic Hub
traits.desc: If an elder brain establishes a psychic link with the ulitharid, the elder brain can form a psychic link with any other creature the ulitharid can detect using its Creature Sense. Any such link ends if the creature falls outside the telepathy ranges of both the ulitharid and the elder brain. The ulitharid can maintain its psychic link with the elder brain regardless of the distance between them, so long as they are both on the same plane of existence. If the ulitharid is more than 5 miles away from the elder brain, it can end the psychic link at any time (no action required).

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 27 (4d10 + 5) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape 14) and must succeed on a 17 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated Humanoid grappled by the ulitharid. 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ulitharid kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The ulitharid magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 17 Intelligence saving throw or take 31 (4d12 + 5) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The ulitharid casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save 17):

spells.1/day each: dominate monster, feeblemind, mass suggestion, plane shift (self only), project image, scrying, telekinesis

monsters.name: Ultroloth
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The ultroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The ultroloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ultroloth can use its Hypnotic Gaze and makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Hypnotic Gaze
actions.desc: The ultroloth's eyes sparkle with opalescent light as it targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the ultroloth, the target must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed until the end of the ultroloth's next turn. The charmed target is stunned. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the ultroloth's gaze for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The ultroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The ultroloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 17). The ultroloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self, clairvoyance, darkness, detect magic, detect thoughts, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), suggestion

spells.3/day each: dimension door, fear, wall of fire

monsters.name: Umber Hulk
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.senses: darkvision 120 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Confusing Gaze
traits.desc:
When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the umber hulk and is able to see the umber hulk's eyes, the umber hulk can magically force it to make a 15 Charisma saving throw, unless the umber hulk is incapacitated.
On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a d8 to determine what it does during that turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action but uses all its movement to move in a random direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes one melee attack against a random creature, or it does nothing if no creature is within reach.
Unless {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the umber hulk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the umber hulk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The umber hulk can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5 foot-wide, 8-foot-high tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The umber hulk makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its mandibles.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Mandibles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Undead Bulette
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The bulette's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 30 (4d12 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Deadly Leap
actions.desc: If the bulette jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a 16 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked prone and take 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked prone, and is pushed 5 feet out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls prone in the bulette's space.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw against being magically petrified. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified for 24 hours.

monsters.name: Undead Shambling Mound
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

traits.name: Necrotic Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to necrotic damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is grappled (escape 14), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.desc: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it. The engulfed target is blinded, restrained, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

monsters.name: Undead Soldier
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The soldier makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the soldier's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The soldier can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Undead Spirit
monsters.ac: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

traits.name: Incorporeal Passage (Ghostly Only)
traits.desc: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 1d10 force damage for every 5 feet traveled.

traits.name: Festering Aura (Putrid Only)
traits.desc: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be poisoned until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Deathly Touch (Ghostly Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened of the undead until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Grave Bolt (Skeletal Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. 2d4 + 3 + summonSpellLevel necrotic damage.

actions.name: Rotting Claw (Putrid Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel slashing damage. If the target is poisoned, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The tree deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tree makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
actions.desc: The tree magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the tree. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the tree dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the tree takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

monsters.name: Undercity Medusa

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The medusa has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.desc: During the first round of combat, the medusa has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that is {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, and it deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage each time it hits such a creature with an attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The medusa makes two claw attacks. It can also use Petrifying Gaze before or after making these attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Petrifying Gaze
actions.desc: The medusa fixes its gaze on one creature within 60 feet of it that it can see and that can see its eyes. The target must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by a greater restoration spell or similar magic.

spells: The medusa's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14). The medusa can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.1/day each: expeditious retreat, fog cloud, misty step

monsters.name: Underworld Cerberus
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, stunned
monsters.languages: understands all languages but can't speak

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the cerberus can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

traits.name: Multiheaded
traits.desc: The cerberus can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, and it has advantage on saving throws against being knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The cerberus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the cerberus's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cerberus makes three bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The cerberus exhales a 30-foot cone of molten rock. Each creature in the cone must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a creature is also restrained by the hardening rock. A creature can make a 15 Strength (Athletics) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within reach from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 20 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.

monsters.name: Undying Councilor
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Aura of Radiance
traits.desc: The councilor magically sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The councilor can extinguish or restore this light as a bonus action. If the bright light overlaps with an area of darkness created by a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell that created that darkness is dispelled.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The councilor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The councilor makes two Radiant Touch attacks.

actions.name: Radiant Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) radiant damage.

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
actions.desc: The councilor touches another creature. The target magically regains 18 (3d8 + 5) hit points and is freed from one curse afflicting it (councilor's choice).

actions.name: Flame Strike (5th-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.desc: The councilor chooses a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a 17 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 14 (4d6) fire damage and 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the councilor casts this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the fire damage or the radiant damage (its choice) increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 5th.

legendary_actions.name: Touch
legendary_actions.desc: The councilor makes one attack with its Radiant Touch.

legendary_actions.name: Shimmering Aura (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The councilor channels positive energy into its Aura of Radiance. Until the end of the councilor's next turn, it sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Any creature that starts its turn in the bright light must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the councilor's next turn.

spells: The councilor is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): guidance, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): bless, command, create or destroy water

spells.5th level (2 slots): dispel evil and good, flame strike (see "Actions" below), scrying

monsters.name: Undying Soldier
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: radiant, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The soldier magically sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. The soldier can extinguish or restore this light as a bonus action.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The soldier makes two spear attacks.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage if the target is a fiend or undead.

traits.name: Formed by the Mists
traits.desc: When created, the horror's body composition takes one of four forms: Aberrant Armor, Loathsome Limbs, Malleable Mass, or Oozing Organs. This form determines certain traits in this stat block.

traits.name: Amorphous (Malleable Mass Only)
traits.desc: The horror can move through any opening at least 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Bile Body (Oozing Organs Only)
traits.desc: Any creature that touches the horror or hits it with a melee attack takes 5 (1d10) acid damage.

traits.name: Relentless Stride (Loathsome Limbs Only)
traits.desc: The horror can move through the space of another creature. The first time on a turn that the horror enters a creature's space during this move, the creature must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The horror makes two Limbs attacks.

actions.name: Limbs
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hex Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The horror expels necrotic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (7d12) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the barbarian can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Oathbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, plus an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage against a sworn enemy See the oathbow entry for the other properties.

monsters.name: Uthgardt Shaman

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if wielded with two hands.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

spells: The shaman casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12; +4 to hit with spell attacks):

spells.At will: dancing lights, mage hand, message, thaumaturgy

spells.1/day each: augury (cast as 1 action), bestow curse, cordon of arrows, detect magic, speak with dead, spirit guardians

monsters.name: Valenar Hawk
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.languages: understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

traits.name: Bonding
traits.desc: The hawk can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the hawk bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the hawk and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Valenar Hound
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.languages: understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

traits.name: Bonding
traits.desc: The hound can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the hound bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the hound and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

monsters.name: Valenar Steed
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.languages: understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

traits.name: Bonding
traits.desc: The steed can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the steed bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the steed and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Vampirate
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Explode
traits.desc: When the vampirate is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a cloud of ash. Any creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The vampirate can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The vampirate doesn't require air or drink.

actions.name: Energy Drain
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature. 11 (2d10) necrotic damage. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this attack dies and instantly transforms into a free-willed shadow under the DM's control.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Vampirate Captain
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Explode
traits.desc: When the captain is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a cloud of ash. Any creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or take 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The captain can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The captain doesn't require air or drink.

actions.name: Energy Drain
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature. 22 (4d10) necrotic damage. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this attack dies and instantly transforms into a free-willed shadow or vampirate (captain's choice) under the DM's control.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 19 (3d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Ship Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: A ship upon which the captain stands, along with all creatures and objects aboard it, becomes invisible to creatures not aboard the ship. The captain must concentrate on this magical effect to maintain it (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell), and it lasts for up to 1 hour. The effect ends if the captain leaves the ship.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.desc: The captain halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The captain must be able to see the attacker.

monsters.name: Vampirate Mage
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Explode
traits.desc: When the mage is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a cloud of ash. Any creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The mage can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The mage doesn't require air or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mage makes two Ray of Cold attacks.

actions.name: Energy Drain
actions.desc: {@atk ms,rs} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature. 22 (4d10) necrotic damage. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this attack dies and instantly transforms into a free-willed shadow under the DM's control.

actions.name: Ray of Cold
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2) cold damage.

spells: The mage casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 13):

spells.1/day each: darkness, dimension door, fly, hypnotic pattern

monsters.name: Vampire Spellcaster
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc:
If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.
While in bat form, the vampire can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has a flying speed of 30 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Misty Escape
traits.desc:
When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.
While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then paralyzed until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The vampire regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vampire Weaknesses
traits.desc:
The vampire has the following flaws:
{@i Forbiddance.} The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water.} The vampire takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.
{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is paralyzed until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape 18).

actions.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under the vampire's control.

actions.name: Charm
actions.desc:
The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by the vampire. The charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bite attack.
Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

actions.name: Children of the Night (1/Day)
actions.desc: The vampire magically calls 2d4 swarms of swarm of bats rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Unarmed Strike
legendary_actions.desc: The vampire makes one unarmed strike.

legendary_actions.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The vampire makes one bite attack.

spells: The vampire is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The vampire has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): comprehend languages, fog cloud, sleep

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, gust of wind, mirror image

monsters.name: Vampiric Jade Statue
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the statue fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The statue makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, that creature becomes cursed by the statue. The curse lasts for 10 minutes. While the creature is cursed, the statue has advantage on all attacks against it.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

legendary_actions.name: Bite
legendary_actions.desc: The statue makes one bite attack.

legendary_actions.name: Blood Reaper
legendary_actions.desc: All creatures currently cursed by the statue and within 20 feet of it take 5 necrotic damage.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The statue moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

monsters.name: Vampiric Mind Flayer
monsters.languages: telepathy 120 ft. but can only project emotions

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The mind flayer can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity

traits.name: Unusual Nature

actions.name: Multiattack
